['', 'Experience building and maintaining data pipelines serving human and machine consumers.', 'Knowledge of or willingness to learn general accounting standards and processes, as well as financial planning and analysis.', 'Some Things You Might Work On', 'A strong engineering background with interest in building large scale data solutions to enable people and systems.', 'Working knowledge of Airflow or some other scheduling tool.', 'Create data pipelines in Spark Scala or SQL between our payments stack, accounting system, and reporting platforms.', 'Experience and a proven track record of scaling data solutions to large, reliable, and performant systems. ', 'You thrive in a fast growing organization and enjoy working with business-focused or non-engineers to drive solutions against a broader strategic roadmap.', '5+ years of data engineering experience and a strong command of Spark, SQL, and a general purpose programming language - we routinely work with Python and Scala.', 'Develop interfaces and procedures to accelerate our Financial Data Infrastructure roadmap, including adherence to recurring reporting deadlines, financial analysis, and audit commitments.', 'Design, build, and evolve financial reporting systems and interfaces to provide internal customers with usable, reliable, and toil-reducing means of data consumption. You will analyze and build optimized pipelines for both technical and non-technical data consumers.', 'You Will', ' Automate accounting, planning, and management reporting; both within existing infrastructure and extend capabilities as we scale. Build datasets and reports that describe our business within various regulatory or audit frameworks. Create data pipelines in Spark Scala or SQL between our payments stack, accounting system, and reporting platforms. Construct ETLs of datasets from services such as Hive/Hadoop/S3 to an ERP via integration middleware.  Broaden the information available to our internal customers by developing reporting from the information contained in our core finance systems.', 'Broaden the information available to our internal customers by developing reporting from the information contained in our core finance systems.', 'Construct ETLs of datasets from services such as Hive/Hadoop/S3 to an ERP via integration middleware. ', 'The Ideal Candidate Possesses Many Of The Following', 'Collaborate across the company, including accounting, financial partnerships and product teams, to analyze and account for billions of dollars moving through the Stripe platform.', 'Build datasets and reports that describe our business within various regulatory or audit frameworks.', ' Collaborate across the company, including accounting, financial partnerships and product teams, to analyze and account for billions of dollars moving through the Stripe platform. Design, build, and evolve financial reporting systems and interfaces to provide internal customers with usable, reliable, and toil-reducing means of data consumption. You will analyze and build optimized pipelines for both technical and non-technical data consumers. Develop interfaces and procedures to accelerate our Financial Data Infrastructure roadmap, including adherence to recurring reporting deadlines, financial analysis, and audit commitments. Design and implement ad hoc reporting to enable information needs that may not fit into a broader, scheduled data model or system. ', ' A strong engineering background with interest in building large scale data solutions to enable people and systems. 5+ years of data engineering experience and a strong command of Spark, SQL, and a general purpose programming language - we routinely work with Python and Scala. Working knowledge of Airflow or some other scheduling tool. Experience and a proven track record of scaling data solutions to large, reliable, and performant systems.  You thrive in a fast growing organization and enjoy working with business-focused or non-engineers to drive solutions against a broader strategic roadmap. Experience building and maintaining data pipelines serving human and machine consumers. Knowledge of or willingness to learn general accounting standards and processes, as well as financial planning and analysis. ', 'Automate accounting, planning, and management reporting; both within existing infrastructure and extend capabilities as we scale.', 'Design and implement ad hoc reporting to enable information needs that may not fit into a broader, scheduled data model or system.']

['', 'Shift4 Payments is the leader in secure payment processing solutions. The company’s groundbreaking technologies help power the top software providers in numerous verticals, including hospitality, retail, F&B, e-commerce, lodging, gaming, and many more. Shift4’s family of software brands includes Harbortouch, Restaurant Manager, POSitouch, and Future POS — with additional integrations to 300+ POS/PMS systems across every industry. With an expansive global footprint that includes eight offices across the U.S. and Europe and over 8,000 sales partners, the company securely processes more than a billion transactions annually for nearly 200,000 businesses, representing over $100 billion in payments each year. For additional information, visit www.shift4.com. ', 'Education:', 'Thorough understanding of SDLC and how it pertains to the database.', 'We are looking for individuals that are extremely self-sufficient, available to work flexible hours, & hold themselves to the highest standards of professionalism. We will be evaluating candidates based on how they interview, prior experiences, functional knowledge, and references.', 'Refactoring existing code based on existing DBs and modifying it for newer models', 'Experience with an Agile SDLC a plus.', 'We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our Information Technology Group. This position will engage in an Agile-based SDLC to complete data layer requirements (includes but not limited to table creation, stored procedure creation and updates, ETL processes) as well as acquire a deep understanding of business processes and flows to assist with reporting / business intelligence tasks. The Data Engineer will work in a team comprised of front / backend developers, business analysts, QA engineers, and will follow the Project Manager’s lead for sprint goals and deliverables. ', 'Experience with SSIS and SSRS essential. SSAS preferred but not required.', 'Experience with Jira and Confluence', 'Qualifications:', 'Shift4 Payments provides\xa0equal employment opportunities\xa0(EEO) to all employees and applicants for\xa0employment\xa0without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics.', 'Ensuring code standards are followed on all code', 'Helping design, develop, debug and optimize stored procedures and views producing data suitable for reporting purposesEnsuring code standards are followed on all codeRefactoring existing code based on existing DBs and modifying it for newer modelsValidating data, performing cross reference checking between source data and outputsWorking with stakeholders and Technology Group to fine tune outputs to ensure all requirements are met for reportsWorking closely on related issues with internal business units', 'Basic VB & C# experience a plus.', 'Data Engineer', 'without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics.', 'Excellent written communication skills, particularly in the realm of technical documentation', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience", 'Ability to communicate technical issues to all levels', 'Validating data, performing cross reference checking between source data and outputs', 'Shift4 Payments provides\xa0equal employment opportunities\xa0(EEO) to all employees and applicants for\xa0employment', 'Responsibilities:', 'Helping design, develop, debug and optimize stored procedures and views producing data suitable for reporting purposes', 'Working closely on related issues with internal business units', '\xa0', 'Job Summary:', 'Bachelor of Science degree and/or relevant work experience ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience5+ years of experience with SQL Server.Experience with SSIS and SSRS essential. SSAS preferred but not required.Thorough understanding of SDLC and how it pertains to the database.Experience with Jira and ConfluenceExcellent written communication skills, particularly in the realm of technical documentationBasic VB & C# experience a plus.Experience with an Agile SDLC a plus.Ability to communicate technical issues to all levels", '5+ years of experience with SQL Server.', 'Company Background:', 'Working with stakeholders and Technology Group to fine tune outputs to ensure all requirements are met for reports']

['', 'Python experience', '\xa0', 'The Data Engineer will be responsible for building scalable data solutions across the entire data lifecycle. attention to detail including precise and effective customer communications and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously', 'Cloud data pipelines are developed and supported in an efficient fashion to ensure large, complex data sets are effectively maintained and continuously augmented', 'Established in 2015, BankMobile is a division of Customers Bank and America’s largest and fastest growing mobile-first bank offering checking and savings accounts. BankMobile provides an alternative banking experience to the traditional model and is focused on technology, innovation, easy-to-use products and education with the mission of being “customer-obsessed” and creating “customers for life.” The disruptive, multi-partner distribution model, known as “Bank-as-a-Service,” created by the executive team enables BankMobile to acquire customers at higher volumes and substantially lower expense than traditional banks. Its low-cost operating model enables it to provide low-cost banking services to low/middle-income Americans who have been left behind by the high-fee model of “traditional” banks. Today, BankMobile provides its “Bank-as-a-Service” platform to colleges and universities and currently serves nearly two million account-holders at 800 campuses (covering one out of every three students in the U.S.). job_title: Frontend Software Engineer - Full Remote Up to 180k Base Salary
job_text: ['', 'In the greatest country in the world, 9% of students from the lowest income quartile finish college compared to 77% for the rich. This means the wind that is blowing the cycle of poverty, continues to turn it faster and faster.', 'A Great Fully Remote Opportunity to Create Massive Impact - within the EdTech Industry!', 'Take full ownership of building, shipping and maintaining features, end-to-endDrive the future of our Frontend products and design + develop a world class user experience across all productsBuild efficient and reusable front-end systemsHelp estimate, plan and execute on projects, features, and integrationsDevelop and utilize your skills as a mentor and leader', 'Experience: 2+ years in industry.', 'We need you to have: ', 'Yes, we are beginning in the United States. However, students born all over the world, in every village, slum, and region where there is a shortage of teachers and resources, any place or space where there is a child born unlucky, we will be at their fingertips.', 'We’re solving a massive 1-billion-person problem.', 'Drive the future of our Frontend products and design + develop a world class user experience across all products', 'Help estimate, plan and execute on projects, features, and integrations', 'Paid parental leave.', 'Extraordinary: You have a track record of excelling in whatever you pursue (whether it’s work, school, competitions, personal projects, etc)', 'Experience: 2+ years in industry.Proficient expertise in: React.js, Javascript, CSS.Extraordinary: You have a track record of excelling in whatever you pursue (whether it’s work, school, competitions, personal projects, etc)', 'Flexible vacation', 'Develop and utilize your skills as a mentor and leader', 'excelling', 'React.js, Javascript, CSS.', 'Benefits', "-- This is where your work can align with your values. Where you can do something truly meaningful, and it doesn't feel like work. Contribute to a just cause. --", 'Ready to make a massive impact?', 'Responsibilities:', 'If you show passion in what you do -including personal projects and hobbies, then we encourage you to apply and look forward to hearing from you!', 'Proficient expertise in: React.js, Javascript, CSS.', 'industry', 'Monthly paid day off to focus on yourself, your family and community', 'Monthly paid day off to focus on yourself, your family and communityFlexible vacation$1k/year professional development & learning allocation$1k desk set up of your choiceMedical, dental, and vision insurancePaid parental leave.', '$1k/year professional development & learning allocation', 'Build efficient and reusable front-end systems', 'Medical, dental, and vision insurance', '$1k desk set up of your choice', 'Take full ownership of building, shipping and maintaining features, end-to-end']

['Design, build and launch efficient and reliable data pipelines transforming data into useful report ready datasets.', 'Broad range of partners equates to a broad range of projects and deliverables, including ML Models, datasets, measurements, services, tools and process.', 'Leverage data and business principles to automate data flow, detect business exceptions, build diagnostic capabilities, and improve both business and data knowledge base.', 'Key Responsibilities\xa0', 'You will also support our Heka team which is our internal accelerator for Data Science projects which includes a development framework, an automated integration & continuous deployment service (CI/CD), and a hosting & monitoring service for each project’s platform. You will be working alongside with our Data Science consultants and our clients on Data Engineering topics, including creating relevant data models, developing powerful data pipelines, exposing them through various mechanisms including APIs, and using data visualization tools to efficiently present data.']

", ' Background and experience in data analytics and/or data science, and several years’ working experience in non-trivial data environments. ', ' Strong proficiency with constructing efficient SQL and ideally in Python ', ' Fast-paced. You love the speed of and impact you have in startups. ', ' Facilitate decisions on standards, frameworks & tools, build vs use, and best practices. ', '  Experience with dbt, a framework used to build and manage complex data pipelines   Experience with Looker  ', 'About The Role', ' Design and conduct exploratory data research projects that drive our product roadmap and business strategy ', ' An owner. You feel personally accountable and responsible and know seeing the problem is less than half of it. You look for problems and inefficiencies and find elegant solutions to them before they become major issues. ', ' Experience with dbt, a framework used to build and manage complex data pipelines ', ' Experience with Looker ', ' A passion for scale, performance, and quality. You think people deserve access to their data in milliseconds and feel incorrect data is an insult. You worry about what happens when we have 100x more data & data sources, but are practical and experienced to know how to solve what we need right now. ', ' Drive quality into our data pipeline ,and ultimately our data, be it through good standards, in-depth & helpful code reviews, data validation methods, anomaly detection and alerting, multivariate experiments w/ proper control group(s), partnering with engineering on instrumentation, well-thought out ETL, and clearly and succinctly documenting where and how funky 3rd party data becomes our clean, gold-standard set. ', ' Knowledge of & experience with where the data comes from and how it makes it through the pipeline into a query result or interface. You’ve worked 1st hand (or in close partnership with an engineer) with various data storage technologies, pipelines, ETL, and visualization systems at scale. We use Redshift, Looker, dbt, Stitch, Split.io. ', '  Partner closely with anyone and everyone across the company to build dashboards & extract insights. The goal is to teach folks how to fish, not fish for them. That can come through building the 1st rev, helping with more advanced queries, dashboards, & views, or simply pairing & teaching.   Drive quality into our data pipeline ,and ultimately our data, be it through good standards, in-depth & helpful code reviews, data validation methods, anomaly detection and alerting, multivariate experiments w/ proper control group(s), partnering with engineering on instrumentation, well-thought out ETL, and clearly and succinctly documenting where and how funky 3rd party data becomes our clean, gold-standard set.   Facilitate decisions on standards, frameworks & tools, build vs use, and best practices. We try and keep our data and tools simple, clean, readable, and consistent to maximize our time on Envoy problems. Our current tech stack: Redshift, Python, Airflow, dbt, Looker   Design and conduct exploratory data research projects that drive our product roadmap and business strategy   Learn, teach, & share. With your fellow teammates and the world (blogs, open source, etc). It’s good for you, good for Envoy, and good for the world.  ', 'You are ', '  Strong proficiency with constructing efficient SQL and ideally in Python   Background and experience in data analytics and/or data science, and several years’ working experience in non-trivial data environments. Preferably folks who have at least 3-4+ years’ experience (enough to have been around a number of environments, data sets, and situations to have good breadth and depth)   Experience with algorithms, tools, and techniques for data mining, linear regression, machine learning.   Knowledge of & experience with where the data comes from and how it makes it through the pipeline into a query result or interface. You’ve worked 1st hand (or in close partnership with an engineer) with various data storage technologies, pipelines, ETL, and visualization systems at scale. We use Redshift, Looker, dbt, Stitch, Split.io.   A passion for scale, performance, and quality. You think people deserve access to their data in milliseconds and feel incorrect data is an insult. You worry about what happens when we have 100x more data & data sources, but are practical and experienced to know how to solve what we need right now.  ', 'Bonus points', "  Someone with extremely high standards that obsesses over data accuracy. You’re practical and know perfect is the enemy of good, but you aspire for us to be great. You care deeply about the quality of your work and our data. You are passionate about finding the insights and “truth” that data can give.   A big picture, systems thinker. You think about how the whole is a sum of many parts and how we can properly measure them end to end such that we have the per context for insights.   An owner. You feel personally accountable and responsible and know seeing the problem is less than half of it. You look for problems and inefficiencies and find elegant solutions to them before they become major issues.   Fast-paced. You love the speed of and impact you have in startups. Conversely you never, ever want to be a tiny cog in a gigantic machine.   An open-minded learner. You live to learn new things, like staying up to date on new technologies, tools, and techniques. You are inspired by what people inside and outside Envoy know and are eager to incorporate the world's knowledge into your work.   Emotionally mature & humble. You care about being effective over being right. Ideally you’ve made major changes & decisions in your life and learned from the results.   Communicative & empathetic. You are happy when helping others succeed, particularly your team and partners across the company.  ", ' Communicative & empathetic. You are happy when helping others succeed, particularly your team and partners across the company. ', ' Someone with extremely high standards that obsesses over data accuracy. You’re practical and know perfect is the enemy of good, but you aspire for us to be great. You care deeply about the quality of your work and our data. You are passionate about finding the insights and “truth” that data can give. ']

job_title: C++ Software Engineer, Next-Gen Trading Platform
job_text: ['', 'The company is a world leading investment manager with offices throughout North America, Europe and Asia, defined by its continuous technological innovation and evolution. It is expanding its team of first-rate software engineers in the Fixed Income line of business, adding individuals to help build next-generation real-time trading and risk management systems. The team will carry out data-intensive Greenfield projects, using petabytes of data to construct a unified platform which will rapidly trade government bonds, mortgage-backed securities and corporate bonds.', "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract.", 'Architect low latency infrastructure solutions.', 'Solve fiendish algorithmic problems with a strategic approach. ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'Design front-to-back, scalable real-time trading and risk management systems.Architect low latency infrastructure solutions.Solve fiendish algorithmic problems with a strategic approach. Enhance execution for the most cost-efficient trading process.Rewrite and refactor components where necessary.', 'Pre-Application:', 'Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.', 'The company is an open space for new ideas which enhance the technology ecosystem.The structure of the business is flat – you will be 2 responsibility levels away from the CTO. The company invests in its people just as much as its technology.This is a permanent position with a highly competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.', 'Experience developing and solving an array of C++ problems for Linux in a commercial environment, untangling intricate system elements where necessary.', 'Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.', 'Design front-to-back, scalable real-time trading and risk management systems.', 'Company Insight:', 'Enhance execution for the most cost-efficient trading process.', "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract.You must be eligible to live and work in the US, without requiring sponsorship.Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy", 'Rewrite and refactor components where necessary.', 'Your Role:', 'The structure of the business is flat – you will be 2 responsibility levels away from the CTO. The company invests in its people just as much as its technology.', 'You must be eligible to live and work in the US, without requiring sponsorship.', 'Experience developing and solving an array of C++ problems for Linux in a commercial environment, untangling intricate system elements where necessary.A mathematical brain to ensure fluid algorithmic creation and effective code maintenance.Passion for programming, wanting to have a variety of challenging projects on the go.', 'Passion for programming, wanting to have a variety of challenging projects on the go.', '\xa0', 'Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy', 'Further Context:', 'This is a permanent position with a highly competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.', 'The company is an open space for new ideas which enhance the technology ecosystem.', 'A mathematical brain to ensure fluid algorithmic creation and effective code maintenance.']

['', "At Proton we're bringing cutting-edge technology to the world of business-to-business distribution. It's a large market that offers an enormous opportunity for growth. The industry we serve accounts for trillions of dollars of revenue a year. It's a huge chance to have an impact by shaking up an industry that's still waking up to the promise of technology. We have a chance to really transform the way a huge number of people work for the better, and bridge the gap between amazing software tools and human expertise.", "Our team codes in Python, JavaScript (using the Vue framework), and Go, with modern scalable document- and key-based data stores behind them. We prefer excellence to expediency. Backed by our microservice architecture, we want the best tool not the most convenient. If there’s a compelling case to write something in Clojure, we can and will do it. With strong foundations, specific knowledge of these tools is not required. As the driver of engineering on this team, you'll have a chance to define the technology vision for our order entry systems.", "As a member of the order entry team, you'll build tools to integrate with client order management systems and make it easy, fast, and reliable for our users to place orders without leaving our system. In addition, you’ll serve as the engineering leader for the team, helping your fellow team members deepen their expertise, effectively collaborate, and develop a technology vision. Together with the product team, you'll work to build scalable solutions to big problems. This position reports to our chief technology officer.", "By becoming the source of truth for our customers' data, we're helping them make better decisions and be more effective. We’re looking for a lead engineer for our order entry team to help make that vision a reality.", 'Important note: In order to be considered for this position please submit your application via BeApplied using the following link', 'https://app.beapplied.com/apply/he0bo9ykb8?utm_source=linkedin', "As an early member of the company, you’ll have a chance to shape how we grow, making key decisions around technical choices, and defining our culture. We're working to build a sustainable environment where excellence sits alongside a recognition we operate in a system and a need to nurture learning at all levels. Our growing corps of engineering leadership, including this role, should bring more expertise into that equation."]

['', ' Design and implement creative new algorithms and technologies for high-performance, highly reliable systems (think six 9’s) ', 'APPLICANT & CANDIDATE PERSONAL INFORMATION PRIVACY NOTICE.', "What You'll Be Doing", 'We’ve Only Scratched The Surface Of Our Ambitions , And As We Continue To Gobble Up Market Share, We’re Blazing Trails And Setting Records', 'Net Promoter Score', '  For five straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays and in 2019, Gartner named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Primary Storage.   Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a 2019 Medallia Net Promoter Score, certified by Owen CX, in the top 1% of B2B companies.   Pure puts a premium on the future, investing 26% of revenue into R&D.  ', ' A BS degree in Computer Science; Advanced degrees are a bonus! job_title: Software Engineer with Background in ML/NLP: Full-Time Position
job_text: ['', 'We are turning contract execution on its head through AI-powered technology that delivers an automated contract mark-up process that instantaneously reviews and revises contracts. Powered by proprietary machine learning and natural language processing, our technology greatly speeds up a company’s high-volume contract drafting and negotiation processes, saving precious time and money. BlackBoiler is a must-have for in-house legal teams, service providers, and law firms. We are growing quickly and looking for team members to help us scale.', 'Benefits: Good health, dental, and vision ins', 'Employment: \xa0Full-time, flexible schedule, and mostly remote work', 'Experience or background in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing\xa0', 'Experience writing Python applications for production environmentsExperience or background in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing\xa0Experience with deploying applications on cloud infrastructuresExperience deploying ML and NLP models to cloud-based environmentsWell-rounded computer science background', ' ', 'Experience with writing unit, functional and regression tests for developed code', 'Experience integrating with 3rd party vendor platforms', 'Location: D.C./Maryland/Virginia', 'Who We Are:', 'Experience writing Python applications for production environments', 'Managing small-to-medium sized projects for production systems', 'Understanding of secure development practices', 'Experience deploying ML and NLP models to cloud-based environments', 'Minimum requirements:', 'Description:', 'Well-rounded computer science background', 'Experience with deploying applications on cloud infrastructures', 'We are looking for a smart, inquisitive person to join our team working on our core product. This is an exciting position that will contribute significantly to BlackBoiler’s proprietary automated document editing functionality, and we encourage applicants with a demonstrated understanding of the process required to take projects from research and development to production ready environments. You should have 4-6 years of post-undergraduate work experience (excluding internship and school projects) in developing Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing applications in Python. Additionally, someone with an appreciation for rigor in development processes and automation would fit right in. It is still early days for us, and we are a small team. This means that you would need to be interested in wearing multiple hats: developer, operations engineer, quality assurance, and whatever new hats need to be worn. We can promise you that you will get exposed to multiple aspects of Software Development and have fun doing it.\xa0', 'Additional experience:', 'Experience with writing unit, functional and regression tests for developed codeUnderstanding of secure development practicesUnderstanding of the legal industry desirable, but not requiredExperience integrating with 3rd party vendor platformsManaging small-to-medium sized projects for production systems', '\xa0', 'Salary, Benefits, and other Details:\xa0', 'Salary Range: $110K to $125K, commensurate with experience', 'Description:\xa0', 'Understanding of the legal industry desirable, but not required']

['', 'The Data Engineer strives to ensure proper data governance and quality for the Data Strategy team and the entire organization. They analyze complex data elements and systems, data flow, dependencies, and relationships in order to contribute to conceptual physical and logical data models. They work collaboratively with the Data Strategy team, providing support for their data centric needs. The candidate has strong working and conceptual knowledge of building and maintaining physical and logical data models and will also have system management expertise with server and database tuning, query, multidimensional query and index tuning, monitoring, disaster recovery, backup, automated testing, automated schema migration, and continuous deployment.', '-\xa0Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores', '-\xa0Strong quantitative, analytical, process development, facilitation and organizational skills required', '-\xa0Works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long term data platform architecture', "We're seeking a Data Engineer with heathcare industry experience for a FTE opportunity located in New York City.\xa0This position will be remote until about March 2021 and then will be onsite.\xa0Must have HL7 experience and extensive knowledge of EHR/EMR language. Some programming experience. Experience handling big data.", '-\xa0Experience with AWS Services', '-\xa0Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc', 'Local candidates to apply.', '-\xa0Implements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processes\xa0', 'SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '-\xa0Designs and evaluates open source and vendor tools for data lineage', 'QUALIFICATIONS:\xa0', 'The Data Engineer provides the foundation for analytics, namely the collection, quality assurance and availability of data. This IT role requires a significant set of technical skills, including a deep knowledge of SQL database design and multiple programming languages as well as communication skills to understand what data and analysis the healthcare analysts want to gain from data stores. They are responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleansing and manipulation of data in the organization’s operational and analytics databases. The Data Engineer defines and builds data pipelines to orchestrate the movement, transformation, validation, and loading of data from the source to the final destination – data stores defined and implemented based on system requirements and data consumer requirements.\xa0', '-\xa05+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. IBM Certified Data Engineer or Google Certified Professional desired.', '-\xa0Experience working with healthcare data including HL7, CCDAs, Intersystems HealthShare and Cache databases', '-\xa0Ability to architect end-to-end ETL pipelines', '-\xa0Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets', '-\xa0Strong skills with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc\xa0', '-\xa0Contribute to development of a rapidly growing, integrated data warehouse that will provide a complete vision of the entire healthcare landscape\xa0', '-\xa0Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues', '• This job has no supervisory responsibilities.\xa0', '-\xa0Writes unit/integration tests, contributes to Confluence, and documents work', '-\xa0Responsible for expanding and optimizing data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection\xa0', '-\xa0Experience with BI Tools e.g. Tableau', '-\xa0Responsible for optimizing or re-designing data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives', 'POSITION SUMMARY:\xa0', '-\xa0Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases', '-\xa0Excellent documentation and verbal communication skills. Ability to communicate technical vision in clear terms to peers as well as outside of the engineering/development team', '-\xa0Supports software developers, database architect, and data analysts on data initiatives and ensures optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects', '-\xa0Works closely with a team of frontend and backend engineers, product managers, and analysts', 'Typical tasks performed include working with the data architect on data warehouse design, ensuring data loads quickly, is easily accessible and rapidly comprehensible for analysts/users; extract, transform, and load (ETL) processing; performing thorough testing and validation in order to support the accuracy of data transformations and data verification to ensure correctness and that data is generally reliable for downstream consumption; data bounds checking and database tuning.\xa0', '-\xa0Experience building processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management', '-\xa0Must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products', '-\xa0Designs data integrations and data quality framework', '-\xa0Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement', '-\xa0Experience with database design principals including relationships and normalization, database structures, indexes and views and analyzing requirements and purpose of the database', '-\xa0Strong analytic skills', '-\xa0Contributes to definition of company data assets (data models), and processes to populate data models', '-\xa0Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring and familiarity with a variety of databases', '-\xa0Collaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility\xa0', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '-\xa0Develops and maintains scalable data pipelines and builds out new API integrations to support continuing increases in data volume and complexity']

Successful candidates will be part of an innovative and creative team with the opportunity to apply their creativity to Mirimus’ core vision. \xa0Strong communication and analytical skills, along with the ability to learn quickly are required attributes. \xa0\xa0", 'Good exposure to latest Software Development languages with demonstrated abilities across the entire lifecycle, including planning, analysis, design, assisting in user testing and training activitiesExperience defining application/integration architecture showcasing the use of knowledge domains pertaining to application modeling, ['', "You think for yourself and you're willing to speak up.", 'Fully paid healthcare coverage for you and your family (including dental) and a healthcare FSA', ' You are curious and enjoy learning. We\'re constantly faced with the unknown at Wistia. How do we create an analytics tracking system for 360 video? How do we scale the data store for it? What does it mean for that system to be reliable, and how can we measure and achieve that? You are a collaborator. Whether through pair programming, a whiteboard session, or a casual lunch conversation, collaboration helps the best ideas and practices to proliferate. You have strong communication skills. Each of us has only part of the overall picture in our head at a given time. Explaining ideas at an understandable level of abstraction is critical to achieving a shared vision. You\'re empathetic and emotionally intelligent. Sometimes things don\'t go smoothly. A customer gets frustrated, or a coworker does something that bothers you. Understanding where others are coming from, and being in control of and deliberate about how you respond to them, empowers you to solve problems while also being supportive of and sensitive to those around you. You write clean and understandable code. We write code for each other and for our future selves. Code that is clear and tested sets us up for speed, reliability, and a more enjoyable development experience. You know your fundamentals. Fads and frameworks come and go. We\'re less worried that you know the Next Hot Thing™ than that you feel comfortable with the underlying data structures, algorithms, languages, and protocols that make web applications work. You are comfortable thinking in trade offs. Some decisions will always have a downside. Do we want our distributed database to be more consistent, or more available? Should we use a hosted product that will save us time now, but force us to move to a new system in a year? These are regular conversations! You think for yourself and you\'re willing to speak up. We hire people because we value their thoughts, insights and experiences. These things matter a great deal more to us than conventional wisdom or herd mentalities in technical communities -- always think for yourself and don\'t hold back! You value simplicity. Blaise Pascal once wrote, "I\'m sorry I wrote you such a long letter; I didn\'t have time to write a short one." Making things simple and elegant is deceptively difficult, but it\'s worth the effort because the result is easier to understand and work with. ["Are you someone with a passion for taking on big challenges? Are you interested in large-scale, highly distributed systems? Are you tired of maintaining or fixing someone else’s software and instead want to build? If so, then Oracle's Cloud Infrastructure team is for you.\xa0", 'Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'You are the builder here. You will be part of a team of really smart, motivated, and diverse people and given the autonomy and support to do your best work. It is a dynamic and flexible workplace where you’ll belong and be encouraged.', 'Tasks:', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with RESTful Web Services or cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure a plus', 'We offer unique opportunities for smart, hands-on Software Development Engineers with the expertise and passion to solve difficult problems in distributed, public cloud services.\xa0At every level, our Software Development Engineers have a significant technical and business impact designing and building innovative new systems to power our customer’s business critical applications.\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement high quality code, review code written by your peers', 'We are looking for a Senior Development Engineer with a background in distributed systems and cloud services to join our rapidly growing software engineering team in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.\xa0The services we build will be central to the success of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and will require innovation that is both architecturally broad and deep down the stack.\xa0', 'As a Senior Development Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building and operating components and services that will range from big data collection and analysis, storage replication to highly distributed control planes; including compute, security, infrastructure, networking, storage and others. You will have the opportunity to work on both architecturally broad and deep software systems engineering problems.\xa0You will own development of new components and features, from initial concepts through design, implementation, test, and operation. Your intelligence and expertise will result in a sense of accomplishment as you create new features as well as oversee their use by customers in a production environment.\xa0This is your chance to work on exciting new technology, on a new team in a hot market.\xa0Your work will be used by thousands of customers and some of the most sophisticated enterprises in the world.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with Senior Architects and Product Managers to define requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with the team to operate services that you have developed', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of data structures and design patterns', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Aptitude for problem solving', '\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Share responsibility with other team members to deploy new code to production.', 'Oracle is an Affirmative Action-Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veterans status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'At Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI), we build the future of the cloud for Enterprises as a diverse team of fellow creators and inventors. We act with the speed and attitude of a start-up, with the scale and customer-focus of the leading enterprise software company in the world.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with the team to document designs', '\xa0', 'Values are OCI’s foundation and how we deliver excellence. We strive for equity, inclusion, and respect for all. We are committed to the greater good in our products and our actions. We are constantly learning and taking opportunities to grow our careers and ourselves. We challenge each other to stretch beyond our past to build our future.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years’ experience in the design and implementation of complex software systems', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Write test automation for your code', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven experience with a major Object-Oriented Programming language such as Java or C++', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with massively scalable systems is a plus']

job_title: Software Engineer - Java, Product & Features - Relocate to Sydney
job_text: ['', 'Required Experience & Skills:', 'Identifying and addressing performance bottlenecks within the application and broader infrastructure', 'Commercial experience developing complex web applications', 'Role Responsibilities:', 'Your day to day activities will consist of solution design and hands-on software development – working closely with leads, designers, and product managers to deliver features and functionality to our customers all over the worldOnce you’ve settled in and have a comfortable grasp of the product, environment, and processes, you’ll be given more responsibility and start leveraging your previous experience — bringing new ideas to the table concerning everything from feature development, process improvement, and product suggestionsTaking charge of your career development by seizing opportunities to work across different teams, technologies, and rolesDeveloping and iterating on technical proposals – outlining how solutions will be structured and developedDeveloping solutions you’ve designed from the ground up through to deployment into productionIdentifying and addressing performance bottlenecks within the application and broader infrastructureBeing responsible for the reliability of your solution, including monitoring and responding to incidents. We care about reliability greatly as your code is going to be used by millions of peopleParticipating in design meetings, hiring interviews, and code reviewsPerformance debugging, benchmarking, and building awesome things in general', 'We mean it when we say we want to\xa0create a workplace that you love coming to. Our culture is unlike anywhere else and our offices are designed with workspaces for every mood, to help you do great work. At Canva you can be part of a company that is growing rapidly, building a product that users really love.', 'Benefits:', 'Canva is currently one of Australia’s hottest technology startups and has been the #1 ranked place to work in Australia.', 'We promote a warm and collaborative work environment where engineers set big goals and are given the tools and support to achieve them. We also invite our engineers to contribute to the direction their peers are taking with proactive pair ups for peer-reviewing of code as well as regular engineering forums for opinions and ideas to be heard. These practices ensure that knowledge is shared and releases are quick and efficient.', "Psst -We have two in-house chefs that whip up amazing breakfasts and lunches for the whole team - check out what's cooking at: https://instagram.com/canvalife", 'Pet-friendly offices', 'That you’re happy to roll the sleeves up and dive into java.util.concurrent from time to time 🙂', 'Competitive salary, plus equity options', 'Performance debugging, benchmarking, and building awesome things in general', 'Taking charge of your career development by seizing opportunities to work across different teams, technologies, and roles', 'Free Gym and Yoga', "Commercial experience developing complex web applicationsMost of our code is in Java, but we're pragmatic - we'll use whatever makes the most sense to complete a task (previous experience with other languages is great!)Firmly grounded computer science and engineering fundamentals including concurrency, multithreading, data structures, solution design, architecture, and design patterns. You’d be surprised how often these things come up here at Canva!That you’re happy to roll the sleeves up and dive into java.util.concurrent from time to time 🙂Working collaboratively with team members and communicating effectively", 'In-house chefs that cook delicious breakfast and lunch for us each day', "At Canva, our mission is to democratize design and empower creativity and visual expression for every person, on every platform. Since launch in April 2013, our user base has grown exponentially, amassing over 15 million monthly active users in over 190 different countries, making us one of the world's fastest-growing technology companies. As of today, we've achieved profitability, and the company is valued over USD$3.2 Billion, which comfortably prepares us for the next phase of growth and development.", 'Working collaboratively with team members and communicating effectively', 'Competitive salary, plus equity optionsFlexible working hours, we mean it when we say we value work-life balanceIn-house chefs that cook delicious breakfast and lunch for us each dayFree Gym and YogaGenerous parental leave policyPet-friendly officesWe offer a full relocation package (including visa)', 'Flexible working hours, we mean it when we say we value work-life balance', 'We offer a full relocation package (including visa)', "One of our core values at Canva, “Being a force for good” means we are actively working towards a world that isn't just good for a small few, but one that’s good for everyone. We believe deeply that bringing together diversity of thoughts, perspectives, and expression is key for building the best product for our equally diverse community. To achieve this, we need to constantly work towards making Canva the best place to work, for everyone.", 'Generous parental leave policy', 'Being a Force for good:', 'Your day to day activities will consist of solution design and hands-on software development – working closely with leads, designers, and product managers to deliver features and functionality to our customers all over the world', "Finally - you're probably curious about our technology stack. At a high level, Canva's backend is powered by a set of services (some micro, some not-so-micro) built primarily in Java, hosted on Linux, sitting on AWS. We also sprinkle in some powerful open-source libraries and tools (have a look at finagle), as well as bespoke components to power some of the magic.", 'Developing and iterating on technical proposals – outlining how solutions will be structured and developed', "Most of our code is in Java, but we're pragmatic - we'll use whatever makes the most sense to complete a task (previous experience with other languages is great!)", '\xa0', 'Being responsible for the reliability of your solution, including monitoring and responding to incidents. We care about reliability greatly as your code is going to be used by millions of people', 'Software engineering is the core of who we are at Canva. The Canva code base was built to scale from day one. This has allowed for a unique environment where engineers spend most of their time optimizing performance and releasing new features rather than fixing legacy code. With an adherence to fundamentals and first principles, the team strives to use the most appropriate tools for the tasks at hand, aiming to strike that carefully measured balance between getting things done and long-term maintainability of the code base and supporting infrastructure.', 'Participating in design meetings, hiring interviews, and code reviews', 'Firmly grounded computer science and engineering fundamentals including concurrency, multithreading, data structures, solution design, architecture, and design patterns. You’d be surprised how often these things come up here at Canva!', 'Developing solutions you’ve designed from the ground up through to deployment into production', 'It is important to us that we create a workplace that you love coming to.', 'Once you’ve settled in and have a comfortable grasp of the product, environment, and processes, you’ll be given more responsibility and start leveraging your previous experience — bringing new ideas to the table concerning everything from feature development, process improvement, and product suggestions']

For our w2 consultants, we offer a great benefits package that includes Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits, 401k with company matching, and life insurance.', 'About Eliassen Group:', 'Experience building pipelines to automate high-volume and real-time traffic routes.Experience with vendor APIs and delivery services that support critical operational and analytical applications of the CDN.Experience building robust tools that are used by our internal business operations, stakeholders and partners.Experience continuously integrating and shipping code into cloud Production environments to manage platforms.Experience with build automation leveraging existing APIs and CLI toolsExperience with CDNs (Akamai or Cloudfront preferred).\xa0\xa0', 'Experience building robust tools that are used by our internal business operations, stakeholders and partners.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Working directly with Product Owners and partners to deliver a CDN pipeline and integrating it with multiple endpoints for validation in a collaborative and agile environment', 'Support and production deployment for the services owned by team.', 'Requirements:', 'Helping to protect from DDoS to targeted cyber attacks and helping to reinforce our front door.']

Our amazing engineering team investigates points of failure in the technology of companies we acquire, replaces them with modern tech, bringing these brands into 2020. Our aggressive growth strategy brings new challenges for each acquisition, and our team of experts are always ready to make impactful changes the moment the deal is done. Through this process, we have already saved over 800 jobs (and counting) and iconic brands such as Z Gallerie, One Kings Lane, DirectBuy, and Sur La Table.', 'Top performers become technical owners/architects of our SaaS microservices.\xa0', 'About CSC Generation:\xa0\xa0', 'As a Software Engineer,\xa0you will collaborate with us to:', 'Have experience with our tech stack: AWS (ie: Then keep reading!\xa0", 'Role Description:', 'Architect and design greenfield projects solving a single problem\xa0', 'Mentor other members of the engineering team in performance, scalability, and engineering best practices\xa0', 'Believe in finding the best solution, not just one that works\xa0', 'Are capable of being the technical owner of an internally facing consumer microservice product\xa0', "Can work on both frontend and backend components (if you're stronger in frontend or backend, we'd still like to hear from you)\xa0Are capable of being the technical owner of an internally facing consumer microservice product\xa0Have experience with our tech stack: AWS (ie: Lambda,\xa0ElastiCache, CloudFront,\xa0CodePipeline), Node.js, React.js\xa0Believe in ownership throughout the entire software lifecycle, not only to the next handoff\xa0Believe in finding the best solution, not just one that works\xa0"]

job_title: Full Stack Software Engineer II (Application Software)
job_text: ['', 'The Operations team spends up to 50% of their time keeping our business unblocked by triaging issues that arise, mitigating, and resolving root causes accordingly.', 'FULL STACK SOFTWARE ENGINEER II (APPLICATION SOFTWARE)', 'Expertise in designing software systems', ' 4+ years of rigorous experience building single page web applications Expertise in designing software systems Expertise in testing and infrastructure Expertise in profiling and improving application performance ', ' Must be willing to work long hours and weekends as needed ', 'Maintain highest standards of excellence, never settle for the status quo', 'To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, including the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) you must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3), or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. Learn more about the ITAR here. ', 'ITAR REQUIREMENTS:', 'Expertise in profiling and improving application performance', 'Act as a responsible engineer for various software products', 'The Starlink Manufacturing program is responsible for software that accelerates the production of hardware for the Starlink network. ', '4+ years of rigorous experience building single page web applications', ' The Build and Launch program is responsible for software that accelerates Dragon, Falcon, and Starship production. The Build Reliability team is responsible for software that helps Build Reliability engineers within SpaceX make sure that what we build is durable, high quality, predictable, and safe. The Operations team spends up to 50% of their time keeping our business unblocked by triaging issues that arise, mitigating, and resolving root causes accordingly. The Starlink Constellation program is responsible for software that helps Starlink network operators manage our satellite constellation and ground networks. The Starlink Consumer program is responsible for software that allows Starlink customers to get information about Starlink, order, track their shipment, and manage their account. The Starlink Manufacturing program is responsible for software that accelerates the production of hardware for the Starlink network.  ', 'Own all aspects of software engineering and product development', 'Build highly reliable software solutions that may be used by users across SpaceX', '2+ years of experience in full stack development', "Deep dive into your users' problems, find efficient solutions", " Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development experience OR 4+ years of experience building software 2+ years of experience in full stack development ", 'Provide strong technical leadership, focus on continuous improvement', 'The Build Reliability team is responsible for software that helps Build Reliability engineers within SpaceX make sure that what we build is durable, high quality, predictable, and safe.', 'The Starlink Constellation program is responsible for software that helps Starlink network operators manage our satellite constellation and ground networks.', 'Track usage of Applications and features and suggest/implement features to improve them', 'Expertise in testing and infrastructure', 'The Starlink Consumer program is responsible for software that allows Starlink customers to get information about Starlink, order, track their shipment, and manage their account.', 'Seek out faults within our application suite or ERP suite and implement solutions to improve', 'ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS:', 'Must be willing to work long hours and weekends as needed', "Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development experience OR 4+ years of experience building software", ' To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, including the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) you must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3), or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. Learn more about the ITAR here.  ', " Build highly reliable software solutions that may be used by users across SpaceX Own all aspects of software engineering and product development Act as a responsible engineer for various software products Maintain highest standards of excellence, never settle for the status quo Deep dive into your users' problems, find efficient solutions Provide strong technical leadership, focus on continuous improvement Seek out faults within our application suite or ERP suite and implement solutions to improve Track usage of Applications and features and suggest/implement features to improve them ", 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES: ', 'The Build and Launch program is responsible for software that accelerates Dragon, Falcon, and Starship production.', 'PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:']

['', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Experience using Linux', 'Bachelor’s degree in a Computer Science related field, or equivalent work experience', 'working with and for each other', 'Experience with containerization technologies like Kubernetes, Docker, Helm', '3-5 years’ experience in building large-scale, distributed systems in JavaStrong technical skills in design, coding, debugging, documentation, and testing software components and systemsUnderstanding of multi-tier architecture, web-based development, and service-oriented architectureExperience using LinuxKnowledge of modern engineering best practices with a focus on observability and reliabilityBachelor’s degree in a Computer Science related field, or equivalent work experience', 'company of which we can all be proud', "Work closely with Bottomline product development teams to expand knowledge and usage of Bottomline's observability platforms", 'What will make you successful:', 'Experience with Java 8+ and frameworks like SpringExperience with technologies like Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Prometheus, GrafanaExperience with Python developmentExperience with containerization technologies like Kubernetes, Docker, HelmExperience with public cloud providers like AWS, GCP, or Azure', 'We have an opening for a dynamic and self-motivated Software Engineer on our Site Reliability Engineering team; we are seeking someone who can thrive in a very fast-paced SaaS-based environment. The Software Engineer will work directly with our product development teams in an effort to increase our instrumentation coverage across our products and services.', 'This position can be based out of an open location within the US', '3-5 years’ experience in building large-scale, distributed systems in Java', 'delight our customers\xa0', "Design, Implement, test and deliver maintainable, performant code to increase the observability of Bottomline's offerings", 'Strong technical skills in design, coding, debugging, documentation, and testing software components and systems', 'Understanding of multi-tier architecture, web-based development, and service-oriented architecture', "Design, Implement, test and deliver maintainable, performant code to increase the observability of Bottomline's offeringsWork closely with Bottomline product development teams to expand knowledge and usage of Bottomline's observability platformsAdd instrumentation to our product code to help us understand how our services are performingAbility to see past how things are currently done to come up with new ways of solving complex problems", 'Experience with public cloud providers like AWS, GCP, or Azure', 'Experience with technologies like Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Prometheus, Grafana', 'delight our customers', 'How you’ll contribute:', '\xa0', 'Add instrumentation to our product code to help us understand how our services are performing', 'Ability to see past how things are currently done to come up with new ways of solving complex problems', 'Experience with Python development', 'Bottomline is at the forefront of digital transformation.\xa0We are a growing global market leader uniquely equipped to address the changing needs of how businesses pay and get paid.\xa0Our culture of\xa0working with and for each other\xa0enables us to\xa0delight our customers.\xa0We empower our teams to think like owners driving customer delight, helping them grow their business and win in their markets.', 'You’ll love Bottomline because in everything we do we seek to\xa0delight our customers\xa0and we are passionate about building a\xa0company of which we can all be We have sites across North America, including Des Moines, Iowa and abroad. This role would require relocating every 2 – 3 years, on average.\xa0Candidates should be flexible with respect to work locations.\xa0', 'FAST may also consider graduates from other areas of study when supplemented with technical experience or aptitude. Candidates should also possess strong communication skills.\xa0', 'MS Visual Basic.NET', "Candidates should possess a minimum of a Bachelor's degree in:", ' FASTie!', 'FAST-ie \\’faeste\\ noun', 'MS Visual Basic.NETOracle DBMS or MS SQL Server', 'Exposure to specific technology is not required; however, experience in the following areas is desirable:', 'If the description below speaks to you, take 5 minutes (seriously, only 5 minutes) to apply!', 'FASTie', 'Computer Science', 'Mathematics', '3', 'Congratulations on exploring your career opportunities with FAST and taking the first step to becoming a FASTie! A FASTie? Yes, a FASTie.', '\xa0', 'Des Moines, Iowa ', '2', 'Computer/Management Information Systems, or', '1. an energetic, intelligent, enthusiastic person who works at Fast Enterprises. 2. a person dedicated to modernizing government technology to better serve the general public. 3. someone who is open to adventure and wants to experience new places around the world. 4. someone who enjoys collaboration with clients and camaraderie with teammates while solving business and technology problems.', '4', 'To meet the needs of our employees, we provide competitive benefits packages in each of our business locations around the world.']

['', 'The Role', 'Design rapid test iteration framework for developers to use for quick, at-desk spot checks', 'Develop “real world” playback mechanism for field data, integrating with existing Tesla data systems', 'Multithreaded software development experience', '\xa0BS or MS in EE/CE/CS, or the equivalent in experience with evidence of exceptional ability', 'Expertise testing devices and debugging hardware (oscilloscope, logic analyzer, DMM)', 'Preferred: Experience with FPGA or HDL (Verilog, VHDL)', 'As an Embedded Software Engineer on the Battery Management System (BMS) Team within our Vehicle Firmware organization, you will have the opportunity to accelerate the delivery of quality Tesla products to consumer markets.\xa0 You will be responsible for production code as well as architecting, designing, and implementing firmware validation procedures, equipment, and automation regarding high voltage systems.  Your effort to create and spin up various automated validation infrastructures will have a direct impact on the reliability and robustness of the Tesla products as well as the customer experience.\xa0 The Tesla battery team is extremely focused on the quality of users’ indicators (i.e. range, SOC, power, etc.) which directly plays into the overall experience and the safety of the system as a whole.  The team strives to create robust, efficient firmware and your responsibility is to ensure the code quality extremely high.  You will work within the development and integration teams to create innovative automated test systems and implement tests are on these platforms.\xa0 These systems explore and validate the performance capabilities of our hardware and firmware. You will also play an important role in our future technologies roadmap, including firmware support for new products, packs, cells, etc. We have openings for engineer, senior software engineer and staff software engineer levels.', 'Work with various cross-functional teams to develop requirements for new BMS features, diagnostics, algorithms, etc', 'Develop behavior models for various sub ['', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'About You:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'Our Team:', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About Us:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'What We Look For:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.']

['', 'WHAT’S REQUIRED?\xa0', 'Enhance our system to meet both current and future technological needs', 'Our SaaS applications are powered by Ember.js on the front end and Java EE 8 on the back endWe utilize Amazon AWS infrastructure to host our application servers (Java, Python) and database servers (MySQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB)', 'Jelli is looking for a Backend Software Engineer to help us enhance our industry-leading programmatic audio advertising platform and audio initiatives. It is our mission to innovate and allow people to enjoy more audio by providing platform technology that supports free listening and deeper engagement. We are searching for team members who love to get their hands dirty and thrive in fast-paced environments.', 'WHAT YOU’LL DO ON AN AVERAGE DAY', 'Positive attitude and a willingness to learn and grow', 'Work on APIs, asynchronous calculations, and data processing within the Jelli ecosystem\xa0', 'Fully stocked kitchen with coffee, snacks, and endless beverages to keep you fueled and well-fed', 'Experience with Source Control systems (Git preferred)', 'Experience with rapid release cycles and/or continuous deployment\xa0', 'In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to enhance our system to meet both current and future technological needs. ['', '-\tBe able to do shift work during mission.', '-\tRelational database experience with an understanding of SQL.', '-\tPrevious experience/proficiency with tools/languages such as XML, Perl, etc.', '-\tSupport the development of database-related software tools.', 'An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, Qwaltec is committed to hiring a diverse and talented workforce. For more information, visit qwaltec.com.', ' ', 'The OSAM-1 mission is a Goddard Space Flight Center Exploration and In-Space Services (NExIS) Projects Division managed mission. OSAM-1 is a robotic servicing mission designed to refuel a Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite. It contains 3 elements: the Flight Element comprised of the OSAM-1 Servicing Vehicle (RSV) and development testbeds, the Ground Element comprised of the systems required to conduct satellite operations and their supporting networks and facilities, and the Launch Element comprised of the Launch Vehicle and supporting facilities and services. NExIS is responsible for the design, engineering, development, test and operations of the OSAM-1 Mission through an integrated team at GSFC. The Servicing Payload design, development and RSV integration will be conducted at GSFC.', '-\tSupport other duties as assigned.', '-\tProvide support during database installation and testing of post deployment checkout.', '-\tBecome the Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the verification and validation of satellite databases to support the Flight Operation Team (FOT).', '-\tSupport the FOT in meetings with vendors with regards to database contents. This includes coordinating with spacecraft, instrument, and ground system vendors.', 'Qwaltec is seeking a Satellite Database Engineer on the NASA GSMO II contract in support of the On-Orbit Servicing, Assembly and Manufacturing mission 1 (OSAM-1) program at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC). The position is located in Greenbelt, MD.', 'Qwaltec is a Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) that specializes in space systems operations. We provide expertise in operations and engineering, mission readiness, technical training, and systems engineering for satellite mission control centers. Our vision is to make a difference on and off the planet, by focusing as much on our customers and team members as we do on the mission. We strive for excellence and accountability, and we do everything we can to exceed expectations while acting with integrity and compassion. We invest in relationships, and we value openness, honesty, and fairness in all our endeavors. ', '-\tMust be able to pass a Government background investigation and clearance, requiring US citizenship.', "-\tBachelor's degree and 5 years or more related experience; Masters and 3 years or more related experience.", '-\tHave a basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure. ', 'Primary responsibilities include the following:', '-\tSupport the FOT throughout mission.', '-\tSpacecraft subsystems experience in operations or I&T.', '-\tCoordinate with NASA Integration and Test (I&T) engineers to understand developments during spacecraft assembly.', 'About Qwaltec', '-\tMS Office skills required.', '-\tInterface with other spacecraft Subsystem SMEs as well as Spacecraft and Instrument SMEs for database feedback.', 'PM20']
