We have a highly engaged community of over 40 million homeowners who leverage our technologies to find inspiration for their next home project, connect with over 2.5 million home design and remodeling professionals and discover products in the Houzz Shop.', 'Flexible paid time off', 'Benefits And Perks', 'Experience developing consumer facing features for millions of consumersExperience with page speed optimization a plusFamiliarity with Node.js and PHP developmentExperience with coaching and hiring junior engineersFamiliarity with NoSQL databases and Lucene/Solr a plus6+ years experience', 'Join Houzz in revolutionizing the home remodeling and design industry and have an impact on the more than 40 million homeowners who use our platform every month and the 2.5 million-plus home professionals around the world who are active on the site. Houzz has been named one of the most innovative companies in the world by CNBC and others, and is backed by top venture capitalists. At Houzz, you can help drive the future of an industry worth $1.2 trillion in the U.S. and Europe alone.', 'About The Role', 'Houzz is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', 'Healthy at Houzz program', 'Familiarity with NoSQL databases and Lucene/Solr a plus', 'Our team members play a key role in guiding the direction of our company and are able to work across multiple groups to implement fresh ideas that allow Houzz to be the industry leader. If you are interested in applying your passion to create products that will transform the lives of millions of people who are designing, remodeling and decorating their homes, welcome to Houzz.', 'What You’ll Do', 'If you are a California resident applying for a job, you consent to our California Job Applicant Privacy Notice', "Ideally, You'll Also Have", 'Experience with coaching and hiring junior engineers', 'Independence, self-direction and experience owning complete products and features', 'An ability to work on fast paced, data-driven projects', 'A B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. in Computer Science or equivalent', 'We’re a Family ', 'Medical, dental, vision and pet insurance', 'At a Minimum, We’d Like You to Have', 'We Build the Future', 'Employee assistance program', 'As a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer, you will work on all parts of our web application, its libraries, widgets and custom features. You will work across the entire web stack, developing with MySQL, Lucene/Solr, Redis, PHP, and Node.js, and leveraging a strong understanding of OOP as well as Javascript and CSS.', 'Competitive salary', 'Maternity/paternity leave program', 'Commuter benefits', '401k retirement savings plan', '6+ years experience', 'Familiarity with Node.js and PHP development']

job_text: ['', '3+ years of experience as a software engineer', 'Work with and help lead a large engineering team in a Squad-based model.Collaborate with design, product managers, and testers to help define and architect efficient, reliable, and maintainable web services and supporting systems.Be involved with all aspects of the SLDC - from prioritizing, planning, defining, scoping, architecting, implementing, testing, launching, debugging, and supporting.Write high-quality, maintainable code and automated tests to support the team the product.Work closely with a Consumer Care team and other quality partners to ensure the integrity and customer happiness of a product that is near and dear to its users.Build and implement robust monitoring and alerting systems to ensure high-uptime for features.Engage and collaborate with third parties to integrate with industry-leading data and services.Help refine how the team and group can work together more effectively through Agile processes such as retrospective meetings.Work with the latest technologies for building web applications - AWS cloud services, Spring Boot, React, Redux, NodeJS.', 'Be involved with all aspects of the SLDC - from prioritizing, planning, defining, scoping, architecting, implementing, testing, launching, debugging, and supporting.', 'Help refine how the team and group can work together more effectively through Agile processes such as retrospective meetings.', 'Work with the latest technologies for building web applications - AWS cloud services, Spring Boot, React, Redux, NodeJS.', 'About The Role', 'A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or other related field (or comparable experience)', 'Build and implement robust monitoring and alerting systems to ensure high-uptime for features.', 'About The Team', 'Proficient with an object oriented language such as Java, C#, or Objective-C.', 'Work with and help lead a large engineering team in a Squad-based model.', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', 'Engage and collaborate with third parties to integrate with industry-leading data and services.', 'Write high-quality, maintainable code and automated tests to support the team the product.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or other related field (or comparable experience)3+ years of experience as a software engineerA record of delivering, launching, and supporting quality software in both IC and management rolesExperience with web frameworks such as NodeJS and Spring Boot (or equivalent)Proficient with an object oriented language such as Java, C#, or Objective-C.Experience with web-development languages, frameworks, and tools: HTML, Sass, Less, styled-components, React, Redux, GraphQL', 'A record of delivering, launching, and supporting quality software in both IC and management roles', 'Work closely with a Consumer Care team and other quality partners to ensure the integrity and customer happiness of a product that is near and dear to its users.', 'Collaborate with design, product managers, and testers to help define and architect efficient, reliable, and maintainable web services and supporting systems.', 'Experience with web-development languages, frameworks, and tools: HTML, Sass, Less, styled-components, React, Redux, GraphQL', 'Experience with web frameworks such as NodeJS and Spring Boot (or equivalent)']

['', 'Job Description', ' Hands on experience in developing applications using machine learning ', ' Master’s degree in computer science  Hands on experience in developing applications using machine learning  Experienced in working in an agile software development environment ', ' 8+ years of experience in C++ and/or java programming and object oriented design principles ', ' Partner with product management in suggesting and clarifying product requirements ', 'Minimum Qualifications', ' Drive innovation and research, technical analysis and prototyping to solve DLP content inspection challenges  Design and develop customer delighting features  Partner with product management in suggesting and clarifying product requirements  Communicate and collaborate with engineering teams, architects, and product management  Proactively look for ways to make DLP solution better  Mentor junior engineers on the team ', ' If you are a first time user, please create your candidate login account before you apply for a job. (Click Sign In > Create Account) If you already have a Candidate Account, please Sign-In before you apply.Job DescriptionWe are looking for an exceptionally talented software engineer who can work on Symantec’s DLP detection team. If selected, you will be a part of a highly driven and focussed team, that owns and develops features for the central policy engine that powers Symantec’s DLP solution on millions of endpoints and machines. You will be deeply involved in the research and innovation required to develop the next generation of content inspection techniques, image matching/recognition techniques and content classification techniques. You will work on pushing the envelope of scalability and low latency of the high performance policy engine even further. You will be given ownership of complex development projects and will be responsible for end to end delivery of features with highest level of quality. ['', 'POSITION REQUIREMENTS', '4 years of experience in Infrastructure administration or support role. Applicant should have experience in IT systems administration and process management.', "\ufeffAssociate's Degree in Computer related discipline and/or an IT certification in an applicable field - Preferred", 'DESCRIPTION', 'This position will expose the candidate to all server based operating systems (Linux, Windows) at Oasis, a Paychex Company and will require the development of skills to support, administer, and engineer cross-platform OS solutions.', "The candidate will be exposed to Continuous Delivery concepts such as Version Control, Continuous Integration, Testing (smoke, sanity, regression), Automation, and Orchestration as a means to deliver and support IT systems at Paychex. Technologies like Git, Artifactory, ServerSpec, Puppet, Ansible, and many more are the means to achieve our organizations 'as code' goals and objectives. Scripting (Bash, Powershell), and non-scripting (Ruby, Python, Go) languages are leveraged to extend features/functionality within our current toolsets and further our self-service, automation, and orchestration capabilities and services. The candidate will leverage the latest technologies from Cisco, Dell/EMC, Docker, Google, Microsoft, Red Hat, VMware, and many Open Source projects in our IT environment that are critical to delivering Paychex's IT infrastructure services. The candidate will be integrated into DevOps teams (Delivery Teams) with Software Developers and Testers, Build and Release Engineers, Solution Leads, Scrum Masters, and many more, responsible for delivering new products, features/functionality, and remediating defects for Paychex's Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions.", "\ufeffAssociate's Degree in Computer related discipline and/or an IT certification in an applicable field - Preferred4 years of experience in Infrastructure administration or support role. Applicant should have experience in IT systems administration and process management.", '\ufeff']

['', 'About Convex\xa0', '- Generous parental leave policy', 'The Role', 'From an engineering perspective, every commercial property means massive data sets – and demanding performance and architecture requirements for your features to be put through.\xa0Geospatial data often requires GIS techniques to wrangle datasets – something different than the average SQL join.\xa0Data on virtually every commercial property in the US means a chance to see the country by way of satellite imagery, property boundaries, and several hundred other data elements we have already developed.\xa0\xa0', 'Work in the heart of a business with multiple partner teams to build cross-functional customer solutions', 'Our market is under the radar, but massive and ubiquitous commercial services industry. Our customers are responsible for the air we breathe, the water we drink, and the lighting, safety, security, and dozens of other privileges that we are incredibly fortunate to take for granted in buildings across all of America.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience building geospatial services and datasets, such as maps data\xa0', '5+ years of software backend/data engineering experience, including familiarity with data modeling, ETL, schema and system design, planning, implementation, maintenance, and documentation.\xa0', 'Convex is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Professional development experience in Python/Pandas, Java, Go, and SQL', 'It would be nice if you have:', 'Design and implement reusable solutions and architectures for data sharing and processing use cases', 'Support and improve our multi-tenant data pipeline, processes, infrastructure, and stack', 'Masters or Ph.D. in Computer Science or related field', 'To all recruitment agencies: Convex does not accept agency resumes. Convex is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.', '- Medical and dental insurance', 'Hands-on experience building Spark applications or similar Big Data pipelines / frameworks / services (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Kafka, Presto, Beam, Parquet, Avro etc.)\xa0', "At Convex (YC W19), we’re building the leading B2B full-stack software platform for the $400bn+ commercial services market. It's a 100-year-old industry impacting millions of people every day. We already work with some of the largest enterprise companies in the sector and were one of the fastest growing companies in the Winter 2019 YC batch. Our team is a unique mix of industry veterans from Carrier, Siemens, and Honeywell as well as founders from MIT, Harvard, and Georgia Tech. Based in San Francisco, our investors include Emergence Capital, 1984 Ventures, UP2398, Liquid2 (Joe Montana), YCombinator, the founders of PlanGrid, and others.", 'Sound knowledge about database concepts such as transactions, indexing, concurrency', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer / Data Architect to build scalable platforms that enable efficient data movement within Convex across various sources, sinks, and support continuous data integration and processing with external enterprise systems via secure APIs and connectors.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience5+ years of software backend/data engineering experience, including familiarity with data modeling, ETL, schema and system design, planning, implementation, maintenance, and documentation.\xa0Professional development experience in Python/Pandas, Java, Go, and SQLExperience with large-scale distributed storage and database systems (SQL or NoSQL, e.g. Postgres, Cassandra, Hadoop, HDFS)Sound knowledge about database concepts such as transactions, indexing, concurrencyHighly analytical, passionate about data quality and availabilityEffective communicator; able to help drive data engineering roadmap and keep stakeholders updated', 'You will have a chance to:', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience', 'Experience identifying and solving major architectural problems', '- Commuter benefits', 'At Convex, data is not an incidental byproduct of our app.\xa0The data team is not a support function or an experimental lab.\xa0Data is the star of our app, and the data team is at the heart of our business.\xa0\xa0', "Our product, Atlas, provides rich data on virtually every commercial property in the country (and all of the workflow software built on top of that to make it useful).\xa0Think Redfin for every commercial property, with Salesforce functionality to organize and track your work.\xa0For our users who serve these properties, this data and workflow becomes their secret weapon; there's nothing else like it available in the market today.", '- Competitive salary and generous equity', 'Benefits', 'Highly analytical, passionate about data quality and availability', '- Join an early stage company with a lot of momentum, lead by a top tier leadership team and backed by top tier investors', 'Effective communicator; able to help drive data engineering roadmap and keep stakeholders updated', 'Create data governance models, including assets, relationships, domains, and communities', 'Experience with large-scale distributed storage and database systems (SQL or NoSQL, e.g. Postgres, Cassandra, Hadoop, HDFS)', 'Design and implement reusable solutions and architectures for data sharing and processing use casesSupport and improve our multi-tenant data pipeline, processes, infrastructure, and stackDrive end-to-end performance, scaling, observability, and monitoring of our platformsCreate data governance models, including assets, relationships, domains, and communitiesWork in the heart of a business with multiple partner teams to build cross-functional customer solutions', 'The Data Opportunity', '\xa0', '- Dog-friendly, renovated office in South Park with Bay views', '- Company outings & team retreats', 'Some understanding of data-science & machine-learning data use cases', 'Familiarity with API integrations and development on respective CRM platforms', 'Drive end-to-end performance, scaling, observability, and monitoring of our platforms', 'You have the following qualifications:', 'Because data is core to our product, your role is central to our entire business.\xa0Your data features in the product frequently close massive deals and drive best-in-class retention.\xa0Every customer experiences your improvements, in prod, immediately – this is not an internal BI role.', 'Masters or Ph.D. in Computer Science or related fieldExperience identifying and solving major architectural problemsExperience building geospatial services and datasets, such as maps data\xa0Hands-on experience building Spark applications or similar Big Data pipelines / frameworks / services (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Kafka, Presto, Beam, Parquet, Avro etc.)\xa0Familiarity with API integrations and development on respective CRM platformsSome understanding of data-science & machine-learning data use cases', 'Our customers live and work in almost every state in America.\xa0They include some of the largest enterprises in the country, like Siemens and Carrier, and smaller businesses we care just as deeply about.']

['', '\xa0', '-Apache Beam / Dataflow.', '-Cloud platform (preferably AWS & GCP).', '-Data / database related certifications.', '-Snowflake.', '-4+ years data engineering experience.', '-Apache Airflow / Cloud Composer.', '-SQL coding.', '-BigQuery.', '-Computer Science or related degree.', 'Desired:', '-Python.', 'Client located in\xa0Denver, Colorado\xa0(Glendale)\xa0is seeking a Senior Data Engineer\xa0for a direct hire position.\xa0This position will be part of a remote three person team responsible designing, implementing and supporting ETL / ELT processes.\xa0The ideal candidate will have experience building data systems from scratch, as well as maintaining those systems.', '-Docker and Kubernetes.', 'Required:']

['', 'Strong communications skills – must be a team player', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer/Software Engineering, Computer Information Systems, or another similar STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics) discipline or equivalent work experience preferred.', 'Solution-oriented', 'Experience in SaaS and healthcare highly preferred', "Superior technical acumen including solid knowledge of .NET, C#, SQL Server, ElasticSearch, JavaScript (ES5+), Modern JavaScript Frameworks, CSS, HTML5, SOA, Design Patterns & Practices, Software Testing, SDLCExperience putting JavaScript apps into production, especially with React and ReduxAbility to informally lead and teach others on modern JavaScript best practicesStrong communications skills – must be a team playerDemonstrated ability to proactively and confidently engage with stakeholders to gain an understanding of the business' evolving technical needsAbility to thrive in a fast paced, agile, and quickly changing business environmentInterest in providing technical review and mentorship to team membersExperience in SaaS and healthcare highly preferredSolution-oriented", 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer/Software Engineering, Computer Information Systems, or another similar STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics) discipline or equivalent work experience preferred.5+ years of relevant work experienceHealth information services and/or HIPPA technical background preferred.\xa0Post-Acute Healthcare experience a plus.Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work', '5+ years of relevant work experience', "Demonstrated ability to proactively and confidently engage with stakeholders to gain an understanding of the business' evolving technical needs", 'The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. You will be a lead developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products. You should excel in working with large-scale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skills.\xa0', 'Ability to thrive in a fast paced, agile, and quickly changing business environment', 'Experience putting JavaScript apps into production, especially with React and Redux', 'Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work', '\xa0', 'Health information services and/or HIPPA technical background preferred.\xa0Post-Acute Healthcare experience a plus.', 'Responsibilities', 'Superior technical acumen including solid knowledge of .NET, C#, SQL Server, ElasticSearch, JavaScript (ES5+), Modern JavaScript Frameworks, CSS, HTML5, SOA, Design Patterns & Practices, Software Testing, SDLC', 'Interest in providing technical review and mentorship to team members', 'Ability to informally lead and teach others on modern JavaScript best practices']

['', 'Work in a fun, casual, collaborative, team-oriented culture', 'Angular and Bootstrap on the front end', 'Be passionate about technology and demonstrate a willingness to tackle unfamiliar technical challenges', 'On the IVR/Call Center team, expect to roll up your sleeves and get involved from day one!\xa0You’ll be solving complex problems using AI and machine learning techniques using industry-leading speech processing tools. We like individuals that don’t need heavy direction, who use initiative and have an entrepreneurial spirit, that question the status quo, and can share ideas collaboratively with our team.\xa0Ultimately, we want someone who can help us develop awesome tools that revolutionize the way our members interact with our services.\xa0\xa0', 'Elasticsearch, Kibana, and Azure Application Insights for application monitoring', 'We like the following personality traits:\xa0Friendly, social, outgoing, positive, passionate, cool under pressure, detail-oriented, deadline oriented, quick learner, multi-tasker, great sense of humor.', 'We’re looking for people that love the opportunity to be involved in strategy and management at the top level, but also aren’t scared to get their hands dirty and do what needs to be done to make things happen! We move quickly, and our team doesn’t know the meaning of “not my job.” We want people that want to get things done and can check their ego at the door.', 'Be committed to the health and safety of our passengers', 'B.S. in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)4+ years full-stack development experience in a professional environment (Mid - Senior Level)Solid understanding of object oriented design, front-end frameworks, cloud computing platforms, common design patterns and core computer science conceptsSuccessfully used Agile methodologies to deliver in a fast-paced, changing landscapeExperience integrating third-party APIs and services (i.e., maps, AI/machine learning systems)Experience with Digital Communication Technologies\xa0Experience developing internal and customer-facing apps and websitesExperience troubleshooting production issues and providing production support', 'Experience with Digital Communication Technologies\xa0', 'Use technology to help people lead healthier lives', 'Freedom to try out new technologies to gauge fit for business needs', 'Veyo\xa0is using its platform and app-based transportation services to reinvent the medical logistics world. Our company is using technology to pioneer new operational models to help make transportation more powerful and more reliable for the healthcare industry.', 'Mentor junior engineers and believe that there are no dumb questions', 'Use technology to help people lead healthier livesWork with an incredibly talented, intelligent teamFreedom to try out new technologies to gauge fit for business needsEncouragement to grow professionally and personally – attend conferences, participate in interviews, give knowledge sharing presentations and demosWork in a fun, casual, collaborative, team-oriented culture', 'We thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position. This position is only for candidates legally allowed to work in the US. EOE.', 'Encouragement to grow professionally and personally – attend conferences, participate in interviews, give knowledge sharing presentations and demos', 'Successfully used Agile methodologies to deliver in a fast-paced, changing landscape', 'Angular and Bootstrap on the front endC# /.NET/ GO on the back endKubernetes deployment for new development with maintenance of Azure services including App Service, Azure SQL, PostgreSQL, Web Jobs, and Service BusElasticsearch, Kibana, and Azure Application Insights for application monitoringR, Python for machine-learning/AI development of our IVR system\xa0(desired)', 'Skills & Experience:', 'C# /.NET/ GO on the back end', 'Our Stack:', 'Be forward-thinking, experimental, creative, nimble, and data-driven', 'Solid understanding of object oriented design, front-end frameworks, cloud computing platforms, common design patterns and core computer science concepts', 'Experience troubleshooting production issues and providing production support', "What we'll expect from you:", 'Veyo is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.\xa0\xa0Additionally, Veyo participates in the\xa0E-Verify program\xa0for all locations.', '4+ years full-stack development experience in a professional environment (Mid - Senior Level)', 'We are currently looking for folks to join us on two of our teams:', 'Work with our product, design, and QA teams to improve processes, extend and implement APIs, and build efficient, long term solutions used by real passengers and drivers every day', "On Veyo's core platform team, you’ll jump in immediately as well! You will play a critical role in the organization and have the opportunity to collaborate with our talented group of engineers while working within a cross-functional team to optimize our dispatch and distribution algorithms. We value people who are self-starters and who know that when they see a problem, they must solve it. A commitment to teamwork, and a passion to constantly learn are absolute requirements.", 'Work cross-functionally and cross team to develop, release, maintain and support our services and applications in test and production environments', 'R, Python for machine-learning/AI development of our IVR system\xa0(desired)', 'Work with an incredibly talented, intelligent team', 'B.S. in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)', 'Experience developing internal and customer-facing apps and websites', 'Are you someone that pays attention to the details?\xa0That keeps learning? That is excited about exploring new AI techniques that are at the forefront of technology?\xa0We want to hear from you!\xa0\xa0', 'Experience integrating third-party APIs and services (i.e., maps, AI/machine learning systems)', 'Kubernetes deployment for new development with maintenance of Azure services including App Service, Azure SQL, PostgreSQL, Web Jobs, and Service Bus', 'Help craft the strategy and direction of the company and an industry', 'When you work at Veyo, you’re helping to solve one of the nation’s growing healthcare challenges -- ensuring patients get to and from their medical appointments, safely and on-time. We are using smart design and innovative technology to make patient transportation safer and more connected. In the process, we’re transforming the entire industry.', 'Be committed to the health and safety of our passengersHelp craft the strategy and direction of the company and an industryWork with our product, design, and QA teams to improve processes, extend and implement APIs, and build efficient, long term solutions used by real passengers and drivers every dayBe passionate about technology and demonstrate a willingness to tackle unfamiliar technical challengesBe forward-thinking, experimental, creative, nimble, and data-drivenMentor junior engineers and believe that there are no dumb questionsWork cross-functionally and cross team to develop, release, maintain and support our services and applications in test and production environments', 'What you can expect:']

To make sure all of the code that developers are writing is well tested and deployed correctly, we have a growing CI/CD system that leverages a hybrid cloud infrastructure based on Docker and Kubernetes to deal with increased capacity demand and load.', 'A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Math, or Physics from a top-tier college or university and at least 6 years or programming experience?Proficiency with Python, Bash and/or Go (expertise in at least 2 of them).\xa0Thorough understanding of Linux fundamentals and C++ compiling/linking/loading process.  is primarily a Linux shop.Deep knowledge of git, git branching, and git workflowsExperience with CI/CD frameworks such as Jenkins, Concourse, Travis, or CircleCIExperience with CMake, Conda, Gitlab/Github and Docker/Kubernetes (preferred)', 'Experience with CI/CD frameworks such as Jenkins, Concourse, Travis, or CircleCI', "The Development Tools team is responsible for the development, support and maintenance of tools and frameworks that help other developers build, test, release and deploy their products in a fast, efficient and scalable manner. job_text: ['', ' Offer to selected candidate will be made contingent on the results of applicable background checks ', 'Identifies opportunities to improve business practices and procedures through analytics and technology', 'Participates in technology acquisition projects and proofs of concept for the division; identifies use cases and business requirements, and helps vet possible solutions', 'Job Description:', 'Strong intellectual curiosity and drive for continuous improvement; able to take initiative and learn on the fly', 'Demonstrated proficiency with relevant programming languages, such as VBA, C#/Java, Selenium ,SAS, SQL, HTML, Python, etc. (languages may vary by department or division)', 'Job ID: ', 'Specialized Knowledge And Skill Requirements', 'Demonstrated advanced proficiency with business intelligence and collaboration software: Tableau, SharePoint, and Microsoft Office', 'Develops, tests, and deploys automated solutions and automated decision analytics to replace manual business processes', 'Creates and maintains solution documentation, both for end-users and internal reference. Supports automated solutions: responds to user help requests, troubleshoots issues, conducts root cause analysis, and enhances tools to avoid future issues Provides user support for key technology rules and technology-enabled processes (e.g. Tableau Server, SAS, SharePoint, Prophix, virtual servers/desktops) for the division; troubleshoots issues, working with I/S as necessary. Mentors and trains users on best practices for data visualization and maximizing value from technology infrastructure. Establishes and administers security access rules for divisional data and other information assets Identifies opportunities to improve business practices and procedures through analytics and technology Analyzes technology options to ensure alignment with short and long term strategies. Provides quantitative support and data-driven recommendations to business partners. Participates in technology acquisition projects and proofs of concept for the division; identifies use cases and business requirements, and helps vet possible solutions ', ' Strong written and verbal communication skills Strong organization and multi-tasking skills; able to manage self and projects Strong intellectual curiosity and drive for continuous improvement; able to take initiative and learn on the fly Demonstrated proficiency with relevant programming languages, such as VBA, C#/Java, Selenium ,SAS, SQL, HTML, Python, etc. (languages may vary by department or division) Demonstrated proficiency with data extraction from relational databases and big data repositories: Oracle, Greenplum, SQL Server, and Hadoop (technologies may vary by department or division) Demonstrated advanced proficiency with business intelligence and collaboration software: Tableau, SharePoint, and Microsoft Office ', 'Demonstrated proficiency with data extraction from relational databases and big data repositories: Oracle, Greenplum, SQL Server, and Hadoop (technologies may vary by department or division)', ' Offer to selected candidate is contingent on signing a non-disclosure agreement for proprietary information, trade secrets, and inventions ']

['', 'Qualifications: ', '\xa0', 'Ability to maintain a professional code of ethics regarding confidentiality of information and protecting rights of end-users and owners of data.', 'Preferred Education, Experience and Skills: ', 'Team player, positive attitude, and patient with users and team members. Ability to understand OOP, software patterns, use of frameworks, and framework services.', 'Ability to manage projects and communicate effectively with both technical and functional team members. Experience with full system software lifecycles for multiple concurrent projects, while also directly contributing to the coding effort.', 'Yale University considers applicants for employment without regard to, and does not discriminate on the basis of an individual’s sex, race, color, religion, age, disability, status as a veteran, or national or ethnic origin; nor does Yale discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity or expression.', "\ufeffWe invite you to discover the excitement, diversity, rewards and excellence of a career at Yale University. One of the country's great workplaces, Yale University offers exciting opportunities for meaningful accomplishment and true growth. Our benefits package is among the best anywhere, with a wide variety of insurance choices, liberal paid time off, fantastic family and educational benefits, a variety of retirement benefits, extensive recreational facilities, and much more.", 'Full stack developer working on a modular information system as part of a small development team for the Office of Environmental Health & Safety (EHS). Design, implement, document, test, maintain, and support the large modular information system, EHS Integrator, and other information systems, primarily using C#, SQL Server, and multiple UI technologies, running in Azure. Work closely with business process owners, users, and other stakeholders to analyze and design solutions to business problems, both independently and with other development team members. Design, implement, and document information system solutions. Provide ongoing system administration, maintenance, and user support for departmental information systems. Manage software development projects from analysis to deployment and end-user training. Collaborate closely with development team members on continuously improving core system functionality, strictly observing and enforcing system conventions and standards defined as a team. Provide system administration and operational support for all departmental information systems. Support users with patience and a positive attitude while balancing development and operational responsibilities. Coordinate and work with other internal/external departments/organizations that provide services to EHS, or that EHS provides services to, or has system integrations with. Design, implement, and maintain system integrations and ETL to and from other internal/external department/organization information systems and other data sources. Work with information security professionals on security design reviews for new applications/technologies.', 'Required Education and Experience:', "Bachelor's Degree in a related field and two years of related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience.", 'Five years of progressively more complex experience in developing and supporting large information systems. ASP.Net MVC strongly preferred, as well as Azure SQL Database, App Service, Functions, and other Azure services. Azure DevOps Git, Work Items, and Pipelines. Modern web, mobile UI technologies, and Microsoft technologies preferred.', 'Ability to balance development responsibilities with system operations, and user support, and switch to operational demands at any time to support the operations of EHS.', 'C# and SQLTeam player, positive attitude, and patient with users and team members. Ability to understand OOP, software patterns, use of frameworks, and framework services.Ability to manage projects and communicate effectively with both technical and functional team members. Experience with full system software lifecycles for multiple concurrent projects, while also directly contributing to the coding effort.Ability to maintain a professional code of ethics regarding confidentiality of information and protecting rights of end-users and owners of data.Ability to balance development responsibilities with system operations, and user support, and switch to operational demands at any time to support the operations of EHS.', 'C# and SQL']

['', 'You care about what you do.', 'A pipeline to process and provide versatile and quality data to support the business', 'About This Role', ' You have 8+ years of professional software engineering experience, working with a variety of technologies, and have increasingly impactful accomplishments You care about what you do. ', 'You have experience proposing, experimenting, and iterating, whether it be a new shiny technology or an arcane, ill-conceived data structure; our company may be new, but the health industry isn’t!', ' A search engine that connects members to the care they need when they need it. A generalized platform to communicate with people through multiple channels, including email, snail mail, push notifications, and SMS. Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers. ", "Become the expert on your team's business and technical domains.", 'Pay Transparency Policy', 'You care about what we do.', 'A search engine that connects members to the care they need when they need it.', 'Collaborate with other engineers on the team to improve technology and apply best practices.', 'Reasonable Accommodation', 'You have experience with technical contributions, improving the quality of what you create, and are excited to build fault-tolerant, and scalable software systems.', 'You have 8+ years of professional software engineering experience, working with a variety of technologies, and have increasingly impactful accomplishments', 'A system to price and adjudicate claims in real-time with startling accuracy.', 'Implement step-wise technical migrations of our existing services and applications.', 'What We’re Doing', 'Responsibilities', 'A platform to securely, and automatically makes electronic payments to providers.', 'A generalized platform to communicate with people through multiple channels, including email, snail mail, push notifications, and SMS.', 'Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers.', 'Requirements']

['', 'Drive features to successful delivery; Help to drive alignment and implement decisions in collaboration with Product and other internal teams as needed', "Building functionality within Vineti's core platform for cell and gene therapy orchestrationWork in a highly-collaborative, test-driven development environment that encourages pairing and knowledge sharingBe a key member of a scrum team, working closely with Product to implement, innovate, and build Vineti's core product featuresMentor and help other engineers reach their full potentialProactively identify issues and drive architecture discussions cross-functionallyDrive features to successful delivery; Help to drive alignment and implement decisions in collaboration with Product and other internal teams as needed", ' ', 'Proactively identify issues and drive architecture discussions cross-functionally', "Vineti creates advanced software for advanced therapies. We are a healthcare-tech company developing cloud-based software solutions that enable biopharmaceutical and life science companies to provide next generation personalized therapies safely, securely, seamlessly, and scalably. From the beginning, Vineti's founders have understood the challenges innovators face in developing personalized therapies. We are removing these barriers with technology that integrates the end-to-end supply chain of the process. Our technology makes it possible for patients with cancer, genetic disorders, and other serious health conditions to receive these breakthrough therapies.", 'Work in a highly-collaborative, test-driven development environment that encourages pairing and knowledge sharing', 'As a member of the Vineti team, we can promise you the opportunity to collaborate alongside smart and driven people, with endless opportunities to grow your many skills.', "What you'll be doing as a Senior Software Engineer on the Platform team:", 'Mentor and help other engineers reach their full potential', 'Senior Software Engineer', "We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer for our Platform engineering team. On the Platform team, you'll work with a scrum team of engineers focused on building functionality within Vineti's core platform for cell and gene therapy orchestration. You'll play a key role in creating a scalable, configurable enterprise SaaS platform that saves lives. This position is open to candidates in the Pacific Time Zone with proper work authorization.", "Building functionality within Vineti's core platform for cell and gene therapy orchestration", "Be a key member of a scrum team, working closely with Product to implement, innovate, and build Vineti's core product features"]

['', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', '-Advanced to Expert working knowledge of ANSI SQL or Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', 'POSITION:\xa0Senior Data Engineer', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', 'Education:', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', '-Perform Data Services benchmarking, enhancements, optimizations, and platform analytics', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', '-Experience with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau, QlikView/QlikSense, Microstrategy, or other Business Intelligence platforms.', '-Analytical', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0', '-Contribute to the definition and development of the overall data roadmap by making recommendations', '-Design database systems and develop tools for real-time and offline analytic processing', 'FLSA:\xa0Exempt', 'SCHEDULE:', '-1-year experience programing in C++, C#, or Python a plus', 'SCHEDULE:\xa0Standard business hours', '-Detail oriented', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present them in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', '-Standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needs', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB, Redshift, and Mesos is a plus', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience ", 'FLSA:\xa0', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0N/A', 'The Senior Data Engineer is responsible for designing and developing automated ETL processes for Business Intelligence reporting to facilitate business operations. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Spark, Scala, HBase, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a senior member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. It will be this person’s responsibility to perform code reviews, identify additional opportunities for efficiency, mentor team members, and be the subject matter expert for specific areas of the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW). Over time, these subject areas will be rotated to ensure each senior member gets an opportunity to have a full knowledge of the EDW.', 'POSITION:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', '-Design, develop, and test moderate to complex ETL processes using a variety of tools, which may include Transact-SQL, SSIS, Stored Procedures, -Functions, and existing ETL tool accelerators in Snowflake or SQL Server 2014 and later environments.', '-Determine methods and procedures for new or existing standards, operating procedures, and data processing tools.', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with Snowflake, MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB required', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', '-Integrate data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:', '-Interact cross-functionally with a variety of people, teams, and management. Work closely with analysts from sales, marketing, HR, and Finance, as well as product development, and data scientists, to identify opportunities and assess improvements of our products and services', '-Experience with public or hybrid cloud environments are a plus.', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', '-Independently design an effective and maintainable solution based on the gathered requirements that meet reliability, accuracy, and performance standards while also meeting or exceeding the user expectations', '-Passionate about data', '\xa0', '-Participate in research, development, and adoption of trends in big data, BI, and analytics', '-Quality driven', '-Minimum 5 years of experience with SQL required', '-Perform peer code reviews for other Seniors and Data Engineers, as well as train, mentor, and provide guidance to Data Engineers and other Data -Services and business users on processes and standards the Data Services group has established', '-Positive and creative attitude', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with database design and development required', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', '-Collaborate with various data providers to resolve data issues', '-Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and execute tasks across multiple projects with tight deadlines and aggressive goals.', '-Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Experience:', '-Produce and maintain accurate project documentation for moderate to complex ETL processes', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0']

Documentation of the work is essential.', '\xa0Self-motivated and able to work autonomously when necessary.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Fullstack - Developer Experience
job_text: ['', 'Bonus points:', 'Open source experience - as a maintainer/core contributor of open source projects', "Code and maintain our open source libraries (“SDK's”)", 'Google Cloud Platform, Kubernetes, Terraform, Kafka, Ansible, Consul, CircleCI, Rollbar', 'React, Webpack, Sass, ReduxPython,\xa0Node.jsMySQL, ElasticSearch, Redis, Clickhouse, MemcacheGoogle Cloud Platform, Kubernetes, Terraform, Kafka, Ansible, Consul, CircleCI, Rollbar', 'Benefits and perks:', 'Generous hardware, software, and home office set up allowance', 'Python,\xa0Node.js', 'React, Webpack, Sass, Redux', 'You have:', 'Twice yearly offsite in San Francisco (post COVID-19)', 'Conference and education budget', 'Expertise with Python and related frameworks (Django, Flask, Pyramid, etc.)\xa0', 'Experience with Node.js & Java\xa0', 'Involvement with your Developer Community, familiarity with best practices for Python, package management, and tools', 'Competitive salary and stock optionsGenerous hardware, software, and home office set up allowanceTwice yearly offsite in San Francisco (post COVID-19)Conference and education budgetInclusive team-oriented cultureHave fun and make an impact', 'Add new REST API features and implement on backend code', 'Open source experience - as a maintainer/core contributor of open source projectsExperience with Node.js & Java\xa0Experience with Rollbar in your personal or professional projects', 'MySQL, ElasticSearch, Redis, Clickhouse, Memcache', 'An attitude of continuous improvement and welcoming feedback', 'Competitive salary and stock options', 'We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate is extremely comfortable working on, designing, implementing, and debugging complex SDKs and APIs, effectively communicating technical content with Senior Engineers, and able to understand and design code for a high-scale, low-latency cloud infrastructure.\xa0', 'Help define the common specification that all libraries should adhere to, and work to implement that spec in each SDK', 'Experience with REST API design', 'Experience with Rollbar in your personal or professional projects', 'Have fun while releasing software used directly by thousands and indirectly by millions', 'A sense of accomplishment regarding the products you build and the impact they have for our customers', "Add new REST API features and implement on backend codeCode and maintain our open source libraries (“SDK's”)Help define the common specification that all libraries should adhere to, and work to implement that spec in each SDKWork with the Tech Lead for SDKs to implement new features in the SDK's and relay feedbackHave fun while releasing software used directly by thousands and indirectly by millions", 'A deep understanding of the things you work with, and you find ways to make them better', 'Inclusive team-oriented culture', 'Our tech stack:', "Work with the Tech Lead for SDKs to implement new features in the SDK's and relay feedback", '5+ years experience as a software engineerExpertise with Python and related frameworks (Django, Flask, Pyramid, etc.)\xa0Experience with REST API designInvolvement with your Developer Community, familiarity with best practices for Python, package management, and toolsA deep understanding of the things you work with, and you find ways to make them betterAn attitude of continuous improvement and welcoming feedbackA sense of accomplishment regarding the products you build and the impact they have for our customers', 'You will:', 'At Rollbar, our mission is to help developers build software quickly and painlessly. We are a ~80-person team based in San Francisco, Barcelona, and Budapest. Over 100,000 developers use our product to innovate faster and decrease time to market while maintaining best-in-class customer experience. Rollbar is used by some of the best engineering teams in the world, including Twilio, Salesforce, Zendesk, and Twitch.\xa0', 'Have fun and make an impact', '5+ years experience as a software engineer']

We have one open position. Please apply and we can discuss!', 'This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', ' Demonstrable proficiency in Python development and advanced SQL querying.', ' Demonstrated strength in data modeling, ETL development, data warehousing, data pipeline and data lake creation.', 'This is a Full Time/Direct Hire role for one of our amazing clients. You will be working with some of the brightest minds in industry.', ' Build and maintain scalable data pipelines for both batch and stream processing in a cloud-computing environment. Apply dimensional modeling to design tables and views that map business processes into an enterprise data model. Optimize database architecture by trading off storage and computation to achieve low cost and high performance. Build and support complex ETL infrastructure to deliver clean and reliable data to the organization. Support the development of new products and services via ingestion, processing, and formatting data for reporting and analytics. Interact face-to-face with business stakeholders, develop cooperative relationships, and acquire domain knowledge of the business. Proactively automate manual processes throughout the business for higher efficiency, robustness, and speed. Enforce production standards and governance best practices in the management of enterprise-level data, metrics, and reports.', ' Support the development of new products and services via ingestion, processing, and formatting data for reporting and analytics.', ' Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field (Masters or PhD preferred) Excellent communication and inter-personal skills. Versatile and quick learner with ability to pick up any new skills necessary to get the job done. Demonstrated strength in data modeling, ETL development, data warehousing, data pipeline and data lake creation. Extensive experience with cloud infrastructure and tools for AWS and GCP. Demonstrable proficiency in Python development and advanced SQL querying. Strong grasp of business elements and ability to convert requirements into database models and full-data pipeline systems. Experience with visualization and reporting tools, such as Looker and Tableau. 4-8 years of experience in data engineering or similar work. Full stack experience, including microservice and web app development. Knowledge of big data platforms, such as Hadoop and Spark.', ' Build and support complex ETL infrastructure to deliver clean and reliable data to the organization.', ' Excellent communication and inter-personal skills.', ' Strong grasp of business elements and ability to convert requirements into database models and full-data pipeline systems.', ' Versatile and quick learner with ability to pick up any new skills necessary to get the job done.', ' Apply dimensional modeling to design tables and views that map business processes into an enterprise data model.', 'Requirements']

['', 'Maintain transparent and up-to-date code to ensure business requirements and ETL logic match.', 'Implement data validation processes.', '4+ years of experience in analytics engineering, data engineering, business intelligence or technical data analytics role.', 'Proficient in using Python to manipulate data ', 'Maintain deliverables, projects and timelines for business stakeholders.', 'Experience', 'Advanced expertise in SQL (Redshift and PostgreSQL) and ETL optimization techniques within cloud based data warehouses.', ' Translate business requirements into performant data models, data visualizations, and ensure highly accurate and automated business reporting.', 'Make data model and ETL code improvements to improve pipeline efficiency and data quality.', ' Apply engineering best practices to design, build, and maintain critical pipelines to ensure operational reliability and modularity  Build upon our common data framework so that all data is accessible to analysts and data scientists throughout the company. Collaborate cross functionally with business users to gain an expert level understanding of business context.  Translate business requirements into performant data models, data visualizations, and ensure highly accurate and automated business reporting. Maintain transparent and up-to-date code to ensure business requirements and ETL logic match. Make data model and ETL code improvements to improve pipeline efficiency and data quality. Triage ad-hoc data issues as they arise while contributing to testing and tooling to improve data quality. Implement data validation processes. Collaborate with data engineers on infrastructure projects and advocate for (and emphasize) the business value of applications. Maintain deliverables, projects and timelines for business stakeholders. ', 'An understanding of the difference between SQL that works and performant SQL.', " Proficient in using Python to manipulate data  Excellent communication skills, particularly when explaining technical or complex matters to less technical stakeholders. Ability to leverage tools, business intuition, and attention to detail for data validation and QA. Passionate for building the best version of whatever you're working on. An understanding of the difference between SQL that works and performant SQL. Must love dogs (non-negotiable - you think we're kidding? Nope). ", 'Build upon our common data framework so that all data is accessible to analysts and data scientists throughout the company.', 'WHO ARE WE?', 'Excellent communication skills, particularly when explaining technical or complex matters to less technical stakeholders.', '4+ years in writing complex queries in SQL to unify data across multiple sources ', 'Collaborate with data engineers on infrastructure projects and advocate for (and emphasize) the business value of applications.', "Who We're Looking For", 'Experience with the command line and git required ', ' 4+ years of experience in analytics engineering, data engineering, business intelligence or technical data analytics role. 4+ years in writing complex queries in SQL to unify data across multiple sources  Experience with the command line and git required  Advanced expertise in SQL (Redshift and PostgreSQL) and ETL optimization techniques within cloud based data warehouses. Solid understanding of data warehouses and business intelligence tools such as Periscope, Domo, Looker as well as data pipeline management technologies with dependency checking (we use Airflow), schema design, and dimensional data modeling. Experience at a B2C businesses or subscription based company. Experience with Airflow is a major plus. ', 'Ability to leverage tools, business intuition, and attention to detail for data validation and QA.', 'Apply engineering best practices to design, build, and maintain critical pipelines to ensure operational reliability and modularity ', 'Solid understanding of data warehouses and business intelligence tools such as Periscope, Domo, Looker as well as data pipeline management technologies with dependency checking (we use Airflow), schema design, and dimensional data modeling.', 'KEY DUTIES ', "Passionate for building the best version of whatever you're working on.", 'Triage ad-hoc data issues as they arise while contributing to testing and tooling to improve data quality.', 'Experience at a B2C businesses or subscription based company.', 'Experience with Airflow is a major plus.', 'Skills & Qualifications', 'Collaborate cross functionally with business users to gain an expert level understanding of business context.', 'This position is a full-time position. BARK currently has offices in NYC and Columbus, Ohio, but for the right candidates working remotely is also an option. ['', "In this role, the successful candidate will need to understand all levels of requirements including direct customer negotiation and flow-down. Candidates must have the ability to work with design engineering to develop verification and validation requirements. Experience in the development and ownership of detailed CDRL's (CONOPS, Initialization, etc.) are also required. The ideal candidate will have a strong, multi-discipline technical background and will work directly with internal technical IPT's developing requirements and associated documentation, as well as take a lead role in collaborative requirements development with the customer and prime contractor.\xa0This is not a management/supervisor position.", '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience generating requirements using Model-Based Systems engineering and/or DOORS is preferred.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing systems and general engineering processes and procedures are a plus.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience as a lead engineer, project engineer, or IPT lead is required.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Function as Lead System Engineer for approved ECPs', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conduct Trade studies at the direction of Chief Engineer/PM', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS in Electrical Engineering, MS preferred.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lead Engineering Change Proposal (ECP) pre-approval efforts; proposed technical solution, cost & schedule ROM (including material), and alternate Course of Action analysis', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral, written, and presentation skills for interfacing with senior management and customers as well as mentoring other engineers.', 'Qualifications/ Requirements:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide Design/Integration Subject Matter Expertise on fielded ISR, Comms, or C2 Systems', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Verification and Validation requirements.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Active Secret Clearance • Existing DOD Secret', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing requirements for accredited systems is required.', 'Our client has a permanent full-time role in their Systems Engineering group with a background in ISR, Communications, and integration.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of seven years of experience in developing E/0 sensor, communication, and/or radar systems is required.', 'Specific Tasks:', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working knowledge in system-level development, requirements definition, analysis, and risk mitigation for complex systems used on accredited programs.', '\xa0', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Active Secret Clearance • Existing DOD Secret']

['', 'About Circle Media', 'Experience working outside of your comfort zone and taking initiativeExperience with test automation frameworks and writing automated testsProficient in source control systems, especially git', 'Reviews pull requests promptly', 'Completes development assignments on time with high qualityAnticipates technical challenges and propose/evaluate solutionsCollaborates with other teams to implement solutions effectivelyReviews pull requests promptlyInnovates on Circle productsResearches and proposes new technologiesMakes sure code is testable and well-testedKeeps tech debt in checkIdentifies problems with development processesProposes and implements new development processes and process improvementsProvides input with regards to technology strategyOn call rotation for production issues, along with the rest of engineering', 'Required Skills', 'Proposes and implements new development processes and process improvements', 'Software Engineer, Generalist', 'We pride ourselves on creating a work environment and culture that is flexible for all work styles and lifestyles. In the past we’ve enjoyed company hosted events such as summer picnics, bowling, and frequent team lunches (CA Fish Grill is our go-to lunch spot for our Cypress office). Last year we had our first Family Fair Day at the OC County Fair. Our team is excited to bring on some new talent to work alongside us!', 'Great communication and collaboration skills, in person, online, and by video conference', 'Circle is devoted to helping families thrive with technology and with each other. We envision a world where families find balance, set healthy limits, build good habits, and get the best out of their digital experiences, rather than being consumed by them. Circle’s screen time management and parental control solutions are the easiest and most comprehensive way to manage all your family’s connected devices—wherever they are, wherever they go.', 'Makes sure code is testable and well-tested', 'Experience applying computer science fundamentals in data structures, problem solving, and complexity analysis', 'Proficient in source control systems, especially git', 'Researches and proposes new technologies', 'Completes development assignments on time with high quality', 'Provides input with regards to technology strategy', 'Experience with REST architecture for cloud services', 'Collaborates with other teams to implement solutions effectively', 'Must demonstrate initiative and ability to adapt', 'Must be comfortable working in a team environment with minimal supervision', 'Keeps tech debt in check', 'Aside from technical contributions, Software Engineers are expected to contribute to a healthy and professional work culture. Candidates must be comfortable working in a fast paced, small team startup environment.', 'Experience working with cloud computing platforms, preferably AWS', 'Experience working outside of your comfort zone and taking initiative', 'It began with three dads at a kitchen table. They wanted a better internet for their families—one that let them steward their kids’ online experience both in the home and outside of it. We envision a world where families can set healthy limits, find balance, and build lifelong habits to get the best out of their digital experiences, rather than being consumed by them. Our rapidly growing team, with offices in Portland, OR and Cypress, CA, is redefining how families connect, grow, and flourish in an increasingly digital world. Today, Circle is a category leader in online screen time management and digital parental controls. Our flagship product, Circle Home Plus, is the most comprehensive solution to manage content and time online for Wi-Fi devices at-home and mobile devices across all networks. Circle software is also available through subscription on NETGEAR™ routers, T-Mobile® FamilyMode™, and Sky Broadband Buddy (UK). Circle’s mission to make families’ lives better, online and off, is fueled by investment from Atlanta Seed Company, Relay Ventures, Third Kind Venture Capital, and strategic partners including some of the world’s largest digital communications providers: NETGEAR, Sky, and T-Mobile US.', 'Identifies problems with development processes', 'We’re hiring for this position in both of our offices located in Cypress, California and Portland, Oregon. If you join us, you will work closely with the other team members located at both offices. At times you may interact directly with customers. Due to safety concerns regarding COVID-19 we are working fully remote for the foreseeable future.', 'Software Engineers are expected to work effectively within their team and across the Circle organization in a sustainable manner. Within their team, Software Engineers are expected to contribute to training new hires and ensure distribution of knowledge by regularly requesting and providing code reviews.', 'Experience with test automation frameworks and writing automated tests', 'Experience with cloud service development, preferably written in Go', "If you're looking to invent new solutions to problems and make direct, visible contributions to a product that's in a lot of homes, check us out!", 'Must demonstrate initiative and ability to adaptMust be driven to constantly learn new thingsMust be comfortable working in a team environment with minimal supervisionExperience with cloud service development, preferably written in GoExperience working with cloud computing platforms, preferably AWSFamiliarity with KubernetesProficiency in LinuxExperience with REST architecture for cloud servicesExperience applying computer science fundamentals in data structures, problem solving, and complexity analysisGreat communication and collaboration skills, in person, online, and by video conference', '\xa0', 'On call rotation for production issues, along with the rest of engineering', 'Responsibilities', 'A Software Engineer is responsible for working with fellow Software Engineers to develop high quality software for Circle products. Based on experience level, a Software Engineer may be responsible for anything from implementing individual features to improving overall technology and software architecture.', "We're looking for someone to join our engineering team to help design, implement, and maintain our entire portfolio of products across many technical disciplines. Our ideal candidate has experience working with Kubernetes as well as experience developing cloud services.", 'Familiarity with Kubernetes', 'Innovates on Circle products', 'Proficiency in Linux', 'Must be driven to constantly learn new things', 'Desired Skills', "Are you passionate about software development? Would you like to make a real life impact to connected families around the world? Maybe you'd like working with us at Circle. We make Circle Home Plus, a device that attaches to a home network and allows parents to manage their family's Internet use.", 'Anticipates technical challenges and propose/evaluate solutions']

['', 'About ThousandEyes ', 'Experience in open-source development is a plus ', '6+ years of software development experience ', '6+ years of software development experience A fast learner Comfortable working with newer technologies  Expert level understanding of Java   Excellent object-oriented design skills Experience with streaming architectures, in particular Kafka Experience in open-source development is a plus Experience with network protocols is a plus Strong Computer Science fundamentals Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'At ThousandEyes, we use cutting-edge technologies and innovative techniques to study and visualize networks on a global scale.ThousandEyes engineers are focused on continuous improvement -- of our product, our codebase, our knowledge, and our skills. We believe in innovation, simplicity, and elegance. We work in small, cross-functional teams where everyone has a voice. ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc', ' ', ' Expert level understanding of Java   ', 'About the Role ', 'Strong Computer Science fundamentals ', 'About the Role', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc ', 'The name ThousandEyes was born from two big ideas: the power to see things not ordinarily possible and the ability to collect insights from a multitude of vantage points. As organizations rely more on cloud services and the Internet, the network has become a "black box" outside of their control. ThousandEyes gives organizations visibility and insight into the now borderless network. It arms them with an accurate understanding of how the network impacts their applications, users and customers. ThousandEyes is used by some of the world\'s largest and fastest growing brands, including 4 of the top 5 SaaS companies, 4 of the top 5 US banks and 3 of the Fortune 5. ThousandEyes is backed by Sequoia Capital, Google Ventures, Tenaya Capital and Sutter Hill Ventures, with headquarters in San Francisco, CA. ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes ', 'Experience with network protocols is a plus ', 'Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'About ThousandEyes', 'Experience with streaming architectures, in particular Kafka ', 'A fast learner ', "What we're looking for:", 'The goal of the Cloud and Enterprise Agent team is to provide a real-time network monitoring platform that measures, correlates, and visualizes synthetic data about global network conditions. This data allows our customers to gather performance metrics about network services and servers that they depend on and make informed decisions about how to take action should something go wrong. As a Senior Software Engineer on this team, you will be helping to address our two main challenges: keeping up with the ever-increasing amount of data gathered by our agents, and making this information more actionable for our customers. ', 'Comfortable working with newer technologies ', "What we're looking for: ", 'Excellent object-oriented design skills ']

['', "After that, we'll hopefully make an offer and start preparing for you to join us!", 'The Role', 'Vetspire is a remote, distributed team with employees across the United States, so this will be a remote role available to anyone in the United States to apply.', '~Short 2-hour Max Take-Home Coding Assignment', "~30-minute interview with one of our clients to make sure you're the right candidate for this specific role that will be working daily with them.", 'Designing the interface and algorithms for intelligent immunization reminders.', 'Contact', "This specific role will be very hands-on: you'll work closely with our veterinary users to understand their unique needs and build solutions for them to solve real problems in the field. It's half-part engineering, half-part problem solving.", 'If you have any questions before applying, please feel free to reach out to katie@vetspire.com with any questions.', 'Interview Process', 'Our backend is a GraphQL Phoenix/Absinthe application written in Elixir, our front end is a React SPA using the Apollo GraphQL framework, our primary database is PostgreSQL, and it all runs on Google Cloud via Kubernetes.', "~30 minute screen, where we'll just ask some basic questions to understand your experience and skill level.", 'Vetspire is an Artificial Intelligence driven veterinary medical records and practice management platform. We’re a startup reimagining the way that veterinarians use technology, impacting every aspect of patient care from AI assistance in the exam room to managing client communications and clinical analytics. As part of our team, you’ll be designing the future of what veterinary technology should and can be, and you’ll be joining a founding team out of the Stanford Artificial Intelligence Laboratory building a research platform for evidence-based veterinary medicine.', 'Some examples of what your weeks may look like:', 'Experience with these technologies will be a great bonus (especially Elixir, React, and GraphQL), but the most important experience is in understanding users’ problems and putting together end-to-end solutions. Experience in healthcare technology is also a boon, but not at all required. Keen attention to detail and design is a must.\xa0', "If you're a good fit, we'll reach out to set up a phone call to tell you more about Vetspire. If you're interested, we'll work quickly to identify if this will be the best role for you:", 'Building a secure messaging platform for client and doctor communications.', "We're looking for someone who will take ownership over the full pipeline of their work in a team-centered atmosphere that will work and talk directly with the users every day. You'll want to take pride in talking with clients to understand their needs, brainstorm with the clients to find the ideal solution, implement the back-end architecture at scale, design beautiful and intuitive interfaces on the front-end, and continually iterate based on client feedback.\xa0", '~1-hour technical interview to review the coding assignment', 'Creating an emergency room clinical census to monitor patients and alert staff in real-time.', 'About Vetspire', 'Creating an emergency room clinical census to monitor patients and alert staff in real-time.Designing the interface and algorithms for intelligent immunization reminders.Building a secure messaging platform for client and doctor communications.', 'Technologies', "We’re growing quickly and looking for a full stack engineer to join the team to help bring veterinarians’ dreams into fruition. Your day to day work will consist of learning and understanding veterinarians' and veterinary staff needs and bringing them into reality from the front-end to the backend. To do this, you’ll be working at every stage of patient care from the exam room to back-end analytics."]

AbleTo believes that everyone deserves access to high-quality care, and offers a suite of technology-enabled services to empower people to lead better lives through better mental health. A proprietary platform connects individuals with AbleTo highly trained licensed providers who deliver weekly sessions by phone or video supported by an integrated digital experience. Members also have access to mental health coaches, and digital support programs. Clinical best practices are leveraged across all services to ensure individuals are getting the care they need. Our outcomes-focused care is proven to improve depression and anxiety by over 50% on average, as demonstrated in several peer-reviewed studies. For patients with high-cost medical conditions, our clinically-tailored treatment is proven to reduce medical costs with care that empowers the patient to address their health needs. AbleTo partners with payers to make high-quality care accessible, affordable and convenient for millions of people to get the treatment they need.Data is integral to nearly everything that we do at AbleTo, and as a result the Data Engineering team plays a key role at our company. You should be excited to work with data, have the curiosity to dive deeply into issues, and feel empowered to make a meaningful impact at a mission-driven company. The Data Engineering team is responsible for capturing, storing and organizing key business data assets, supporting many departments including data scientists in building algorithms used for patient identification / engagement / treatment, and supporting useful and actionable reporting for the business.The Data Architect should have a unique combination of business and technical skills that can interpret business needs that drive our future. You will partner with various teams and leaders to assess requirements, define strategy, and deliver solutions that meet business needs. Build cross-functional relationships to understand data needs and help projects and agile teams deliver on those needs  Lead discussions with various departments to conduct data analysis of the existing data landscape by identifying, cataloging and connecting systems and data required to execute identified processes  Design conceptual, physical and logical data models including flowcharts and source to target mappings  Maintain and refine data modeling standards, best practices, and guidelines  Partner with the business to drive continuous improvement in data governance practices, leading the implementation including supporting education programs around data governance and data quality  Ensure data structures meet security, compliance and availability requirements  Work with teams from concept to operations, providing deep technical subject matter expertise for successfully deploying large-scale data solutions in the enterprise, using modern data / analytics technologies
