job_text: ['', ' Improve production data pipelines to support machine learning product goals. ', ' Programming skills in PHP / Ruby / Node.js (We use Python) ', ' The ability to clearly communicate your ideas within and across teams. ', ' Provide and receive technical mentorship via code reviews, written guides, generous learning budget and other professional development activities. ', ' Build services that power machine learning models and deliver insights back to customers. ', ' Experience running deployments at scale in AWS or similar IaaS services. ', ' Worked with data pipelines or distributed message queues.  Familiarity with asynchronous programming patterns as in Python’s asyncio, Twisted, Node, .NET.  Experience running deployments at scale in AWS or similar IaaS services.  A passion for security and privacy (especially Zero Trust).  Partnered with data science teams in an engineering capacity in the past.  Examples of tackling problems revolving around large data sets.  A desire to join a company culture of patience, openness, and learning.  An ability to positively impact users ', ' Design APIs to translate Duo activity into Trust Engine predictions and insights. ', ' An ability to positively impact users ', ' A desire to join a company culture of patience, openness, and learning. ', 'What You Will Do', 'Who You Will Work With', ' Developed server-side web applications, REST APIs, and/or microservices. ', ' The agility to work in a high-growth tech organization. ', 'Who You Are', ' Worked with data pipelines or distributed message queues. ', 'Why Cisco', ' A commitment to quality and an eye for details. ', ' Experience on a customer facing engineering projects. ', ' You should have... ', ' Even better if you have... ', ' This job may not be for you if… ', ' Examples of tackling problems revolving around large data sets. ', " What you'll do… ", ' Partnered with data science teams in an engineering capacity in the past. ', ' Experience on a customer facing engineering projects.  Developed server-side web applications, REST APIs, and/or microservices.  Programming skills in PHP / Ruby / Node.js (We use Python)  The ability to clearly communicate your ideas within and across teams.  A commitment to quality and an eye for details.  The agility to work in a high-growth tech organization. ', ' You’re more interested in developing ML models or ML infrastructure than you are in surfacing ML results in the product to the customer. If so, keep an eye out for data science roles on our team. ', ' Partner with data engineers and data scientists to deliver machine learning product features to millions of users across 21,000+ Duo customers. ', ' Familiarity with asynchronous programming patterns as in Python’s asyncio, Twisted, Node, .NET. ', ' Build services that power machine learning models and deliver insights back to customers.  Design APIs to translate Duo activity into Trust Engine predictions and insights.  Partner with data engineers and data scientists to deliver machine learning product features to millions of users across 21,000+ Duo customers.  Improve production data pipelines to support machine learning product goals.  Provide and receive technical mentorship via code reviews, written guides, generous learning budget and other professional development activities. ', ' A passion for security and privacy (especially Zero Trust). ']

['', 'Work closely with the product management, design, and internal teams to understand the needs of our customers and quickly iterate to build features', 'Qualifications', 'Solid experience with Express.js, MongoDB, Redis and similar server-side technologies', 'Participate in design and architecture discussions', 'Lots of exciting new projects', 'Competitive benefits', 'Benefits:', "At LogDNA, we're looking for employees who exhibit passion, grit, and integrity.\xa0You're encouraged to apply even if your experience doesn't precisely match our job description. We're building a culture where our differences are valued and believe this will drive innovation. Ultimately, our success will be achieved through diversity of backgrounds, experiences, ideas and opinions .\xa0Everyone is welcome - as an inclusive workplace our employees are comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work every day.\xa0Come join us.", 'Work closely with the product management, design, and internal teams to understand the needs of our customers and quickly iterate to build featuresOptimize application for maximum speed and scalabilityParticipate in design and architecture discussionsWork on both sides of the web app: design and build client-side UIs and server-side APIsManage technical debt. Help to maintain balance between velocity and code health', 'Work on both sides of the web app: design and build client-side UIs and server-side APIs', 'An eye for design, passion for building simple and powerful user interfaces', "At LogDNA you’ll help us build a fast and modern log management platform that offers the flexibility of an amazing developer experience with the trust of enterprise-grade infrastructure. Today, LogDNA is used by over 3,000 teams including IBM, OpenAI, and LimeBike. We’re building a future where developers don’t have to dread the tools they use at work, starting with log management.\xa0We've achieved 350% year-over-year revenue growth in the last year, and we're just getting started.", 'Solid experience with Vue.js/Vuex or React/Redux frameworks', 'Advanced knowledge of JavaScript (comfortable looking into the source code of modern client-side frameworks), CSS and HTML (comfortable implementing UI components from scratch)', 'Working in a fun, energetic, agile team environment', 'Experience in building real-world web applicationsAt least 5 years of Javascript experience in frontend or fullstack engineering roleSolid experience with Vue.js/Vuex or React/Redux frameworksSolid experience with Express.js, MongoDB, Redis and similar server-side technologiesSolid understanding of front-end architecture, managing state. Knowledge of best practices of building data flow in a web app', 'Unlimited Vacation']

job_title: Solutions Engineer (Machine Learning/Data Science/Python or C++))
job_text: ['', '• Development experience, with proficiency in C++ or Python ', 'ML/AI Suite', 'Requirements ', 'high-performance computing infrastructure', 'These are high value, meaningful projects with high levels of internal and external visibility. ', 'Our technology runs as a service inside a client’s own environment, whether in any cloud, on-premise, or at the edge, and plays nicely with modern data, messaging analytics, and machine learning ecosystems.', 'Your Responsibilities ', '• Strong work ethic, goal-oriented, attention to detail, and proven record of delivery ', '• Undergraduate degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM), or comparable area of study • Strong verbal and written communication, and presentation skills ', 'application engineers, product managers, and data scientists ', 'We believe this is a $50B+ market opportunity and we aim to take a good chunk of it. ', "Our goal is to deploy and operate high-performance computing infrastructure so customers don't have to. That’s why we’re building next-generation tools, a highly efficient stream-processing engine that scales to volumes that traditional big data solutions can’t.", '• Drive early sales discussions on architecture and engineering, particularly with explaining the.ai Platform and its interoperability with existing systems ', '• Familiarity with big data, databases, cloud technologies, and machine learning concepts is a plus', '• 2+ years of experience demonstrating software products and presenting technical deep-dives\xa0', '• Lead the engineering effort to deliver production-ready application trials and proofs of concept on the .ai Platform in collaboration with', '• Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and training as part of the sales process ', 'stream-processing engine ', 'Preferred ', '• Engage customer executives and domain experts to define, scope, and design application trials ', 'Preferred', '• Practical experience with machine learning and data science ', 'Solutions Engineer (Machine Learning | AI | Data Science)', '• Design, develop, maintain, and present demo applications of.ai products ', '\xa0As a Solutions Engineer, you will be responsible for all technical engagements with our prospective customers, including demos, proofs of technology, and use-case-based trials. ', 'We are a leading enterprise AI software provider for accelerating digital transformation. The comprehensive ML/AI Suite enables organizations to harness the power of data to realize their boldest ideas, much faster, and with greater efficiency than ever before - all without any data engineering.']

This could be the opportunity you are looking for to expand your skills, contribute to a winning company, and work with talented people who love what they do and take pride in our company.', 'Electrical / Software Engineer – LED Product Design', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing electrical consumer products.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An understanding of embedded control systems and related firmware', 'Lumitec (www.lumiteclighting.com) has established a strong brand presence in the marine industry and beyond as an innovative, industry-leading developer and manufacturer of extreme environment LED lighting. This is a unique opportunity for an exceptional person who is seeking a product design / development role.\xa0You will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, DC and AC products and embedded control systems for extreme environment LED lighting. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Love boating.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Are passionate about your work and prefer to avoid big company bureaucracy, politics, and other hurdles to bringing great products to market very quickly.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and experience within the various levels of software development from firmware to mobile applications.', demonstrate the following:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tend to be generally positive and approach most challenges with the firm belief that you will succeed.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Are highly creative and enjoy using that creativity to focus your technical expertise on problems to develop elegant solutions.', 'Lumitec offers a comprehensive benefits package that includes group Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, and Short and Long-Term disability coverages.\xa0We also offer individual, ancillary insurance plans and a generous 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan with a Company match.', 'Are you Passionate about Engineering, continually expanding your knowledge base and professional growth?', 'If you would love to bring brilliant designs to life while working in a hands-on, fast paced environment, this may be the right opportunity for you!', '\xa0The following attributes are strongly desired:\xa0', 'Do you work with a high sense of urgency?', 'You will find this position very satisfying if you:\xa0']

company: TJFACT LLC - Totally Joined for Achieving Collaborative Techniques
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'We are committed to evolving our development processes via proven practices like retrospectives, so software engineers must be eager to seek out and try new ways of working within the team.', 'Live Treated Fairly Every day.', '90% - Application Development', 'The software engineer must be able to create excellent object oriented code in both Java (and other JVM-based languages) and JavaScript(with an emphasis on modern, modular JavaScript applications).', 'Continuous integration', 'A minimum of 1-3 years of developing web applications using jvm based languages and modern javascript frameworks.', 'The PICA software development team places an importance on agile development practices and software craftsmanship. We deliver working software incrementally, working closely with our customers, and preferring face-to-face communication. The software engineer will spend his/her day collaborating with team members and customers. This will include sitting in open, collaborative workspaces.', 'A software engineer practices and teaches the following disciplines:', 'A software engineer at TJFACT LLC is a member of the technical team responsible for taking user stories and transforming them into quality software under minimal supervision. He or she is expected to work with the team, customers and testers to take business needs and produce working software.', "Bachelor's degree in a technical field or equivalent work experience preferred.", 'Experience developing in an Agile environment.', 'Turn technical requirements and problems into working software', 'Test driven development', 'Any experience developing cross-platform Mobile applications is a plus.', '10% - Technical Leadership', 'Pair programming', 'Incrementally delivering and improving software', 'Essential Duties and Responsibilities', 'Work with senior staff to implement code that follows best practices and architectural goals', 'Work with associate software engineers and grow technical skills and practices for quality software development through project work', 'Review pull requests and provide feedback on code to other developers']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', '.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Our Perks', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', '===', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Responsibilities', 'Required Qualifications', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)']

This role also provides opportunities to explore and adopt new technologies.', ' Effectively collaborate and engage in team efforts, speak up for what you think are the best solutions and be able to converse respectfully and compromise when necessary ', ' Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or related field ']

['', '·Apply software development skills/techniques and AWS knowledge to the design and development of high quality and scalable test automation solutions.', '· Natural problem solver with a passion to drive quality of the products.', "We're seeking a Software Engineer for a 6-month W2 consulting position for our San Diego, CA-based client, a global leader in medical devices. This position is part of the Engineering Test team supporting AWS cloud services. Role will initially work remotely and support standard West Coast business hours. Prefer candidates local to California.", '·Enhance tools/applications for the test automation framework, conduct experiments, and propose recommendations for continuous advancements.', '· Enthusiastic self-starter who can think outside the box and possess the mental agility to make an impact within your role quickly.', '·Good understanding of cloud networking concepts.', '·Experience/ Knowledge building application using AWS services, such as EC2, RDS, Lambda, S3.', '·Computer Science, Engineering or Science degree or equivalent experience.', '·Experience of core Java language, Spring framework, microservices, and web APIs.', '· Ability to show the ability to learn fast and to work effectively within the team environment.', 'If you thrive on simple yet sophisticated architecture and agility, this is the role for you. This is a dynamic, fast-paced and growing environment where team members are encouraged to drive innovation.', '·Work with automation tools such as Terraform including building cloud-based CI/CD/CT DevOps pipelines.', '·Experience with monitoring tools such as (AppDynamics, CloudWatch, Tibco/RTView).', '·Resolve complex problems with efficient designs and implementations.', '·Contribute to design reviews and perform test code inspections leading to application optimization.', '·Container Tooling – Docker.', '·Exposure to Angular, Spring Boot, relational & non-relational databases (MongoDB, DynamoDB and SQL Server are highly desirable).', 'Please apply today!', '· Attention to detail and commitment to excellence.', 'Qualifications and Experience', '·Programing Knowledge using Python or R is a bonus.', 'To be successful in this role, you will have demonstrable experience in performing the following responsibilities in a fast-paced environment:', 'Job Responsibilities', '·Develop and drive a culture of ownership, high performance and efficiency within the team.', '·Propose, define, and implement processes and solutions for improved software development.', '·Maintain technical skills and awareness of current state-of-the-art technical advancements.', '·Collaborate within teams, across business, and contribute to the functional and technical discussions.', '·Knowledge in Machine Learning methodologies with hands-on experience, such as, classifications, regressions, forecasts, and unsupervised learning is highly regarded.', 'This role is responsible for performing software development, design, and testing to support the testing activities in the web, mobile, and cloud applications. It also encompasses working with global Product Development (PD) teams in San Diego, Australia, Canada and the Ukraine. These applications are designed for clinicians involved in the care and management of patients who can benefit for company’s line of medical devices.', 'Soft skills:', 'Software Engineer with AWS cloud services need to join the Test Engineering team.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer  – Python, Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure, Cloudera), Data Platform
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have extensive hands on\xa0Python development experience', 'Location:', 'Project Description:\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'You will work in a diverse, international Engineering Team on a green field software development project, where your goal is to create a scalable machine learning platform for internal and external use, mostly in Python and Go on AWS technology stack.', 'About us', "We need you to build a data platform to help our researchers and data scientists answer the World's Hardest Questions depending on Quantitative Research quickly and accurately.", 'well)', 'WorldQuant Predictive provides data science capabilities and prediction services across multiple industries with offices in New York (USA) and Budapest (Hungary). Research and technology are at the core of our business, enabling us to identify insights and build models to help solve challenging real-world problems.', 'We are looking for talented people who dream big and act locally, and also who are passionate and motivated about making an impact and helping to take us to the next level.\xa0', 'About us:', '(Preferred)', 'You will be setting up our technology stack, establishing the architecture of our robust data processing pipeline and our extensible machine learning platform', 'To achieve this, you need to be passionate with an aptitude to quickly learn new and emerging technologies and you will work closely with our CTO, Platform Architect, Research and Client teams Software and Data engineers, researchers and data scientists.', 'We are an organization backed by Igor Tulchinsky, founder of WorldQuant Asset Management, a highly successful quantitative asset management firm built on the philosophy that talent is global. Our core philosophy is that good ideas can come from anyone and anywhere, and that the cross-fertilization of those ideas can lead to great solutions and innovative technologies. This philosophy is realized in our culture of collaboration and open exchange of ideas spanning multiple geographies and disciplines.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Worked with Cloud technologies (preferred AWS, but GCP, Azure, Cloudera can work as', 'What have you done:', 'Python, hands-on software developer skills, cloud technologies (preferred AWS, but GCP, Azure, Cloudera can work as well)', 'What you will do:', 'Ideal Candidate:', 'Location: New York, NY (Preferred)', 'You will also be building robust data pipelines of high data quality in a scalable fashion (both data and maintainability) and creating ETL data flows in a Big Data Ecosystem we are (or will be) using.']

['Help Gatsby Cloud achieve greater scale, with a focus on quality and stability. ', '', 'About Gatsby', 'You have hands-on experience with Gatsby.', 'Plan, scope, and execute on large initiatives.\xa0We approach our work with specific company goals in mind, and we’re looking for someone who is opinionated on how we can reach them. ', 'You’ll be at the cutting edge of website development', 'You’ll be at the cutting edge of website development\xa0— working on one of the fastest-growing site building frameworks on the market. We’ll welcome your thoughts and opinions about how to improve our infrastructure with open arms. An incredible team to learn from and mentor. From domain experts to incredibly talented early-career developers, the Gatsby Cloud Team is a team that you will be challenged by, and that you will challenge. Challenging technical problems. These include scaling, container orchestration, and running untrusted code at scale. These challenging engineering endeavors and problems are complex, but rewarding and oh-so-fun. ', 'Unlimited vacation policy, with a minimum\xa0of 15 days paid vacation time Amazing health, dental, and vision insurance for you and your family (US only) 3 months of paid parental leave covering both adoption and foster placement Stock options in a fast-growing startup We’re remote first, so skip the commute Set up costs for a home office OR co-working/private office reimbursement New laptop of your choice Wifi and cell phone reimbursement Fly to cool locations 3x/year for company-wide meetups Gatsby Sabbatical: 4 weeks paid vacation after 4 years tenure ', 'An incredible team to learn from and mentor. ', 'Type of Work: Full-time ', 'Named as a Rising Star on the 2019 Forbes 100 Cloud List, Gatsby has quickly grown to be one of the largest and most exciting open source projects on the web. We’re a modern website framework that builds performance into every website by leveraging the latest web technologies. Create blazing fast, compelling apps and websites without needing to become a performance expert. All of this is driven by a desire to understand and relate to the customer experience. Deep knowledge of nginx. Experience with search DBs like Elasticsearch, Lucene, or Cassandra. Experience with any of the following: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Grafana, or Kibana. ', 'We’re remote first, so skip the commute ', 'Plan, scope, and execute on large initiatives.', 'Help us better understand the Gatsby Cloud user’s experience. We’re always trying to create better monitoring and alerting that allows us to understand what’s happening in Gatsby Cloud and react to customer issues quickly. ', 'Challenging technical problems', ' Day-to-day responsibilities', ' The worst parts of this job', 'Deep knowledge of nginx. ', 'An incredible team to learn from and mentor. ', 'Experience with any of the following: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Grafana, or Kibana. ', 'You have hands-on experience with Gatsby. ', 'Engineering Level: Staff (L5 or L6: see our Engineering Levels Guide) ', 'Experience with any of the following: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Grafana, or Kibana.', 'Staff Software Engineer, Infrastructure', 'About Gatsby ', 'Debug and investigate complex and interesting customer issues. ', 'As we’re growing, we need more engineers to support these initiatives! You’ll be working closely with our small but amazing team, solving interesting problems and helping us anticipate how we can improve our infrastructure as we scale. ', 'Wifi and cell phone reimbursement ', 'Deep knowledge of nginx.', 'Type of Work: Full-time Location: Remote\xa0(preference for UTC-5 to UTC+1) Engineering Level: Staff (L5 or L6: see our Engineering Levels Guide) ', 'Proven experience in operations. ', 'Participate in planning, retrospectives, and other team rituals.', 'Set up costs for a home office OR co-working/private office reimbursement ', 'As a remote-first, community-focused team, Gatsby’s core values include transparency (we work in public most of the time); creating a safe, high-trust team; building incredible developer experiences; maintaining a healthy working environment; and helping deliver web experiences that feel amazing to use on every device and connection type. ', ' Benefits and perks', 'You feel comfortable working on Node.js applications. This will make it easier for you to dive into our Node.js backend applications as-needed. ', 'Gatsby is an equal opportunity employer. We eagerly seek applicants of diverse backgrounds and hire without regard to race, color, gender identity, religion, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, physical abilities (or disability), age, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Cultivating inclusivity and diversity is a top priority.', '\xa0distributed team. ', '3 months of paid parental leave covering both adoption and foster placement ', '(US only)', 'Challenging technical problems. These include scaling, container orchestration, and running untrusted code at scale. These challenging engineering endeavors and problems are complex, but rewarding and oh-so-fun. ', ' The best parts of this job', 'Extensive experience with Kubernetes cluster design, managing Kubernetes at scale, and GKE.', 'You feel comfortable working on Node.js applications. ']

["COVID-19 Hiring Update--Dataminr is still actively hiring.As the health and safety of our candidates and our employees come first, we're excited to provide virtual experiences for interviews and new hire on-boarding.This position can be based in our New York or Washington offices or remote within the United States. Who We AreWe are Dataminr. We are a mission-driven company committed to the power of AI, public data, and real-time information as a force for good in the world. Over the last decade, our team has established and refined the leading AI platform for real-time event and risk detection. We surface the earliest signals of unfolding events and emerging risks within an increasingly diverse and complex landscape of publicly available information, enabling more effective risk mitigation strategies, faster response, and better crisis management. Dataminr serves thousands of professionals in 70+ countries by delivering timely, relevant, and actionable alerts to public and private sector organizations around the world.We’ve grown to over 500 talented employees across seven global offices and raised $392 million in funding in our most recent investment round. Our culture promotes cross-team interaction, work-life balance and the sharing of information and ideas because it enables us to do our best work together, make a meaningful contribution, and have fun. Join us and help the world manage risk in real time.Who You Are You're an experienced Senior Analytics Engineer interested in deploying and supporting micro batch and streaming data pipelines into a cloud-native warehousing technology that serves multiple stakeholders across the company and drives innovation. You have expertise in designing, deploying, maintaining and refining data pipelines and analytics data structures, and you delight in optimizing queries - both your own and others’. You have extensive experience integrating disparate big datasets and validating data quality using best practices. You bring an in-depth understanding of the advantages and limitations of particular technologies, including hands-on experience leveraging features of analytics dbs in order to optimize highly-performant business intelligence tooling. You have developed strong communication skills that you leverage to drive impactful decisions that benefit the business, and you have a proven track record of collaboration with stakeholders, data engineers and product managers in order to deliver successful business intelligence solutions based on complex datasets. You have a history of mentoring other engineers, you give generously of your time and you know when to ask for help. The OpportunityYou will be the lead database engineer for our new analytics and business intelligence platform, responsible for designing our data structures and building out our data warehouse solutions (Redshift, Vertica, Presto) while working closely with our analytics pipeline and business intelligence engineers. You will be a primary contributor in our business intelligence and data management vision and implementation, and will be responsible for maintaining an ongoing data analytics culture of compliance, ethics and integrity. You will work with data engineers to perform source system analyses, identification of key data problems, and work to resolve any data quality and data consistency issues. You will research and evaluate technologies and recommend the most efficient solutions, and you will collaborate with our stakeholders teams across the company to provide better access to data resources.In The First Month, You Will Start off by learning the ropes, spending time with different parts of the company to understand how Dataminr works. Get up to speed on our data processing pipelines and data structures with overview sessions and deep dives with your team. Contribute code to production systems. Within 3 Months, You Will Share responsibility for our data warehouse and data structures with other members of your team. Help to plan our new infrastructure features and improvements. Begin to take more of a role in helping others understand our data analytics structures.  Within 6 Months, You Will Own the data warehouse. Design and implement data structures that deliver highly performant answers to business questions for teams across the company. Be influential in helping plan the next iteration of our analytics platform. Bring new ideas to our engineering and analytics processes to help us continuously improve. We Recognize And Reward Hard Work WithWhy you should work here: Competitive compensation package including company equity.   Paid benefits for employees and their dependents, including medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance   401 (k) savings plan with company matching.   Flexible spending account for out-of-pocket medical, transit, parking, and dependent care expenses.  We want you to be your best, authentic self and support you with:  A diverse, driven, and passionate team of coworkers who want you to succeed.   Opportunities to own and drive critical projects   Individual Learning and Development fund and professional training   Generous leave and flexible hours   And More!  Dataminr is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. Individuals seeking employment at Dataminr are considered without regards to race, sex, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, genetics, marital status, pregnancy, unemployment status, sexual orientation, citizenship status or veteran status.", ' Paid benefits for employees and their dependents, including medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance ', ' Flexible spending account for out-of-pocket medical, transit, parking, and dependent care expenses. systems', 'MarkLogic is a fast-growth, Sequoia-backed, pre-IPO company building products that impact millions of people every day. Our customers include Airbus, Boeing, Johnson & Johnson, Genentech, J.P. Morgan Chase, Sony, and the U.S. Department of Defense to name a few. Across the globe, our technology has been used to discover new medicines, run the world’s financial systems, prevent terrorism, optimize supply chain etc.', 'We are an AA/EEO/Veterans/Disabled employer', 'Cloud Services Team is looking for world class developers to design, implement and enhance our\xa0Cloud Services on AWS and Azure.\xa0', 'Minimum 5+ years’ experience with python and JavaScript', 'Bachelors or Masters’ Degree in Computer Science', 'Data integration is a complex, $50B/year problem that every organization faces.\xa0MarkLogic is one of the leaders addressing this huge market opportunity. We have developed a highly differentiated technology called the MarkLogic Data Hub Platform.\xa0The Data Hub Platform simplifies, data integration and enables organizations to achieve a 360° view of data faster than ever. It allows organizations to integrate all of their data, power transactional and analytical applications and curate data for machine learning and AI.\xa0The Data Hub Platform is, delivered as a cloud service in public cloud for fortune 500 companies.', 'Domain knowledge of NoSQL or relational database']

['', 'You’re a problem solver and enjoy devising creative solutions', 'From a technical perspective, you have a basic understanding of how modern web services and mobile apps are built, and the cloud infrastructure that powers them (e.g. Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure, etc). You also have 2+ years of experience selling or supporting a highly technical product.', 'Take lead on understanding customer technical pains to design, demonstrate and present innovative solutions that unlock business-level gains. ', 'About You', 'About Segment', 'build rapport', 'You’re a life-long learner - you enjoy digesting new information and sharing that knowledge with others', 'You are customer focused, and strive to do what’s right for the customer', 'organized', 'About The Solutions Engineering Team', 'Develop subject matter expertise on the customer data landscape, and Segment’s role within the customer data ecosystem', 'You have a curiosity that often manifests in understanding technology "under the hood", and have a knack for understanding technical concepts.', 'customer focused', 'Act as a trusted advisor to consult with customers and prospects in order to influence their customer data strategy and architecture design.', 'We encourage you to apply if this role excites you - even if you think you may not meet all of the qualifications. At Segment, we live by four values: karma, drive, tribe, and focus. We are always looking for outstanding individuals with diverse backgrounds and perspectives who embody these values. To learn more about life at Segment and our commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion, visit our LinkedIn page. We’re excited to meet you!', 'curiosity', 'life-long learner', 'What You’ll Do', ' You have a curiosity that often manifests in understanding technology "under the hood", and have a knack for understanding technical concepts. You are customer focused, and strive to do what’s right for the customer You’re a problem solver and enjoy devising creative solutions You’re a life-long learner - you enjoy digesting new information and sharing that knowledge with others You are organized, driven and are OK with juggling lots of priorities and can synthesize multiple perspectives to get the most important things done. You know how to build rapport with new people in your own way, regardless of whether you’re an introvert or extrovert or somewhere in-between. From a technical perspective, you have a basic understanding of how modern web services and mobile apps are built, and the cloud infrastructure that powers them (e.g. Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure, etc). You also have 2+ years of experience selling or supporting a highly technical product. ', 'You’ve built websites and/or mobile apps, or have experience working with ETL and/or data pipelines', 'Partner with Account Executives to execute pre-sales activities including opportunity qualification, demonstrations, Proof-of-Concept, RFP Design and justifying business value. ', 'You know how to build rapport with new people in your own way, regardless of whether you’re an introvert or extrovert or somewhere in-between.', 'Bonus Points If', ' You’ve built websites and/or mobile apps, or have experience working with ETL and/or data pipelines You’ve worked in marketing and/or advertising and understand the technical pains and challenges of working with customer data You have some experience with Data Analytics, Data Science, AI, or Machine Learning ', 'driven', 'Lead technical evaluations with our prospects to uncover their goals to articulate Segment’s ability to enable their success. ', 'You’ve worked in marketing and/or advertising and understand the technical pains and challenges of working with customer data', 'creative solutions', 'Build a perspective on customer and market trends by listening to prospects and advocate customer interests to influence Segment’s strategy and vision. ', 'You have some experience with Data Analytics, Data Science, AI, or Machine Learning', 'You are organized, driven and are OK with juggling lots of priorities and can synthesize multiple perspectives to get the most important things done.', ' Lead technical evaluations with our prospects to uncover their goals to articulate Segment’s ability to enable their success.  Develop subject matter expertise on the customer data landscape, and Segment’s role within the customer data ecosystem Take lead on understanding customer technical pains to design, demonstrate and present innovative solutions that unlock business-level gains.  Act as a trusted advisor to consult with customers and prospects in order to influence their customer data strategy and architecture design. Build a perspective on customer and market trends by listening to prospects and advocate customer interests to influence Segment’s strategy and vision.  Partner with Account Executives to execute pre-sales activities including opportunity qualification, demonstrations, Proof-of-Concept, RFP Design and justifying business value.  ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Software Video Integration Team
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Prior experience with managing software engineer(s)', 'COMPANY BENEFITS', 'Take part in the entire project lifecycle, from requirements development to deployment.', 'Work with latest technologies:\xa0As we continue to lead the industry, we require expertise across a broad spectrum of technologies including short and long-range wireless communication, video surveillance, lighting and HVAC automation, web development, and backend application development and hosting.\xa0', 'WHY WORK FOR ALARM.COM?', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related field or equivalent work experience.5+ years of professional software development experience.', 'Alarm.com offers competitive pay and benefits including a wide choice of healthcare options with generous company subsidy, a health savings account option with company contribution, 401(k) with employer match, paid holidays and paid time off increasing with tenure, paid maternity and paternity leave, company paid STD/LTD and life insurance, flexible spending accounts, and a casual dress work environment.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Prior experience with managing software engineer(s)Strong programming skills; C#, Java, and/or object-oriented programming.Software engineering experience gained from work experience, academic projects, internship experience or independent hacking projects.Knowledge of networking concepts, principles, and technologies.', 'Gain well rounded experience:\xa0', 'Very few medium sized companies innovate and develop across such a broad range of technologies as Alarm.com. This position is ideal for the candidate who seeks a small, friendly company culture where one can work closely with smart and highly productive people across a very interesting spectrum of wireless, software, and hardware/device technologies to develop outstanding consumer products.', "Our security, video monitoring, intelligent automation and energy management solutions are available through our network of thousands of professional service providers in North America and around the globe. Alarm.com's common stock is traded on the Nasdaq under the ticker symbol ALRM.", 'Software engineering experience gained from work experience, academic projects, internship experience or independent hacking projects.', 'Alarm.com is an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Knowledge of networking concepts, principles, and technologies.', 'Manage a small team of software engineers', 'Focus on fun:\xa0Alarm.com places high value on our team culture. We even have a committee dedicated to hosting a stand-out holiday party, happy hours, and an annual corporate retreat.', 'Gain well rounded experience:\xa0Alarm.com offers a diverse and dynamic environment where you will get the chance to work directly with executives and gain a broad knowledge base across multiple areas of the business.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Alarm.com earned the Top Workplace™ award for its employee culture and the meaningful work we do every day to develop and bring to market new technology that will make millions of people safer and help them use energy more efficiently. We’re seeking those who are passionate about creating change through technology and who want to make a lasting impact on the world around them.', 'Work with cross functional teams to develop highly reliable software that runs at scale.', '5+ years of professional software development experience.', 'Manage a small team of software engineersDevelop full-stack and edge computing software for a wide variety of platforms and technologies.Engage in the research, evaluation, and application of new technologies and methodologies to solve challenging project goals.Take part in the entire project lifecycle, from requirements development to deployment.Work with cross functional teams to develop highly reliable software that runs at scale.', 'Advantageous Skills', 'Develop full-stack and edge computing software for a wide variety of platforms and technologies.', 'Focus on fun:', 'COMPANY INFO', 'Experience with RTSP/RTP, WebRTC or other video streaming technologies.', 'In connection with your application, we collect information that identifies, reasonably relates to or describes you (“Personal Information”). The categories of Personal Information that we may collect include your name, government-issued identification number(s), email address, mailing address, other contact information, emergency contact information, employment history, educational history, criminal record, and demographic information.\xa0We collect and use those categories of Personal Information about you for human resources and other business management purposes, including identifying and evaluating you as a candidate for potential or future employment or future contract positions, record keeping in relation to recruiting and hiring, conducting criminal background checks as permitted by law, conducting analytics, and ensuring compliance with applicable legal requirements and Company policies.', 'Familiarity with image processing, video processing, and/or computer vision a plus.', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:\xa0We hire only the best. Our quality standards are high, and our employees enjoy working alongside other high achievers.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Make an immediate impact:\xa0New employees can expect to be given responsibility for bringing new technologies to the marketplace within weeks. You are empowered to perform as soon as you join the Alarm.com team!\xa0\xa0Gain well rounded experience:\xa0Alarm.com offers a diverse and dynamic environment where you will get the chance to work directly with executives and gain a broad knowledge base across multiple areas of the business.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with latest technologies:\xa0As we continue to lead the industry, we require expertise across a broad spectrum of technologies including short and long-range wireless communication, video surveillance, lighting and HVAC automation, web development, and backend application development and hosting.\xa0Focus on fun:\xa0Alarm.com places high value on our team culture. We even have a committee dedicated to hosting a stand-out holiday party, happy hours, and an annual corporate retreat.', 'Work with latest technologies:', 'Alarm.com is looking for a highly motivated self-starter to work in a fast-paced product development environment on our video team! The successful candidate will work with small teams to design, prototype, and develop state-of-the-art camera integration, video streaming, and video analytics solutions.', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:\xa0We hire only the best. Our quality standards are high, and our employees enjoy working alongside other high achievers.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Engage in the research, evaluation, and application of new technologies and methodologies to solve challenging project goals.', '\ufeff', "Alarm.com is the leading platform solution for the connected home and business. Millions of people depend on Alarm.com's technology to monitor and control their property from anywhere. Centered on security and remote monitoring, our platform addresses a wide range of market needs and enables application-based control for a growing variety of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.", '\xa0', 'Essential Skills Required', 'In this role, You Will', 'Make an immediate impact:\xa0', 'Strong programming skills; C#, Java, and/or object-oriented programming.', 'Familiarity with image processing, video processing, and/or computer vision a plus.Experience with RTSP/RTP, WebRTC or other video streaming technologies.', 'Make an immediate impact:\xa0New employees can expect to be given responsibility for bringing new technologies to the marketplace within weeks. You are empowered to perform as soon as you join the Alarm.com team!\xa0\xa0', 'Collaborate with outstanding people:', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related field or equivalent work experience.', 'As a Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work across a variety of technical areas. Typical projects will involve diverse technologies and skills. Strong multi-tasking skills and the ability to self-learn are must-have attributes. Candidate must be able to communicate well within a team environment and work independently on self-directed tasks. Motivated and creative problem solvers will have opportunities to influence future projects.']

['', 'Expanse protects the world’s most important organizations by discovering risks on the Internet no one else can find. Our customers comprise more than 10% of the routable Internet and rely on our products to discover, manage, and secure their global Internet assets. Born from DARPA, Expanse was founded in 2012 and is backed by more than $135M in funding.', '4+\xa0years of experience as a professional software engineer writing back end software to enable and support feature development teams', 'Enjoy working with engineers on other teams to understand their requirements and pain points', 'Are excited to dig in, prototype, build, test, and see projects through to production; results driven, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'About You', '$65 every month for your wellness to cover costs of gyms, courses\xa0and other activities', 'Expanse is expanding rapidly and we’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform team.\xa0At Expanse, we believe that making the internet a safer place for our customers matters. The Expanse Platform team increases product velocity by partnering with teams to design, implement, deploy, and maintain software that furthers our platform vision and addresses common concerns that do not fall within the normal remit of any other team at Expanse. We do this by gathering requirements from teams across Expanse for common services, new data platform capabilities, and anything else that addresses global pain points. We work with stakeholders to prioritize, and partner with other Expanse teams to deliver.', '100% coverage of employee healthcare benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)', 'Have a passion for writing software that boosts the productivity of other software development teams', 'Take part in architecture strategy sessions; build a point of view with your team, advocate for it', 'Are experienced and opinionated about the implementation and operation of distributed back end systems', 'Have familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes\xa0as a plus', 'Work with peer development teams to integrate new services with existing products', '$500, one time, to customize your remote work space so you have what you need to be comfortable and productive', 'Have experience with agile development processes and modern software development practices', 'Expanse is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or gender (including pregnancy, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, transgender status), medical condition, HIV/AIDS or Hepatitis C status, marital status, military or veteran status, political activities, affiliations, citizenship, or any other characteristic or class protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation in the application or recruiting process due to a disability, please contact us at careers@expanseinc.com.', 'Positively impact Expanse Engineering velocity and improve the everyday development experience of other teams by designing, building, deploying, and supporting shared service components for the Expanse platformDesign, build, and optimize Kubernetes-hosted\xa0services for maximum speed and scale, using a number of backend storage technologies such as Postgres, Elasticsearch, and S3Work with peer development teams to integrate new services with existing productsAnalyze existing services, identify barriers to scaling; recommend changes; implementTake part in architecture strategy sessions; build a point of view with your team, advocate for itRepresent your team in architectural planning meetings and other interactions with peer engineering groupsCollaborate with teams to solve problems, reduce technical debt, and evolve development practices as those teams grow and matureEnsure your team delivers high output and mentor other engineersTake ownership of projects, drive them to completion, and support them in production', 'Position Summary', "Send your most talented friends our way. If we hire one, you'll get $1,000 even if you're not an Expanse employee. Please email careers@expanseinc.com to learn more!", 'Analyze existing services, identify barriers to scaling; recommend changes; implement', '4+\xa0years of experience as a professional software engineer writing back end software to enable and support feature development teamsEnjoy working with engineers on other teams to understand their requirements and pain pointsHave a passion for writing tradeoffs for handling concurrency', '$50 every month in cell phone reimbursement', 'Benefits', 'Company sponsored parental leave\xa0', "As a Senior Engineer on our Platform team, you will build out a tier of services designed to provide standard capabilities to feature teams. Your work will reduce the effort required to build new products and features in the Expanse product line by providing a well-tested layer of shared services and libraries, as well as introducing common patterns and practices. You will draw upon your experience to rapidly investigate and prototype new functionality built upon cutting-edge technology, then switch to implementation mode to deliver products built upon your findings. Your customers are your peer engineers in other teams at Expanse and you’ll work with them to understand pain points in our existing system, create designs to address these challenge areas, and integrate your new capabilities with their products. You will represent your team in architecture roadmap planning sessions, interfacing regularly with other senior engineers, architects, and product managers. You will be a technical implementor within the team,\xa0developing\xa0shared platform capabilities end-to-end and maintaining them in production. You will collaborate with the rest of your team on architectural direction, managing technical debt, and continuously evolving the team's agile development process.", 'Take ownership of projects, drive them to completion, and support them in production', 'Are familiar with stream/event-processing architectures using technologies such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, Storm, Spark, Dataflow, Apache Beam, or their equivalents', 'Are familiar with distributed data stores, such as HBase, Elasticsearch, and S3, as well as relational databases such as PostgreSQL and MySQL', 'Company Overview', 'Refer a Friend', 'Are proficient in Java and comfortable with Spring; you are able to pick up other languages quickly (e.g. Python)', 'Have experience in supporting your work in production', 'Ensure your team delivers high output and mentor other engineers', '60% coverage for dependent healthcare benefits', 'Company-wide events including team building, holiday party, and offsite', 'Have strong familiarity with databases, data modeling, profiling, and performance optimization', '100% coverage of employee healthcare benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)60% coverage for dependent healthcare benefitsUnlimited PTO + 8 company holidaysCompany sponsored parental leave\xa0401k PlanOpportunities for professional development to attend conferences, classes, and workshops$75 every quarter as discretionary team building stipend$50 every month in cell phone reimbursement$65 every month for your wellness to cover costs of gyms, courses\xa0and other activities$500, one time, to customize your remote work space so you have what you need to be comfortable and productiveCompany-wide events including team building, holiday party, and offsite', 'Have a solid understanding of design patterns', 'Collaborate with teams to solve problems, reduce technical debt, and evolve development practices as those teams grow and mature', 'Opportunities for professional development to attend conferences, classes, and workshops']

['', '\xa0', '2+ years commercial JavaScript engineering work (ideally ReactJS)', 'Software Engineer Requirements;', 'Build out a set of greenfield products and features from scratch, utilizing the most modern web technologiesDesign and engineer complex functionality on real-time, highly scalable data driven systems within finance/tradingWork in a tech first organisation, constantly being creative and innovating', 'Work in a tech first organisation, constantly being creative and innovating', '2+ years commercial JavaScript engineering work (ideally ReactJS)Experience working with large scale enterprise web applicationsKnowledge of UI architecturesUseful to have – Node, Angular, Backbone, Require, Underscore, Java, Scala or C++', 'If you are a Software Engineer who enjoys building cutting edge solutions from scratch, with the freedom to architect and engineer at scale, please do not hesitate to apply!', 'Experience working with large scale enterprise web applications', 'Build out a set of greenfield products and features from scratch, utilizing the most modern web technologies', 'Design and engineer complex functionality on real-time, highly scalable data driven systems within finance/trading', 'Knowledge of UI architectures', 'This role would involve architecture and development of highly scalable web-based applications and features within a world class team using predominantly JavaScript (React, Angular or Node).', 'You’d be working in a highly profitable technology firm, who have a truly great engineering culture with flexibility and autonomy.', 'Software Engineer Responsibilities;', 'A financial technology engineering firm are building out their agile team with an aim to design and develop a highly scalable, real-time data driven applications for a Software Engineer with a UI focus.', 'Useful to have – Node, Angular, Backbone, Require, Underscore, Java, Scala or C++', 'Software Engineer – Big Data/Analytics (ReactJS) - $175k+']

['', 'Excellent problem solving and analytical skills to provide optimal solutions.', 'Job Description', 'JACKSONVILLE, FL OR', 'Languages', 'Experience using MS Office suite.', 'Experience with Agile methodologies.', 'Knowledge/Understanding of Microservices, Restful Web Services, REST APIs, and technologies such as Spring, Spring Boot.', 'Experience using requirement management systems and configuration management tools and processes.', 'Hitachi Rail USA', 'Ability to complete tasks in a timely manner while producing quality work.', 'Lifelong learner that shares, puts into practice, and teaches what you learn.', 'Accountabilities', 'SYSTEMENGINEER/BUSINESS ANALYST', 'Who We Are', 'Excellent organization and presentation skills.', 'Possess 2-5 years of experience as a systems engineer or business analyst for software applications.', 'Education', 'Experience interfacing/communicating with external customers.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Benefits', 'Ability to write clear, measurable, testable software requirements.', 'Experience and/or knowledge of rail related applications.', 'Experience creating a Requirement Traceability Matrix from test procedures back to requirements and customer specifications.', 'SQL/Relational Database Knowledge.', 'PITTSBURGH, PA', 'Experience in version control (Git, RTC, SVN).', 'Experience with Agile methodologies. Experience and/or knowledge of rail related applications. Experience interfacing/communicating with external customers. Experience supporting Bids and Proposals for new work. Experience creating a Requirement Traceability Matrix from test procedures back to requirements and customer specifications. Experience using requirement management systems and configuration management tools and processes. SQL/Relational Database Knowledge. ['', 'At Punch Through, our team and culture are everything to us. We value having empathy for one another and recognizing the challenges we are all going through, both inside and outside of the workplace. By doing so, we maximize our ability to help our team members be happy, successful, and comfortable being themselves.', 'Contribute to and review architecture design for embedded software development projects', 'Able to commit to work a minimum of 18 hours/week during Spring semester 2021 and 40 hours/week during Summer 2021 with an option to continue', "Desire and curiosity to learn new thingsCollege student pursuing a Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or another technical field with an embedded software emphasis\xa0Graduating Fall 2021 or laterAble to commit to work a minimum of 18 hours/week during Spring semester 2021 and 40 hours/week during Summer 2021 with an option to continueInterest in working on both consumer and medical productsExperience with CExperience with embedded development for microcontrollersExperience with Git", 'Growth:', 'Experience with Git', 'We know that when we work together, everything is better. At Punch Through, collaboration is our preferred approach. As an engineer, you’ll work with teammates from a variety of disciplines to accomplish a range of tasks. This includes technical tasks such as evaluating engineering and architectural approaches for systems that include components from embedded electronics to firmware to front end.\xa0', 'All About You', 'Visit https://punchthrough.com/ for more information on our organization.', 'Have experience writing or working with automated testing', 'Our Culture Statement', 'Collaboration:', 'Graduating Fall 2021 or later', 'Independence:', 'Curiosity: ', 'This position is based in Punch Through’s Minneapolis office. No relocation offered. Punch Through is currently operating fully remote and we expect to begin partially returning to our Minneapolis office at some point in 2021.\xa0', 'Punch Through’s culture is at the heart of what sets us apart from other companies. We take pride in our unique abilities and strive to do the best work in our industry. We never stop working to improve. We teach each other, we teach our clients, and we seek learning opportunities in all forms. We’re hungry for knowledge in the world and seek to leverage each other’s experiences. We’re building a company where everyone can be their best selves and have a meaningful impact on one another and on our industry.', 'You are an engineer who can develop firmware and embedded software for connected products. At Punch Through, this goes beyond just turning specifications into code. As a design services company, we work with clients at all phases of the product life cycle. This means your work will likely touch architecture design and specification development as well. Regardless of what you’re working on, it should be approached with careful consideration of engineering tradeoffs between technical fitness, scope, and schedule in order to make decisions that best serve the client’s needs.', "If this resonates with you, odds are you'll fit right in. If that’s the case, we want to hear from you! Please apply today! We look forward to getting to know you.", 'Have experience writing or working with automated testingHave experience with PythonHave experience with a variety of toolchains and development environmentsHave experience with Bluetooth Low Energy or other wireless protocolsAre familiar with Agile software development processesHave experience interacting with clientsHave experience debugging hardware using logic analyzer, oscilloscope, etc', 'Communicate technical details, progress, risks, etc., with teammates and client contacts.', 'Have experience debugging hardware using logic analyzer, oscilloscope, etc', 'Contribute to and review design and product requirement specifications.', 'Contribute to the continuous improvement of best practices and processes within the software engineering team.', 'Skills:', 'Communication:', 'Be great today, be better tomorrow. One of the unifying characteristics of the Punch Through team is a drive for continuous personal improvement. As an engineer at Punch Through, you’ll work in an environment that leads to technical and non-technical growth, both organically through work and communication with others, as well as through a structured, focused approach that involves mentorship with a senior engineer.', 'Contribute to Punch Through culture by proudly being yourself and striving to be great today and better tomorrow.', 'Have experience with Bluetooth Low Energy or other wireless protocols', "College student pursuing a Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or another technical field with an embedded software emphasis\xa0", 'Part of creating this environment of growth is making sure people feel comfortable to ask questions and make mistakes. As such, all our engineers strive to be ego-free and focus on working together with the team and clients, not against. Punch Through is a place where people feel comfortable saying what’s on their mind. All team members are encouraged to share their thoughts, regardless of whether it is specifically related to their position. This includes contributing to the continuous improvement of best practices and processes within the software engineering team and participating in the growth of the overall company culture.', 'Responsibilities:', 'At Punch Through, we believe in transparency, not only as a company, but as an approach for working with clients. We value clear, honest, and frequent communication. As an engineer, you’ll contribute to and potentially lead the communication of technical details and project direction with our client stakeholders.', "We know you are a student and you haven't yet started your professional career. What we look at is beyond your academic qualifications—we look at your grit and passion for learning. We want to hear about your personal or extracurricular projects and the problems that you’ve solved. We’d especially love to hear about projects involving embedded software on devices such as Arduino and Raspberry Pi.", 'You are definitely the one we are looking for if you also:', 'As an Associate Embedded Software Engineer at Punch Through, you’ll have the opportunity to work as part of a team of engineers to solve challenging problems on a project. This project could range from a proof of concept that shows a customer something can be done to a multi-year project where a solution is designed and built from the ground all the way up to mass production.', 'You’ll work as a developer on large challenging embedded software projects, so you must be motivated to operate and work independently. With that said, we are huge believers in collaborative efforts, so you can expect to work with an engineering mentor who will provide guidance and act as a resource for support and assistance when necessary.', 'Experience with embedded development for microcontrollers', 'Interest in working on both consumer and medical products', '\xa0', 'Have experience with Python', 'Experience with C', 'Develop embedded software for connected products', 'Learn new engineering topics and solve problems', 'Have experience with a variety of toolchains and development environments', 'Demonstrate independence and a decreasing need for work direction to succeed in engineering tasks.', 'Punch Through is a design services company. For more than a decade, people have come to us to get help building connected products. We love building products that make the world a better place and have a positive impact on people’s lives. Take a look at our website and you’ll see what we mean.', 'To be in it for the long-haul, we believe our employees should be relaxed, creative, and able to do great work without always needing to be serious. Transparency and honesty about who we are helps us to resolve internal and external conflict, develop deeper relationships, and most importantly, be happy.', 'Are familiar with Agile software development processes', 'We believe that if you aren’t curious about how the world works or you don’t challenge expectations, then you will never grow. Our team members relate with each other in large part due to our passion for learning and growing.', 'Punch Through is growing. We have a variety of projects that are either in progress or beginning soon. We are looking to hire a student studying Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a similar technical field with an embedded software emphasis for an internship.', 'Have experience interacting with clients', 'Requirements:', 'Desire and curiosity to learn new things', 'Develop embedded software for connected productsLearn new engineering topics and solve problemsContribute to and review architecture design for embedded software development projectsCommunicate technical details, progress, risks, etc., with teammates and client contacts.Contribute to and review design and product requirement specifications.Demonstrate independence and a decreasing need for work direction to succeed in engineering tasks.Contribute to the continuous improvement of best practices and processes within the software engineering team.Contribute to Punch Through culture by proudly being yourself and striving to be great today and better tomorrow.']

['', 'Personalis is a genome-scale diagnostics company pioneering genome-guided medicine.\xa0Our research and clinical products are focused on helping diagnose and treat cancer and inherited genetic disease.\xa0Located in Menlo Park, CA, we are seeking a talented and highly motivated Senior Software Engineer (Front End) to join our team.', 'Prior experience in biotech, health care, or genomics are a plus', 'Good communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Design, develop and maintain enterprise software platforms and products such as web portals, workflow management, automated genetic data interpretation and reporting.\xa0You are expected to work with a highly talented staff of diverse expertise to clarify requirements, develop next generation software that will assist our comprehensive deployment).', 'Create high quality user interfaces with strong attention to user experience and visual design.Design and develop clean, reusable, and scalable front-end code.Implement modern user principal design objective.Provide support for business continuity as necessary.Work in a collaborative, fast paced, startup environment.Identify challenges or inefficiencies and communicate with react hooks & functional components.', 'Familiarity with Node.js libraries such as Express.js and Next.js.', 'BS. or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related fieldPrior experience in biotech, health care, or genomics are a plus', 'Identify challenges or inefficiencies and communicate proactively.', 'EDUCATION', 'Provide support for business continuity as necessary.', knowledge and experience with HTML5, CSS3, and CSS preprocessors such as SCSS or LESS.', 'Ability to rapidly deliver on commitments.', 'Work in a collaborative, fast paced, startup environment.', 'Experience with the latest web development standards including: ES6, Webpack, HTML5, and CSS3.', 'Experience with visualization libraries such as D3 or Google Charts.', 'Define API requirements keeping simplicity, responsiveness, usability and scale as a principal design objective.', 'Experience with front-end UI libraries like Bootstrap.', 'Strong knowledge and experience of JavaScript React, and Node.js.', 'Strong experience in building applications on the top RESTful APIs.', '\xa0', 'BS. or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field', '\xa0Our priority is to obtain the most accurate genetic data from each sample, and then to draw the reliable medically focused conclusions from these. Our tests are based on next generation sequencing, conducted in our state-of-the art laboratory. We analyze results utilizing proprietary databases, advanced human reference sequences, and sophisticated algorithms.', 'Strong sense of web designs and user experience fundamentals.', 'Responsibilities', 'Implement modern user interfaces and visuals for dashboards, workflow management, reporting and analytics, and customer management.', '5+ years of experience in software development including user-facing software.', '\xa0If you are passionate about applying your talent and experience in Software Engineering towards helping patients with cancer and genetic disease, join us!\xa0', 'Create high quality user interfaces with strong attention to user experience and visual design.', 'Personalis is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Minorities/Females/Veterans/Disabilities.\xa0Personalis offers a competitive compensation package.\xa0', 'Familiarity with the whole web stack and protocols.', 'Requirements', '5+ years of experience in software development including user-facing software.Strong knowledge and experience of JavaScript React, and Node.js.Strong knowledge and experience with HTML5, CSS3, and CSS preprocessors such as SCSS or LESS.Strong experience in building applications on the top RESTful APIs.Experience with front-end UI libraries like Bootstrap.Experience working with react hooks & functional components.Experience with visualization libraries such as D3 or Google Charts.Experience writing unit, functional, integration tests and familiarity with latest react testing libraries.Familiarity with Node.js libraries such as Express.js and Next.js.Experience with the latest web development standards including: ES6, Webpack, HTML5, and CSS3.Strong sense of web designs and user experience fundamentals.Experience with JavaScript optimization and browser performance.Familiarity with the whole web stack and protocols.Ability to rapidly deliver on commitments.Good communication and interpersonal skills.']

methodologies and tools', 'Meet eligibility requirements to work in the US', 'Incorporated in 2008, Boku is one of the world’s leading providers of carrier billing and mobile identity solutions. Using nothing more than a user’s mobile phone, Boku’s technology can verify a user’s identity, execute a payment, or provision a new service, radically simplifying common, everyday mobile interactions between consumers and businesses. This is possible because Boku’s platform can access the internal billing, identity, and sales systems of mobile operators globally. Businesses who utilize Boku’s platform include major brands such as Apple, Google, Microsoft, Sony, Facebook, Spotify, Netflix, Paypal, Experian, Fiserv, Western Union, Uber, and Discover. Boku was originally financed through top-tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures, Khosla Ventures, and NEA.
