['', 'Contribute to the successful volume manufacture of medical devices to detect cardiovascular conditions and improve patient\xa0care.', "In 2015, we launched the Eko Core Digital Stethoscope, the first FDA-cleared digital stethoscope on the market to wirelessly stream heart and lung sounds to HIPAA-compliant software. It is now used by clinicians at over 1000 hospitals & health systems around the globe and was recognized as a “Best Invention of the Year” by TIME Magazine.\xa0Eko's latest FDA-cleared device, DUO, is the first combined digital stethoscope and ECG cardiac monitor with cardiac AI for in-clinic and at-home monitoring, offering 28 million heart disease patients the ability to seamlessly send cardiac data to their physicians.\xa0", 'Qualifications', 'Be responsible for electronics, sensor and system design for low power medical products', 'Eko was established in 2013 and has offices in Oakland and San Francisco.\xa0\xa0', 'Maintain thorough documentation of process and tests', 'Job Description:', 'Eko is a venture-backed digital health company which harnesses the power of smartphones and cloud data for screening and monitoring individuals with cardiovascular diseases. We have built a platform of non-invasive cardiovascular monitoring devices, clinical software, and point-of-care decision support software to improve the delivery of cardiovascular care.', 'About the company:', 'Work closely with Firmware and Mechanical engineers\xa0\xa0', 'Bachelors’ or Masters degree in Bioengineering, Electrical Engineering or related technical discipline', '3+ years of experience in mid/high volume manufacturing of electronic devices', 'Coordinate\xa0and/or lead integration and verification\xa0efforts.', 'Manage\xa0the configuration management\xa0process.Organize\xa0design reviews and provide the systems engineering content\xa0therein.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'As a Senior Systems Engineer at Eko, you will:', 'Experience in physiological sensing applications', 'Senior Systems Engineer', 'Nice to Haves', 'Help\xa0design the next generation of non-invasive cardiac monitoring devices', 'Work collaboratively with Manufacturing, Supply chain and Quality teams at\xa0Eko.Work\xa0across multiple hardware disciplines (electrical, mechanical, acoustic) with deep expertise in at least one hardware discipline', 'Coordinate\xa0and oversee testing for various regulatory standards, such as EMC, FCC, and medical device regulations.', 'Identify\xa0system product risks and\xa0mitigations.', 'Have expertise in board level circuit design and wireless communication\xa0', 'Work with the project team to communicate requirements, risks, and cross functional\xa0issues.', 'Experienced in ISO 13485 medical device development', 'Experience in audio products']

['', 'Languages:', 'Own projects from inception to production and provide clear communication to product and business teams', 'Quick Hits:', 'Integrate\xa0is a rapidly growing, venture-backed enterprise SaaS business that helps B2B marketers grow revenue and reduce costs. We unify demand marketing channels into a single, powerful platform that help organizations achieve quantifiable business outcomes.', 'Integrate\xa0', 'We have a top-tier client list that includes Dell, Cisco, Salesforce, VMWare, Rackspace, Microsoft and more. Our name defines our purpose. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Workplace Ops & Productivity
job_text: ['', 'Experience in project management, mentoring or leadership.', 'Design scalable, robust systems and advocate for best practices in testing, CI/CD and other SDLC processes.', 'The Engineering Workplace Operations and Productivity team supports a large technology portfolio that facilitates employee operations and efficiency on Bloomberg Terminal and Mobile Professional platforms. As gatekeepers of the Bloomberg brand, we provide exciting experiences to Bloomberg clients, vendors and visitors, along with direct impact on the productivity of 20,000 employees globally that interact with our systems on a daily basis. ', 'Be passionate about full-stack development and enthusiastic about acquiring functional and technical knowledge of a large product portfolio with visible firm-wide impact.', 'Our ubiquitous presence is realized throughout Bloomberg offices in domains ranging from location and space management, facilities management, event execution, project/task management, site maintenance/audits, timesheet billing, emergency procedures, appointment scheduling, room reservation, occupancy utilization, audio/video conferencing and software asset management. Some of our systems such as appointment scheduling are critical to the enterprise with nearly 100,000 hits a day.', 'Experience in designing and maintaining distributed systems or mission-critical software.Experience in front-end development using JavaScript/TypeScript.Experience in queuing technologies like RabbitMQ and Kafka.Experience in mobile/web app development using Node.js and React.Experience or interest in natural language processing or machine learning applications.Experience in project management, mentoring or leadership.', '3+ years of professional experience in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithms and programming languages (Python or C# NET strongly preferred).Professional experience in relational databases (PostgreSQL or SQL Server strongly preferred).Professional experience working in a Linux/Unix environment.Professional experience in automated testing and all SDLC phases.BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field.', "Bloomberg, the global business and financial information and news leader, gives influential decision makers a critical edge by connecting them to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas. The company's strength - delivering data, news and analytics through innovative technology, quickly and accurately - is at the core of the Bloomberg Professional service, which provides real time financial information to more than 300,000 subscribers globally. Bloomberg's enterprise solutions build on the company's core strength, leveraging technology to allow customers to access, integrate, distribute and manage data and information across organizations more efficiently and effectively.", 'Professional experience working in a Linux/Unix environment.', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Experience in mobile/web app development using Node.js and React.', 'Professional experience in automated testing and all SDLC phases.', '"Start with why", collaborate with stakeholders, and take on product ownership.', 'Experience in front-end development using JavaScript/TypeScript.', 'Our overarching goal is to build a workplace of the future using data-driven analytics coupled with scalable and smart solutions that combine software and hardware technologies. As part of full-stack development for desktop and mobile environments, we implement rich user interfaces (using JavaScript, Typescript, Node.js and React), powerful middleware (using Python, C# .NET and .NET Core), and high-performance databases (using SQL Server and PostgreSQL). Team members contribute to all SDLC phases, ranging from requirements through release, utilizing the Agile software development methodology. ', 'Experience or interest in natural language processing or machine learning applications.', 'Experience in designing and maintaining distributed systems or mission-critical software.', '3+ years of professional experience in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithms and programming languages (Python or C# NET strongly preferred).', 'Professional experience in relational databases (PostgreSQL or SQL Server strongly preferred).', 'Be passionate about full-stack development and enthusiastic about acquiring functional and technical knowledge of a large product portfolio with visible firm-wide impact.Design scalable, robust systems and advocate for best practices in testing, CI/CD and other SDLC processes."Start with why", collaborate with stakeholders, and take on product ownership.', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field.', 'Experience in queuing technologies like RabbitMQ and Kafka.']

['', '\xa0Required Skills:', 'Preferred Skills:', '8-10 years of professional programming experience working in engineering departments developing in Java, Python, node.js, or equivalent.', '\xa0Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', '\xa0Preferred Skills:', 'Strong knowledge of relational SQL and noSQL databases', 'We value being able to think up new solutions to problems and be able to develop prototypes and POCs to validate ideas quickly. You will be challenged to think creatively for the best solutions to any given project.', 'Strong documentation skills (Markdown, you like GitHub READMEs), and the ability to communicate requirements to other team members and project stakeholders.', 'Experience in designing and developing the fault-tolerant and scalable distributed systems', '\xa0Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operationsArchitect the services and infrastructure to democratize data across our products, APIs, data science team and customers.Determine optimal solutions for integrating data from a variety of sources for projects and migrating data to central Data LakeComfortable being given clear project goals & objectives, and being empowered for discovering optimal solutions.You have a strong preference for automation and making tasks easy and repeatable. Single use scripts and one-off tasks are best to be avoided.', 'Working knowledge of scheduling tools like Airflow, AWS Batch, Luigi, etc.', 'Trepp is searching for individuals to join our Technology Group as a Senior Data Infrastructure Engineer. We are looking for someone excited by the prospect of optimizing or even re-designing our company’s data architecture to support our next generation of products and data initiatives. We provide a collaborative team environment where our technologists work closely with product and subject matter experts in addition to other technology team members and are empowered to impact the organization through leadership, creativity, and innovation.', 'Architect the services and infrastructure to democratize data across our products, APIs, data science team and customers.', 'You have a strong preference for automation and making tasks easy and repeatable. Single use scripts and one-off tasks are best to be avoided.', 'About Trepp, LLC\xa0', 'Trepp, LLC is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer, complying with all laws governing employment in each jurisdiction in which operating, and provides equal opportunity to all applicants and employees. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, marital or protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, and other status protected by applicable laws.\xa0', '\xa0Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent (advanced degree preferred)8-10 years of professional programming experience working in engineering departments developing in Java, Python, node.js, or equivalent.Deep experience with Cloud services such as Lake Formation, RDS, Elasticache, EMRExperience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data setsExperience using big data technologies, such as Spark, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Logging & Analysis SystemsStrong knowledge of relational SQL and noSQL databasesExperience in designing and developing the fault-tolerant and scalable distributed systemsStrong documentation skills (Markdown, you like GitHub READMEs), and the ability to communicate requirements to other team members and project stakeholders.', 'Trepp, founded in 1979, is a leading provider of data, analytics, and technology solutions to the global securities and investment management industries. Trepp specifically serves three key sectors: structured finance, commercial real estate, and banking to help market participants meet their objectives for surveillance, credit risk management, and investment performance. Trusted by the industry for the accuracy of its proprietary data, Trepp provides clients with sophisticated, comprehensive models and analytics. Trepp is wholly owned by Daily Mail and General Trust (DMGT).', '\xa0Responsibilities:', 'Deep experience with Cloud services such as Lake Formation, RDS, Elasticache, EMR', 'The Data Engineering Group at Trepp is responsible for processing data from numerous vendors, information providers, and data sources and pipelining this data to our newly formed data lake, and further downstream applications. The team will be responsible for existing pipelines and systems while simultaneously developing new data services. This team, combined with our Product Groups are always thinking of new products and ways to deliver information to our clients to make our tools and applications easier to use, and better integrate with customer workflows.', 'Financial Services, Artificial Intelligence and/or Machine Learning', 'Experience using big data technologies, such as Spark, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Logging & Analysis Systems', 'Determine optimal solutions for integrating data from a variety of sources for projects and migrating data to central Data Lake', '\xa0A drive to work on financial data systems & pipelines and improve them through the usage of Cloud Architectures', 'Comfortable being given clear project goals & objectives, and being empowered for discovering optimal solutions.', 'About Trepp, LLC', 'Knowledge of entitlements and Authorization systems to manage data and API access', 'Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States and with Trepp (i.e., H1-B visa, F-1 visa (OPT), TN visa or any other non-immigrant status).\xa0', '\xa0A drive to work on financial data systems & pipelines and improve them through the usage of Cloud ArchitecturesWorking knowledge of scheduling tools like Airflow, AWS Batch, Luigi, etc.Knowledge of entitlements and Authorization systems to manage data and API accessFinancial Services, Artificial Intelligence and/or Machine Learning', 'Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets', '\xa0Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent (advanced degree preferred)']

ability to understand SQL query plans and develop solutionsIn-depth knowledge of Microsoft-focused software systems and their architecturesOO knowledge and practical experience of design patternsPractical experience with source code configuration, versioning, and promotionExcellent problem solving, issue identification and technical documentation skillsAbility to manage multiple concurrent priorities and meeting deadlinesStrong interpersonal and communication skillsExperience using VS 2017/19, SQL Server 2014/2017, .Net 4.7/Core & C# 6, 7 techniquesAgile software methodology experienceExperience working in a SaaS modelExperience working in environments with a DevOps Culture and exposure to Continuous Delivery is a great plusJoining us is more than saying “yes” to making the world a healthier place. If this sounds like the workplace for you, apply now!", 'Agile software methodology experience']

['Essential', 'This position can be based out of our Lake Mary, FL location, or virtual. ', 'We are looking for a dedicated, hard-working Mid Software Engineer to complement our existing engineeringstaff. Primary responsibilities include, but are not limited to: software design, software development, databasedesign, testing, and product support. This position is eligible for remote employment.', 'The skills that we need:Essential• Strong verbal/written communication skills• Enjoys learning and overcoming challenges• Experience in Agile Software Development methodologies• Competency in one or more: Golang, Python, C#, C/C++• Understanding of concurrency and creating highly-concurrent systems• Ability to work effectively across multiple, distributed teams• Ability to independently manage time and priorities• Deep understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.)• Linux use and basic administration• Version Control (git)• Automated testing• Atlassian stack: JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket• 3+ years experience in enterprise software engineering', 'The right individual will share our passion and Mission to Save and Improve Lives by making the Internet safer.Team Cymru is THE LEADER in Internet intelligence providing unparalleled global coverage and insight tobetter monitor, analyze, and predict online activity.', 'Highly Desirable', 'Highly Desirable• Web Development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery)• No-SQL databases (Elastic, Apache Cassandra, Mongo DB, etc.)• Message bus-based architecture and implementation (Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.)• Continuous Integration/Deployment tools (Bamboo, Jenkins, etc)• Linux use and basic administration: CentOS• 5+ years experience in enterprise software engineering• B.S. Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, InformationTechnology, or related', 'As a Software Engineer at Team Cymru, you will be at the forefront of threat intelligence and surrounded byhighly experienced professionals in the field of Internet Security. We are a group that is passionate aboutmaking the Internet a safer place by helping identify the “who” behind malicious activity. Our softwareengineers utilize a wide range of skills and technologies to create and enhance the products and services used byour customers. We select those who are passionate about technology and want to help make a real difference ina way that affects people around the world.', 'Team Cymru is a fast paced, team-oriented environment working across multiple time zones. We offer afantastic culture, an excellent benefits package to our employees, including commensurate compensation,medical, and dental PPO.', 'The most important benefit of working at Team Cymru is the privilege of being part of a company that worksevery day towards accomplishing our Mission: To Save and Improve Lives', 'What We Offer:', 'Benefits• Full benefits• Substantial PTO• Company-matched 401(k) plan']

job_title: Sr. Software Engineer (.Net-C# or .ASP.Net) Denver or REMOTE
job_text: ['', 'Financial/Mortgage industry experience is a plus.', 'Job Specifications', 'Agile/Scrum development.', 'Proven ability to work autonomously, independent thinker with strong communication/interpersonal skills', 'Proven ability to quickly understand client requirements and translate them into software developer requirements', 'In depth understanding of relational, transactional, non-relational, and warehousing database technologies and techniques (SQL Server, MySQL, DynamoDB, Redshift, ElasticSearch).', 'The Senior Software Engineer is responsible for designing and developing high performance and scalable solutions that extract, transform, and load data. the Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for the analysis, design, coding, integration, implementation, and support of custom and packaged software applications for various projects and applications; facilitating or performing analysis of business requirements and create or approve detailed program design specifications for high complexity user interfaces, application enhancements, new functionality, and backend processes in collaboration with customers, Business System Analysts, and other project team members. Seeking someone with 10+ years of experience looking to step into a Senior position.', 'Strong team orientation', '10 + years of programming experience.Extensive experience building services using Microsoft .NET technologies (ASP, C#).Scripting skills in at least one of the following: Perl, Python, Powershell, Bash, or Ruby.In depth understanding of relational, transactional, non-relational, and warehousing database technologies and techniques (SQL Server, MySQL, DynamoDB, Redshift, ElasticSearch).ETL and data integration exprience (SSIS, Alteryx, Informatica).Experience with cloud based infrastructures and services (AWS, Azure)Understanding of Continuous Integration/Development techniques (Git, Subversion, TFS, Jenkins, Bamboo).Familiarity with reporting platforms and design (SSRS, Tableau, Microstrategy).Agile/Scrum development.Financial/Mortgage industry experience is a plus.', 'Takes ownership of actions and outcomes', 'Ability to manage multiple assignments/projects simultaneously.', 'Primary Duties and Responsibilities', 'Knowledge:', 'Analysis, design, coding, integration, implementation, and support of custom and packaged software applications. Datassential is a full-service firm offering both syndicated and custom research solutions to a number of Fortune 500 clients. Datassential also has the largest and most accurate menu database in the marketplace today. If you are looking for a fast-paced, entrepreneurial business environment, this is the company for you.', 'Batch and Stream processing of large volumes of data using OTS technologies.', 'As a Principal Engineer at Datassential, you will have a visible role in designing and building scalable, data-driven applications from the ground up while working with multiple on-shore and off-shore teams. You will report directly to the CTO and help drive innovation on our product line as well as internal software development processes.', 'All interested candidates are required to submit a resume. job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Backend Feature Team
job_text: ['', "What You'll Be Doing", 'We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions.', 'Visibility', 'You have used Feature or Release Toggles as a code branching strategy.', 'Building containerized web application services in Python that empower users to work on large data sets in a responsive manner.', 'Free catered lunches every day, as well as free snacks and beverages* ', 'AI', "DISCO's Technology Stack", 'Creating services that enable users to build complex search queries that remain responsive while spanning terabytes of data.', 'Ability to design and implement a layered application architecture that can be easily changed to accommodate evolving business requirements.', 'Be part of an autonomous, cross-functional team designing, building and operating strategic, user-focused feature sets.', 'Event Bus', 'You have experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) with an emphasis on a well-maintained testing pyramid.', 'CI/CD', 'Benefits, including medical, dental and vision insurance, as well as 401(k)', 'Programming Languages', 'We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building.', 'Cloud Provider: ', 'Opportunity to be a part of a company that is revolutionizing the legal industry', 'Open, inclusive, and fun environment', 'A Great Candidate Can Deliver Real Customer Value While Pursuing ‘high Marks’ On These Architecture Quality Attributes', 'Perks of DISCO', ' Be part of an autonomous, cross-functional team designing, building and operating strategic, user-focused feature sets. Creating services that enable users to build complex search queries that remain responsive while spanning terabytes of data. Building containerized web application services in Python that empower users to work on large data sets in a responsive manner. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft.', ' We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market. Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. His unparalleled insights into the fundamental issues in legal and the potential of technology and artificial intelligence to change our market at its core provide the guiding light for DISCO’s long-term strategy. We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world. We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building. As a rule, we don’t commit to external product delivery dates as we believe that unnecessarily constrains our creativity from both a product and technology point of view. At DISCO respect isn’t earned at DISCO it is assumed. Good humans inherently treat everyone respectfully. This is a very important concept at DISCO. Given the high caliber of talent, the cutting-edge cloud-based technology stack, and thoughtful and novel product and design approach, you’ll find yourself learning at a rate you’ve not likely experienced in your career. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life. Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way. We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions. Finally, while we’re an incredibly fast-growing organization, as a rule, we do not work crazy long hours. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life.', 'Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. ['', 'GENERAL SUMMARY:', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Hunger to be a subject matter expert - knowing how the current systems and solutions work and able to research areas they are less familiar with using context and development environments', 'While recognized as an independent solutions provider for the digital media landscape, EMX also serves as the technology and programmatic division for its parent, ENGINE — a global data-driven marketing company serving advertising’s most recognized brands.', 'Be able to articulate and make intelligent trade-offs between multiple/possible engineering solutions to business problems', 'Experience building complex, scalable, high-frequency applications', 'JOB DESCRIPTION:', '5+ years of experience using combinations of JavaScript, NodeJS, Typescript, PHP, Python, Kafka, SQL, PostgreSQL, and AWS Products', 'Title', 'Ability to thoroughly understand business requirements in order to build the right engineering solutions to solve business problems', 'Strong foundation in computer science, with competencies in data structures, algorithms, databases, software design, and DevOps', 'Ability to thoroughly understand engineering requirements to address existing as well as new concerns', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Drive complex features from start to finish (meaning code pushed to production) with minimal direction', 'EMX is a leading marketing technology company, leveraging a patented, end-to-end tech stack purpose-built to meet the demands of today’s digital marketplace. The company creates both open and closed-loop solutions designed to unify advertisers, platforms and publishers across digital media channels — including Advanced TV, Video, Display, Search & Social.', 'Partner with engineering and product management to architect and implement new features on our platformDrive complex features from start to finish (meaning code pushed to production) with minimal directionCollaborate with other engineering teams to minimize dependencies and mitigate blockersBe able to articulate and make intelligent trade-offs between multiple/possible engineering solutions to business problemsHunger to be a subject matter expert - knowing how the current systems and solutions work and able to research areas they are less familiar with using context and development environmentsServe as a peer mentor to junior members of the team, including working closely with teammates collaborating on efforts and reviewing code with one another', 'We, ENGINE, are an equal opportunity employer. We strive to promote an organizational environment that values diversity and fosters growth.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran,\xa0or any other basis prohibited by law.', 'Proud of clean, modular code that is scalable and secure', 'EMX is looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to design, develop, deliver, and keeping alive EMX products and services with a thirst to innovate and lead in the space. We look for self-starters who thrive in a fast-paced, Agile environment; those who love wearing many hats, are able to design and develop high traffic and large scale systems and are able to change direction quickly will thrive at EMX. For this specific position, we’re looking for individuals that are in their comfort zone spending most of their time in systems and backend engineering. If you have a passion for bringing new concepts to life, experience or interest in the ad tech world, and love using the latest technologies, then join us.', '\xa0', 'Partner with engineering and product management to architect and implement new features on our platform', 'Ability to communicate clearly with engineering and product management', 'Title: Senior Software Engineer, Exchange', 'We operate in a world where 2 extra milliseconds of latency can make or break functionality so knowing when and where to prioritize efficiency and how to best use both your system’s time as well as your own is a must. Looking to both learn new practices and technologies as well as to mentor and leverage existing experience will be key to putting your best foot forward on this next step in your career. If you take the four values of Agile software development to heart, you’ll find not only a great fit here with this position but a great team to collaborate and cross-pollinate with. The ideal candidate will want to work hard to push themselves, their team, and our products to use cutting edge, clean code to deliver a great experience for all involved in the product lifecycle.', '5+ years of experience using combinations of JavaScript, NodeJS, Typescript, PHP, Python, Kafka, SQL, PostgreSQL, and AWS ProductsExperience building complex, scalable, high-frequency applicationsAbility to thoroughly understand business requirements in order to build the right engineering solutions to solve business problemsAbility to thoroughly understand engineering requirements to address existing as well as new concernsStrong foundation in computer science, with competencies in data structures, algorithms, databases, software design, and DevOpsProud of clean, modular code that is scalable and secureAbility to communicate clearly with engineering and product management', 'Collaborate with other engineering teams to minimize dependencies and mitigate blockers', 'Serve as a peer mentor to junior members of the team, including working closely with teammates collaborating on efforts and reviewing code with one another']

['', 'Own, manage, and lead a team of developers.Partner with leadership to drive the evolution of our platform architecture, enabling development teams to sustainably deliver differentiating innovation to our users and drive business growth.Scale user experience frameworks across the platform to be seamless and delightful.Dive into the codebase when necessary to triage issues and be a technical guide to the developers on the team.Recruit, develop, and mentor a mix of new and seasoned technical leaders and engineers.Foster the engineering team brand and culture - including continual and incremental value delivery, collaboration, and empathy.Help shape team and product/technical vision across domains, incorporating this vision to shape the engineering team strategy.', 'The Role', 'Someone who loves to learn and is passionate about helping others.', 'Partner with leadership to drive the evolution of our platform architecture, enabling development teams to sustainably deliver differentiating innovation to our users and drive business growth.', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup.', '10-15+ years of building and scaling applications in Python and/or JavaScript.', 'We’re looking for a Lead Software Engineer to help our Chief Product and Technology Officer launch a new self-serve platform for our customers. The role is a hybrid between an individual contributor and a managerial role where you’re expected to lead by example and grow a team under you. We’re growing out this new product due to an increased demand from our customers and believe that there will be lots of room for learning and growth on the team.\xa0', 'A degree in Computer Science or an equivalent engineering foundation.Prior application development experience in Pharmacy Benefit Administration is highly desirable.10-15+ years of building and scaling applications in Python and/or JavaScript.Prior leadership experience.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup.Someone who loves to learn and is passionate about helping others.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Prior application development experience in Pharmacy Benefit Administration is highly desirable.', 'Scale user experience frameworks across the platform to be seamless and delightful.', 'Own, manage, and lead a team of developers.', 'Lead Software Engineer - Python, JavaScript, SaaS - Base + Equity - Jersey City, NJ', 'Dive into the codebase when necessary to triage issues and be a technical guide to the developers on the team.', 'Foster the engineering team brand and culture - including continual and incremental value delivery, collaboration, and empathy.', 'A degree in Computer Science or an equivalent engineering foundation.', 'Recruit, develop, and mentor a mix of new and seasoned technical leaders and engineers.', '\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Prior leadership experience.', 'Help shape team and product/technical vision across domains, incorporating this vision to shape the engineering team strategy.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Site Reliability Engineering
job_text: ['', 'Experience with best in class application monitoring (APM) tooling', 'Championing automation efforts to reduce or eliminate manual processes', 'Maturing the environment readiness and QA activities by additional automationUnderstanding new technology capabilities needed to acquire and develop programmer/developer talentLeading the efforts to build robust monitoring solutions while expanding our current monitoring and alerting footprintLeading emergency response efforts in conjunction with field engineering leadership to establish root cause analysis and permanent solutions to improve availability, response and recovery timesChampioning capacity management effortsEnsuring applications are performing efficiently, collaborating with application teams to resolve application performance issues.Managing change control for applications and platformsChampioning automation efforts to reduce or eliminate manual processesCoaches and mentors engineering or other SRE team members. Utilizes Agile and Lean practices to identify and solve systemic issues.Consults with management in the analysis of short- and long-range business requirements and recommends innovations.Utilizes tools to support data-driven decision-making. Identifies and removes blockers to enable the team to meet business goals.Direct, hands-on, technical contribution to highly complex software endeavors which range from design and coding to aiding with implementation\xa0Review designs with an eye toward increasing the holistic stability of our platform and identifying potential risks.', 'As a Site Reliability Engineer you will address system instability through monitoring, fault tolerance, support tooling, capacity management and adoption of architecture patterns/practices within the platform. \xa0The engineer will pursue relentless identification and implementation of fault tolerance within a full stack of micro-service-oriented architecture ranging from low-level code resiliency to infrastructure availability.', 'Championing capacity management efforts', 'Contribute to the reliability strategy and implementation of complex problem solving within one of the largest Philips flag ship platform and application solutions. As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer, you will either participate within the core SRE team or act as a partner to an existing feature team. You will advocate and act as a subject matter expert for Philip’s infrastructure within your product area using communication to manage a variety of global initiatives.', 'group to support and maintain our distributed cloud based Micro-service application. The SRE team is an integral part of ensuring that our applications are resilient as well as performant to keep our customers satisfied', 'Additional responsibilities include:', 'US work authorization is a precondition of employment. The company will not consider candidates who require sponsorship fora work-authorized visa.\xa0 ', 'In this role, you have the opportunity to', 'Working experience with SQL and NoSQL storage', 'Experience\xa0with Python, Ansible (or similar) is a plus', 'Consults with management in the analysis of short- and long-range business requirements and recommends innovations.', 'Understanding new technology capabilities needed to acquire and develop programmer/developer talent', 'Has worked with Agile methodologies', 'In return, we offer you', 'Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 3 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways.', 'Leading emergency response efforts in conjunction with field engineering leadership to establish root cause analysis and permanent solutions to improve availability, response and recovery times', 'The Site Reliability Engineering team extends our current DevOps competency and works in conjunction with the Engineering', 'Sharpen your talents with new challenges in our dynamic organization. As a market-driven company, we’re used to listening to our customers & apply the same thinking to our employees. We offer a competitive salary, outstanding benefits and flexibility in a career with a positive and supportive atmosphere in which to develop your talents further.', 'Managing change control for applications and platforms', 'You are responsible for', 'Leading the efforts to build robust monitoring solutions while expanding our current monitoring and alerting footprint', 'Utilizes tools to support data-driven decision-making. Identifies and removes blockers to enable the team to meet business goals.', 'The goal will be to reduce the toil involved in maintaining the operational ecosystem, replacing manual processes with tooling and automation, and bringing overall reliability to all internal/external functionality of an enterprise ecosystem.', 'Maturing the environment readiness and QA activities by additional automation', 'Review designs with an eye toward increasing the holistic stability of our platform and identifying potential risks.', 'Experience implementing RESTful service-oriented architectures with public APIs', 'To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there, you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.', 'Experience with web technologies such as: HTML / CSS / Javascript / JQuery / Angular / other front-end frameworks', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services and cloud software deployments', 'Company relocation benefits will not be provided for this position. Candidates need to live within commuting distance to this office.', 'Ensuring applications are performing efficiently, collaborating with application teams to resolve application performance issues.', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field", 'Experience with Linux; Docker and additional operations experience is a plus', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field7+ years’ experience in a technical software role dealing with complex enterprise software landscapes (devops focused development)Java software development experience delivering commercial SaaS solutionsExperience\xa0with Python, Ansible (or similar) is a plusHas worked with Agile methodologiesWorking experience with SQL and NoSQL storageExperience implementing RESTful service-oriented architectures with public APIsExperience with Amazon Web Services and cloud software deploymentsExperience with Linux; Docker and additional operations experience is a plusExperience with web technologies such as: HTML / CSS / Javascript / JQuery / Angular / other front-end frameworksExperience with third-party enterprise software integration & solutionsExperience in performance tuning, instrumentation and architecture best patterns and practicesExperience with best in class application monitoring (APM) toolingUS work authorization is a precondition of employment. Candidates need to live within commuting distance to this office.", '7+ years’ experience in a technical software role dealing with complex enterprise software landscapes (devops focused development)', 'Experience in performance tuning, instrumentation and architecture best patterns and practices', 'You are a part of', 'Why should you join Philips?', 'This role will initially be based in our Murrysville office. Philips will be relocating this office to a new site in Bakery Square, one of the premier locations in Pittsburgh. This is a very exciting time to be joining Philips, as this new location will be the Sleep & Respiratory Center of Excellence. The new office is set to open in late 2020.', 'Direct, hands-on, technical contribution to highly complex software endeavors which range from design and coding to aiding with implementation\xa0', 'Java software development experience delivering commercial SaaS solutions', 'Coaches and mentors engineering or other SRE team members. ['', 'Qualifications:', 'Applications:\xa0Only online applications/resumes will be accepted at: https://jobs.rose-hulman.edu until position is filled. Contact Human Resources at 812-877-8153 for questions.\xa0EEO/AA', 'Supervisory Responsibilities:\xa0May supervise interns that are added/involved with the project.', 'Qualifications:\xa0Bachelors’ degree in Software Engineering or Computer Science with 2 – 4 years of relevant experience required. Individual must have a sound knowledge of engineering fundamentals in their area of study and should be knowledgeable and experienced in as many as possible, but not necessarily all, of the following areas: Web application development, Mobile application development, Software testing and quality assurance, Cloud hosting: Amazon Web Services and/or Azure, Technical Project Management, Leading Technical Project Teams, Requirements & Scope Definition, Planning and Scheduling Projects, Monitoring & Tracking Projects, New Product Development, Managing Budgets.', 'Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'EEO/AA', 'Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0Serves as lead developer on projects and manages a team of a least ten student interns; mentors the students through the work on the projects and taking on a significant design and implementation roles when necessary; Provides RHV point of contact for clients and acts as on-going liaison among project sponsors and key stakeholders during critical stages of product development; Assists with technical and business evaluations of proposed client projects; Provides expertise for industry-related product development projects which includes developing design requirement documents, project plans, prototyping, and testing/quality assurance tasks; Serves as a mentor and role-model for student members of project teams which includes promulgation of desirable traits such as a strong work ethic, individual responsibility, and tenacity; Procures and coordinates resources as necessary for project success. Resources may include faculty, industry experts, equipment/software, contractors, vendors, and capital; Maintains accountability for all project success factors that are within a reasonable degree of control which includes taking ownership of aspects such as budget, progress, schedule, and scope; Remains current with technical areas of expertise; Other duties may be assigned.', 'Summary:\xa0', 'Supervisory Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Applications:\xa0', 'Summary:\xa0Manages and facilitates project teams, which consist of students, staff and faculty, responsible for the development of new products for RHV clients.']

', 'Our client is looking for a motivated Software Engineer to help shape and drive the future of their web and mobile products. ['', 'Define networking frameworks and APIs that will apply across the Tanzu products.Consult with internal VMware developers to ensure Tanzu adoption of these solutionsCollaborate with open source communities to ensure adoption in the wider Kubernetes ecosystem.Build Kubernetes components and plugins that will serve as reference implementations for other teams and ship as part of production commercial offerings.Contribute to open source Kubernetes projects.Become a local expert on Kubernetes networking.', 'Become a local expert on Kubernetes networking.', 'Experience building distributed systems, ideally in the Kubernetes or container networking domainCollaboration with Open Source communitiesOpenness to or experience with XP-flavor Agile Practices like pair programming, test driven development, and continuous integrationMinimum three to five years of professional software development experience', 'Build Kubernetes components and plugins that will serve as reference implementations for other teams and ship as part of production commercial offerings.', 'Ready to build? So are we. Come join VMware’s Connectivity APIs team. We build the networking foundation for our portfolio of products across the Modern Applications Business Unit (MAPBU). We do this by researching our product teams’ needs, understanding the Kubernetes networking ecosystem, and building modular pieces like Kubernetes controllers and custom resources. We work with Go, YAML, Kubernetes, and various open-source projects.We care deeply about collaboration, both with the open source community and within our own team. Externally, we deeply focus on the Kubernetes networking domain, where we strive to engage with the open source community. Internally, we encourage XP Agile practices like pair programming, test driven development, continuous integration. We believe sustainable pace and psychological safety foster creativity and a productive work environment. We build software and solve problems collaboratively. Teammates are always accessible to lend a helping hand both remotely and in-person.We prefer candidates based in Santa Monica, San Francisco or Seattle, but are open to candidates elsewhere who are able to work Pacific time zone hours.The OpportunityThe Connectivity APIs team is seeking a Software Engineer.In This Role You WillDefine networking frameworks and APIs that will apply across the Tanzu products.Consult with internal VMware developers to ensure Tanzu adoption of these solutionsCollaborate with open source communities to ensure adoption in the wider Kubernetes ecosystem.Build Kubernetes components and plugins that will serve as reference implementations for other teams and ship as part of production commercial offerings.Contribute to open source Kubernetes projects.Become a local expert on Kubernetes networking.Desired Skills & ExperienceExperience building distributed systems, ideally in the Kubernetes or container networking domainCollaboration with Open Source communitiesOpenness to or experience with XP-flavor Agile Practices like pair programming, test driven development, and continuous integrationMinimum three to five years of professional software development experienceWhat Is It Like To Work At VMware?We believe that teams should spend more of their time delivering incremental value and less on building infrastructure. We’re building platforms, tools, and automation, including Tanzu Application Service, Tanzu Kubernetes Grid, and Tanzu Mission Control, to enable our customers to easily and confidently develop and run the software that powers their business. Hundreds of companies rely on our platform to meet the needs of millions of their customers. Our engineers adopt appropriate processes as a way to go fast forever and deliver remarkable results. Our product managers and product designers work side-by-side with our engineers in small, empowered teams, using Lean and UCD as guides. We measure success by making our customers more productive, as both software developers and platform operators. We spend time with our customers to understand and build empathy for the jobs that they need to get done.', 'Remote: ', 'Experience building distributed systems, ideally in the Kubernetes or container networking domain', 'Define networking frameworks and APIs that will apply across the Tanzu products.', 'Posted Date:', 'In This Role You Will', 'Desired Skills & Experience', 'Category : ', 'Contribute to open source Kubernetes projects.', 'Minimum three to five years of professional software development experience', 'Full Time/ Part Time: ', 'Collaborate with open source communities to ensure adoption in the wider Kubernetes ecosystem.', 'Openness to or experience with XP-flavor Agile Practices like pair programming, test driven development, and continuous integration', 'Experience: ', 'Collaboration with Open Source communities', 'Subcategory: ', 'Consult with internal VMware developers to ensure Tanzu adoption of these solutions']

agencies: SnapLogic does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. SnapLogic provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. ", 'We are seeking a Sr. Systems Software Engineer to join our product development team in our Santa Barbara Corporate offices. ['Be able to quickly debug complex issues in code and figure out the root cause, using tests (unit and integration) to validate the work.', 'Contribute to the on-going development of SnapLogic Extreme and Snaplogic ELTBe able to quickly debug complex issues in code and figure out the root cause, using tests (unit and integration) to validate the work.Cycle between projects in weeks rather than years, while working closely with customers to harden an early stage product as it achieves product market fit.Keep on top of emerging trends and technologies\xa0 in the field of cloud technologies and distributed data processing, including open source products.', 'Hot Market', 'Interest in AI/ML technologies like MLlib, Scikit, tensorflow etc.', 'Nice to have:', 'The Role:', 'You have a pragmatic and customer-centric view of products and processes.', 'Industry Recognition: Industry experts have consistently recognized our company, products, customers and employees as best-in-class. innovator in their\xa02018 Big Data 100 List, and DBTA Magazine named SnapLogic among the\xa0Top 100 Companies That Matter Most in Data.', 'Experience with Database query optimization.', 'Contributions to open source projects like Spark, Hadoop, Flink, etc.', 'As a Senior/Principal Software Engineer, you will have a prominent role within the team that is responsible for two products - in cloud data warehouses like Snowflake and RedShift).We are seeking a detail-oriented candidate with outstanding technical abilities and accomplishments, a strong passion for technology and software Now:', 'What You’ll Do:', 'SnapLogic is seeking Principal/Senior Software Engineers (Java & Cloud Technologies) for our Big Data Engineering team in San Mateo, California.', 'To all recruitment agencies: SnapLogic does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to SnapLogic employees or to any other company location. SnapLogic is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with the company. SnapLogic provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. SnapLogic complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. SnapLogic expressly prohibits any form of unlawful employee harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of SnapLogic employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.', "Bachelor's or Master’ degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.", 'You have experience building and delivering enterprise SaaS software at scale in public cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)', 'You have excellent communication skills, are comfortable working with little supervision, and have a preference for taking initiative.', 'Vibrant Company Culture: We firmly believe that our people are our strongest asset as a company and we never lose sight of that belief. Our work environment, company programs and employee services are all geared to ensure our employees have challenging and meaningful roles along with a great place to do their best work. Our efforts to keep our culture thriving and strong are paying off: for two years’ running, we have been named a\xa0Bay Area Top Workplace\xa0and Mogul recently selected SnapLogic for their list of the\xa0Top 100 Companies for Millenial Women.', 'Company Momentum', 'Hot Market: With the proliferation of cloud applications and the increasing need to have a data-driven business, finding an integration technology is top of mind for many companies. If you have a disability and need assistance with any part of the application or interview process or have questions about workplace accessibility, please contact +1-262-754-5030 email job_posting@agilent.com. ['', 'Must be presently authorized to work in the U.S. without a requirement for work authorization sponsorship now or in the futureRequires 5+ years experience\xa0\xa0Object Oriented Programming techniques and methodologies in .NET/ C#Working with Spring MVC framework & REST API WebservicesResponsive web designRequires mastery of RESTful web services that meet industry standard maturity model', 'Requires mastery of RESTful web services that meet industry standard maturity model', 'Object Oriented Programming techniques and methodologies in .NET/ C#', 'Requires 5+ years experience\xa0\xa0', 'You will design, develop & deploy software; test, support & implement web-based applications; gather requirements; document business use cases & development processes; integrate applications with high-throughput automation; adhere to best practice coding standards & IT systems guidelines.', 'We are currently searching for a Lead Software Engineers utilizing .NET/C#!\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Must be presently authorized to work in the U.S. without a requirement for work authorization sponsorship now or in the future', 'Responsive web design', 'Working with Spring MVC framework & REST API Webservices']

['', 'A completed Bachelors Degree is required, preferably in Electrical or Computer Engineering', ' Hands on expertise and experience with OAM of cellular networks using Element Management Systems (EMS) preferred ', ' Proactive, self-starter, strong work ethic and ability to work well in a team environment ', ' Testing, Validation and optimization of new algorithms and features in a SW release ', ' Expertise in IP and related technologies including IPv4, IPv6, IPSEC, Routing protocols, Networking protocols, Security Protocols, SIP and working with switches, routers etc. ', ' Experience with scripting languages like TCL, Perl, Python for test automation preferred ', ' Expert-level understanding of Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) and user experience metrics ', ' Good working knowledge of 4G LTE, 5G NR technology and 3GPP standards ', 'Required Skills & Knowledge', ' Review product, feature requirements and provide feedback to engineering team. ', '  Define Test strategy, Test plans and perform Live Air Verification (LAV) tests and KPI benchmarking for new SW and HW releases of CommScope 4G, 5G small cell products   SW upgrades, HW installation, cabling and commissioning of LAV network   End to end network bring up and maintenance of the LAV network including RAN, Switches, Routers, EPC, Security Gateway, Application servers and UEs.   Testing, Validation and optimization of new algorithms and features in a SW release   Execute the LAV test plan and KPI benchmarking plan as per the agreed upon SW and HW release schedule   Operational measurements (OM), KPI and debug log analysis of LAV data to get to RCA of issues.   Perform RF and parameter optimization tests and analysis to drive KPI improvements   Review product, feature requirements and provide feedback to engineering team.   Review and provide feedback on technical documents written throughout the organization.   Continually evaluate, influence and advance LAV to improve testing and analysis processes and deliver carrier grade products to customers.  ', ' Summary: ', ' Continually evaluate, influence and advance LAV to improve testing and analysis processes and deliver carrier grade products to customers. ', ' Strong written and verbal communication skills. ', ' Perform RF and parameter optimization tests and analysis to drive KPI improvements ', ' Execute the LAV test plan and KPI benchmarking plan as per the agreed upon SW and HW release schedule ', ' Hands on experience and expertise with wireless data collection tools like QXDM, Wireshark, XCAL, NEMO, etc and lab equipment such as spectrum analyzer. ', ' 3+ years of experience working through system performance testing and product development life cycle of 4G LTE, 5G NR products at infrastructure OEM or LTE, 5G NR chipset vendors ', ' Subject matter expertise in end-to-end testing of LTE small cell or macro cell networks ', ' SW upgrades, HW installation, cabling and commissioning of LAV network ', ' Review and provide feedback on technical documents written throughout the organization. ', ' Experience with post processing tools like QCAT, XCAP, Windcatecher, Actix etc. ', ' Proven track record of performing end-to-end testing, troubleshooting and solving complex real world 4G LTE and/or 5G NR network and handset issues ', ' Broad knowledge in understanding the interaction of small cell and macro cellular networks ', ' CommScope is hiring a Systems Performance Engineer in Lowell MA ', 'Essential Duties & Responsibilities', ' Define Test strategy, Test plans and perform Live Air Verification (LAV) tests and KPI benchmarking for new SW and HW releases of CommScope 4G, 5G small cell products ', ' A completed Bachelors Degree is required, preferably in Electrical or Computer Engineering  3+ years of experience working through system performance testing and product development life cycle of 4G LTE, 5G NR products at infrastructure OEM or LTE, 5G NR chipset vendors   Proven track record of performing end-to-end testing, troubleshooting and solving complex real world 4G LTE and/or 5G NR network and handset issues   Subject matter expertise in end-to-end testing of LTE small cell or macro cell networks   Good working knowledge of 4G LTE, 5G NR technology and 3GPP standards   Broad knowledge in understanding the interaction of small cell and macro cellular networks   Hands on experience and expertise with wireless data collection tools like QXDM, Wireshark, XCAL, NEMO, etc and lab equipment such as spectrum analyzer.   Experience with post processing tools like QCAT, XCAP, Windcatecher, Actix etc.   Expertise in IP and related technologies including IPv4, IPv6, IPSEC, Routing protocols, Networking protocols, Security Protocols, SIP and working with switches, routers etc.   Expert-level understanding of Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) and user experience metrics   Experience with scripting languages like TCL, Perl, Python for test automation preferred   Hands on expertise and experience with OAM of cellular networks using Element Management Systems (EMS) preferred   Strong written and verbal communication skills.   Proactive, self-starter, strong work ethic and ability to work well in a team environment  ', ' Operational measurements (OM), KPI and debug log analysis of LAV data to get to RCA of issues. ', ' End to end network bring up and maintenance of the LAV network including RAN, Switches, Routers, EPC, Security Gateway, Application servers and UEs. ']

job_title: Staff Software Engineer, Machine Learning Platform
job_text: ['', 'Familiarity with practical challenges in ML systems such as feature extraction and definition, data validation, training, monitoring, and management of features and models.', 'Bonus points:', 'What would make you a strong fit:', 'As a Staff Engineer in the Machine Learning Platform team you will build tools and processes to manage, improve, and rapidly scale our platform. Specifically, you will', 'Experience with building an ML feature store for batch and real-time aggregation/serving.', 'Strong communication & collaboration skills, and a belief that team output is more important than individual output.', 'Lead architecture discussions to meet the requirement to serve hundreds of machine learning models at thousands of queries per second.', 'Design and build tools and processes to make the release of new machine learning models fast, easy, safe, and minimally disruptive.Lead architecture discussions to meet the requirement to serve hundreds of machine learning models at thousands of queries per second.Ensure that our\xa0systems can continue to scale rapidly while addressing rapidly evolving product team needs.Implement scalable, low-latency, high-throughput, fault-tolerant, extensible, and easily maintainable data processing pipelines for both batch and real-time systems.Champion and deliver cross-company machine learning initiatives.Motivate, listen and empathize, and help engineers and data scientists to excel.', 'Ensure that our\xa0systems can continue to scale rapidly while addressing rapidly evolving product team needs.', '8+ years of professional software development experience or an advanced degree in Computer Science (or a related field) with 5+ years of experience.Experience building highly available low-latency systems using Java, Scala, C++ or other object-oriented languages.Experience working with large datasets and best in class data processing technologies for both stream and batch processing, such as Apache Spark, Apache Beam, MapReduce.Familiarity with practical challenges in ML systems such as feature extraction and definition, data validation, training, monitoring, and management of features and models.Practical knowledge of how to build end-to-end ML workflows.Strong communication & collaboration skills, and a belief that team output is more important than individual output.Self-starter, with a quick learning curve.', 'The team does this by providing a platform which handles the common needs of the product teams including production system integration, model training, model availability, health and monitoring infrastructure for model serving, and a streamlined model release process.', 'Experience with building an ML feature store for batch and real-time aggregation/serving.Knowledge of GCP or AWS cloud stack for web services and big data processing.', 'Self-starter, with a quick learning curve.', 'Experience building highly available low-latency systems using Java, Scala, C++ or other object-oriented languages.', 'At Sift we enhance trust and safety in the digital world with our AI driven technology platform. Our products deliver payment protection, ensure content integrity, and protect account defense for businesses around the world. The Machine Learning Platform team exists to enable product teams to construct and operate their production machine learning services as effectively as possible.', '8+ years of professional software development experience or an advanced degree in Computer Science (or a related field) with 5+ years of experience.', 'Champion and deliver cross-company machine learning initiatives.', 'About the team:', 'Interested in learning more about our engineering teams? Check out our posts:\xa0https://engineering.sift.com/articles', 'Implement scalable, low-latency, high-throughput, fault-tolerant, extensible, and easily maintainable data processing pipelines for both batch and real-time systems.', 'Knowledge of GCP or AWS cloud stack for web services and big data processing.', 'Design and build tools and processes to make the release of new machine learning models fast, easy, safe, and minimally disruptive.', 'What you’ll do:', 'Motivate, listen and empathize, and help engineers and data scientists to excel.', 'Practical knowledge of how to build end-to-end ML workflows.', 'Experience working with large datasets and best in class data processing technologies for both stream and batch processing, such as Apache Spark, Apache Beam, MapReduce.']

['CDK Global knows you have passions outside of work.  You have family, friends, sporting events, and lots of things going on. ['', 'We started in 2018 by building a fitness app that focused on a training style called "time under tension training." In time, the fitness app became a general workout planner and tracker. When Train Centric became a subsidiary of Intellectual Ventures’ Invention Science Fund, we decided to sharpen our focus on the physical therapy world, using the training engine from our fitness app.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Equity', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience managing backend infrastructure\xa0', "Train Centric is a health and wellness subsidiary of Intellectual Ventures' Invention Science Fund that builds simple, usable technology for the fitness and physical therapy worlds.\xa0", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0If and when we go back into the office, an office with a door (and lots of free snacks)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of professional experience with Javascript, preferably Typescript\xa0', 'Our tech stack includes Typescript, NodeJS & Express, PostgreSQL, React Native, and Google Cloud for infrastructure.', 'Who we are looking for', 'Train Centric is a small and passionate team based in Bellevue, Washington. In addition to the core team, we have an incredible set of advisors with experience at Apple, Microsoft, Merill Lynch, and even a former Seahawks player.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of professional development experience developing backend applications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent written and verbal communication skills', "After in-depth research into the physical therapy market, we decided to build a tool, comprising of both software and hardware, used by physical therapists to manage home exercise programs and measure treatment adherence at home. This tool will lead to better patient results and cost savings for the healthcare system. In our modern world, 75% of patients who leave their physical therapy clinic receive their home exercise program on a piece of paper. And the majority of patients do not complete their assigned home exercise program. We're confident we can build something better.", 'We are an equal opportunity employer', 'About Us', 'Train Centric is seeking a Seattle/Bellevue based and skilled full-time Senior Backend Software Engineer that is excited about the opportunity to own and scale our backend. You should be a self-starter who is excited to learn and relentlessly solve many technical challenges. In this role, you will have the chance to make large code and infrastructure decisions, build innovative technologies, and be a leader.', 'Learn more about us at\xa0traincentricapp.com,\xa0instagram.com/train_centric, instagram.com/blue_physicaltherapy.', 'Benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with SQL', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Medical, dental, and vision insurance\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Flexible time off']

Selecting only the most talented and experienced consultants provides our clients with the best the industry has to offer. We take pride in attracting the world's finest business and technology consultants.Genesis10 is a business and technology consulting company with offices nationwide and in Canada. Founded in 1999, Genesis10 has more than 1,200 consultants specializing in project management, business analysis, business transformation and large-scale systems infrastructure and application integration for more than 100 companies, 85% of which are in the Fortune 500. Genesis10 services a variety of industries including banking and financial services, insurance, energy, manufacturing, healthcare, telecommunications and more. For more information, please visit www.genesis10.com.Genesis10 is seeking a Core .NET Healthcare Software Engineer for a contract opportunity for 12+ months in Austin, TX or 100% remoteWe are looking for a Principal Engineer to join our team of developers building back-end services for a diagnostic healthcare company's web applications. As a Principal focused on core web application development, you will need strong technical competence in multiple areas as well as the capacity to function well in an environment where you may not be the expert.The ideal candidate will combine the essentials of raw talent and a burning desire to succeed with a demonstrated history of working through complex business issues.You will lead and collaborate closely with a cross functional team of software developers to implement REST services that provide the business logic for our scheduling and referral web applications.The ideal candidate will be well versed in modern server-side architectural and design patterns, an expert in the practice of Clean Architecture principles, and experienced in designing and building cloud-first, scalable back-end services in C#/.Net Core.Job Responsibilities", 'Proactively identify and proposes new, alternative technology in order to create scalable implementations and achieve results.', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent training and experience", 'Work collaboratively across organizations to ensure alignment towards business goals', 'Cultivates innovation; introduces new and better ways for the organization to be successful', 'Typical Qualifications', '8+ years of experience in web application back-end development (C#, .NET Core)', 'Understand and follow coding conventions, architectures, and best practices; hold other members of the team accountable for doing soAct as the subject matter expert for area of assignmentWork collaboratively across organizations to ensure alignment towards business goalsCultivates innovation; introduces new and better ways for the organization to be successfulAbility to analyze and assess potential software designs with an eye towards finding the best solution for the businessWrite, debug, and deploy code to production. Deliver high-quality software components and services in adherence with RPR policies on Security, performance, longevity and Integration testing.Proactively identify and proposes new, alternative technology in order to create scalable implementations and achieve results.Adhere to DOD (story definition of done) as part of the sprint, including unit tests, functional testing, code reviews, no regressions, bug fixes, documentation and adhere to best coding practices.', 'Proficiency with Atlassian tools (Jira, BitBucket, Confluence, etc.) is a plus', 'Understand and follow coding conventions, architectures, and best practices; hold other members of the team accountable for doing so', "8+ years of experience in web application back-end development (C#, .NET Core)2+ years of experience developing and deploying cloud native applications, Azure highly preferred4+ years of experience in an Agile/Scrum environment2+ years of experience in full stack web application development (React, GraphQL) desiredDevelopment experience in Perl is a plusProficiency with Atlassian tools (Jira, BitBucket, Confluence, etc.) is a plusBachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent training and experience", '4+ years of experience in an Agile/Scrum environment', 'Development experience in Perl is a plus', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Ability to analyze and assess potential software designs with an eye towards finding the best solution for the business', '\xa0If you are a qualified candidate interested in this opportunity, please apply.About Genesis10:Genesis10 is a leading U.S. business and technology consulting firm with hundreds of clients needing proven talent and solutions to power their strategic initiatives. If you are a high performing business or IT professional with solid, referenced experience, we want to meet you. Genesis10 recruiters and delivery professionals are highly accomplished career advocates, who get to know you beyond your resume to position you with the opportunities that fit your skills, experience and aspirations. We have benefit options to fit your needs and a support staff that works with you from placement throughout your engagement project after project. To learn more about Genesis10 and to view all our available career opportunities, please visit us at www.genesis10.com."Genesis10 is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V', 'Act as the subject matter expert for area of assignment', '2+ years of experience in full stack web application development (React, GraphQL) desired', 'Write, debug, and deploy code to production. Deliver high-quality software components and services in adherence with RPR policies on Security, performance, longevity and Integration testing.', 'Adhere to DOD (story definition of done) as part of the sprint, including unit tests, functional testing, code reviews, no regressions, bug fixes, documentation and adhere to best coding practices.', '2+ years of experience developing and deploying cloud native applications, Azure highly preferred']
