Provides network design and support.', 'Certifications within 1-2 year of employment: ', '         Equivalent combination of education and experience.', 'We are looking for a Systems Engineer to fill an opening immediately in Wellsboro, PA.  The Systems Engineer’s role is to ensure the stability and integrity of in-house data and network services. This is achieved by planning, designing, and developing local area networks (LANs), wide area networks (WANs) and storage area networks (SANS) across the organization. In addition, the qualified Systems Engineer will participate with the installation, monitoring, maintenance, support, and optimization of all network hardware, software, and communication links. A qualified candidate will also analyze and resolve network hardware and software problems in a timely and accurate fashion and provide end user training where required.', 'PM18', 'Experience:  4-6 years of directly related experience in a business setting ', 'Type:', 'Suggested Certifications (Encouraged for continuous learning): Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) or Security Related Certification.', 'Required Certifications:  A+ and Network + or comparable certification', 'Overview', 'Microsoft Certified IT Professional: Enterprise Administrator (MCITP)']

job_title: Senior UI Software Engineer (Scout HOT Job)
job_text: ['', 'You thrive in a fast-paced environment focused on delivering production code at a regular cadence using Agile techniques, tools and methodologies.', 'Expert in front end development using JavaScript, React, Node.js, CSS, Git, SASS, Postman, IntelliJ IDEA.', 'Experience with state management frameworks like Redux or MobX.', 'We automate everything.', 'Experience with Docker & Kubernetes.', 'Background working on highly scalable, highly available, fault tolerant systems.', '10 years’ of experience in UI software development.', 'You understand the value of quality and continuous delivery, and want to help teams release frequently and often to production, with high quality.', " We own everything about our services from concept through to operations. We ship incrementally and often; once we merge code we normally want to ship it straight away. We own our process and we're free to improve on it. We emphasize quality above all else. We automate everything. ", 'Position Summary & Key Areas Of Responsibility', ' Deep technical knowledge of distributed architectures. Experience with state management frameworks like Redux or MobX. Experience with Docker & Kubernetes. Background working on highly scalable, highly available, fault tolerant systems. Experience with SAFe methodologies Possesses cross functional expertise to implement DevOps, CI/CD practices.', 'We own everything about our services from concept through to operations.', 'Possesses cross functional expertise to implement DevOps, CI/CD practices.', 'You have built high performance, highly responsive UI components at cloud scale to help your fellow development teams build exciting new products.', 'Experience working in Native & Hybrid Cloud environment.', 'Experience collaborating with product managers and usability experts to come up with compelling user experience.', ' Bachelor’s Degree in a technical discipline or equivalent work experience 10 years’ of experience in UI software development. Expert in analyzing, designing, implementing and troubleshooting responsive front-end software solutions for highly transactional systems. Expert in researching UI frameworks, create technical architecture for UI, define and create UI standards and best practices. Expert in front end development using JavaScript, React, Node.js, CSS, Git, SASS, Postman, IntelliJ IDEA. Experience testing UI components using Jest and enzyme. Experience with creating higher order components. Experience working in Native & Hybrid Cloud environment. Experience with Agile development methodology. Experience collaborating with product managers and usability experts to come up with compelling user experience. Excellent communication and team player with can-do attitude. ', 'Experience with creating higher order components.', 'Deep technical knowledge of distributed architectures.', 'You have a strong desire to continually learn new technologies, tools, and methodologies, including those out of your comfort zone.', 'Experience with SAFe methodologies', 'Expert in researching UI frameworks, create technical architecture for UI, define and create UI standards and best practices.', 'We ship incrementally and often; once we merge code we normally want to ship it straight away.', 'How do you know if you are right for this job?', "We own our process and we're free to improve on it.", 'Preferred Qualifications', ' You thrive in a fast-paced environment focused on delivering production code at a regular cadence using Agile techniques, tools and methodologies. You have built high performance, highly responsive UI components at cloud scale to help your fellow development teams build exciting new products. You understand the value of quality and continuous delivery, and want to help teams release frequently and often to production, with high quality. You have the ability to tackle complex production problems in high volume complex multi-tiered enterprise systems. You have a strong desire to continually learn new technologies, tools, and methodologies, including those out of your comfort zone. ', 'Required Qualifications', 'We emphasize quality above all else.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in a technical discipline or equivalent work experience', 'Excellent communication and team player with can-do attitude.', 'What working on this team is like', 'Experience with Agile development methodology.', 'Expert in analyzing, designing, implementing and troubleshooting responsive front-end software solutions for highly transactional systems.', 'Experience testing UI components using Jest and enzyme.', 'You have the ability to tackle complex production problems in high volume complex multi-tiered enterprise systems.']

['', 'Define data lifecycle, including data models and data sources for analytics platform, gathering data from business and cleaning them in order to provide ready-to-work inputs for Data Scientists.', ' 5 to10 years of experience in a statistical and/or data science role Deep knowledge of machine learning, statistics, optimization or related field Experience working with large data sets, simulation/ optimization and distributed computing tools Experience in working with large datasets, relational databases (SQL), and distributed systems (Hadoop, Hive) Experience Proficiency in R and/or SAS; additional knowledge of other statistical software (SPSS, RapidMiner, etc.) is helpful Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, data mining, machine learning (regression, decision trees, clustering, random forests, generalized linear models, etc.) Relevant Cloud Certifications (i.e. Certified AWS Solutions Architect - Associate (Professional preferred), Developer, Database Specialty, Machine Learning Specialty, etc.)', 'Apply strong expertise in machine-learning, data mining, and information retrieval to design, prototype, and build the next-generation analytics engines and services.', 'Deep knowledge of machine learning, statistics, optimization or related field', 'Works closely with database teams on topics related to data requirements, cleanliness, accuracy etc.,', 'Interacts with the Asset to understand all data requirements to develop business insights and translates them into data structures and data model requirements to IT', 'Experience working with large data sets, simulation/ optimization and distributed computing tools', 'Our client, a major Oil and Gas company, is looking for a Cloud Data Engineer to work on a long term contract in Houston, TX.', 'Conducts advanced statistical analysis to provide actionable insights, identify trends, and measure performance', ' The Cloud Data Engineer will be critical in the successful development and implementation of digital solutions and products, as each of these solutions are built on effective access to quality data.  Define data lifecycle, including data models and data sources for analytics platform, gathering data from business and cleaning them in order to provide ready-to-work inputs for Data Scientists. Whereas some Data Engineers within the Digital Factory will integrate with on-premise data solutions, the Cloud Data Engineer will solely be responsible for developing and deploying data solutions and structures using cloud-based platforms, in alignment with BHP’s shift towards more cloud-based technology solutions. Apply strong expertise in machine-learning, data mining, and information retrieval to design, prototype, and build the next-generation analytics engines and services. Understands business problems and designs end-to-end analytics use cases Conducts advanced statistical analysis to provide actionable insights, identify trends, and measure performance Defines and develops data solutions to meet product requirements using the latest and best cloud-based platforms. Has an ability to work with senior technologists and Business leaders providing technical guidance related to data architecture, data models and meta data management Interacts with the Asset to understand all data requirements to develop business insights and translates them into data structures and data model requirements to IT Works closely with database teams on topics related to data requirements, cleanliness, accuracy etc., Creates and modifies computer programs to extract information from company databases ', 'The Cloud Data Engineer will be critical in the successful development and implementation of digital solutions and products, as each of these solutions are built on effective access to quality data. ', 'Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, data mining, machine learning (regression, decision trees, clustering, random forests, generalized linear models, etc.)', 'Creates and modifies computer programs to extract information from company databases', 'Job overview:', 'Relevant Cloud Certifications (i.e. Certified AWS Solutions Architect - Associate (Professional preferred), Developer, Database Specialty, Machine Learning Specialty, etc.)', '5 to10 years of experience in a statistical and/or data science role', 'Whereas some Data Engineers within the Digital Factory will integrate with on-premise data solutions, the Cloud Data Engineer will solely be responsible for developing and deploying data solutions and structures using cloud-based platforms, in alignment with BHP’s shift towards more cloud-based technology solutions.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience Proficiency in R and/or SAS; additional knowledge of other statistical software (SPSS, RapidMiner, etc.) is helpful', 'Understands business problems and designs end-to-end analytics use cases', 'Has an ability to work with senior technologists and Business leaders providing technical guidance related to data architecture, data models and meta data management', 'Defines and develops data solutions to meet product requirements using the latest and best cloud-based platforms.', 'Requirements', 'Experience in working with large datasets, relational databases (SQL), and distributed systems (Hadoop, Hive)']

Please find the job details below-', 'Work with clients to identify data sources and build data integrations into a single cloud database.Work with engineering team to design new data structures and analytic capabilities into product\xa0Assist sales team to present data process, infrastructure, and data enhancement features\xa0Build new data integrations for partnered financial data vendors (Refinitiv, FactSet, Compustat, etc.)\xa0Design and enhance our core data model with new datasets, indexes, and security mappings\xa0Investigate data anomalies, fix data discrepancies and validate data pipelines from end-to-end\xa0Automate ingestion and validation tools to increase efficiency and capacity of our data engineers', 'Work with engineering team to design new data structures and analytic capabilities into product\xa0', 'Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Work with clients to identify data sources and build data integrations into a single cloud database.', 'Assist sales team to present data process, infrastructure, and data enhancement features\xa0', 'Automate ingestion and validation tools to increase efficiency and capacity of our data engineers', 'We are looking to bring on an engineer to\xa0build tools and integrations that gather data from disparate sources and vendors, clean and normalize the data, and create optimized views that make it easier for our clients to access and build new solutions.\xa0', 'Company Description:\xa0', 'Job Description:\xa0\xa0', '(Preferred) Experience building a Fixed Income data management platform to support quantitative investment teams', 'Design and enhance our core data model with new datasets, indexes, and security mappings\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'We are the\xa0platform-as-a-service company that lets financial institutions harness their data to get faster access, better insights, and greater ROI to solve the most complex problems. Our platform\xa0contains three landmark innovations, which give firms the tools they need to beat the market and save money by optimizing data, vendors, and resources.\xa0We are\xa0delivering technologies and user experiences in an industry with slow change and disturbingly large reach. We are a financial services company with the core of a technology firm.\xa0', 'Investigate data anomalies, fix data discrepancies and validate data pipelines from end-to-end\xa0', 'Must have experience integrating equity / fixed income datasets from at least one of the following\xa0financial data vendors: Refinitiv, S&P Compustat, MSCI Indices, FactSet, IDC, ICE, IHS Markit, or EJV\xa0', 'Strong technical skills using SQL, or similar relational database query language\xa0', 'Minimum 3 years of experience as a software engineer, data engineer, or equivalent professional rolesStrong technical skills using SQL, or similar relational database query language\xa0Experience with programming / scripting languages such as Python, R, or similar\xa0Strong understanding of data structures and queries for financial datasets such as security masters,\xa0fundamentals, pricing, etc.\xa0Must have experience integrating equity / fixed income datasets from at least one of the following\xa0financial data vendors: Refinitiv, S&P Compustat, MSCI Indices, FactSet, IDC, ICE, IHS Markit, or EJV\xa0(Preferred) Experience with PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, and/or Snowflake cloud databases(Preferred) Experience building a Fixed Income data management platform to support quantitative investment teams']

['', 'Berbix is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We aspire to promote a diverse and inclusive environment for all current and future employees.', '- 100% company paid premiums for medical, dental, & vision, 50% company paid premiums for dependents', 'Work cross-functionally with product, design and support to understand requirements and ship thoughtful solutions.', 'Design or redesign our infrastructure to scale while being thoughtful of our costs.', 'Qualifications', '4+ years of professional infrastructure engineering experience.BS or higher, in Computer Science or related technical field involving coding (e.g., physics or mathematics), or equivalent technical experience.Experience working with Kubernetes is required.Experience working with Google App Engine, Terraform or other Google Cloud products is a bonus, but not required.Experience writing scripts to accomplish common infrastructure tasks.Experience working at a small company with diverse responsibilities is a bonus, but not required.Experience working with the following: web application development, Unix/Linux environments, mobile application development, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, networking, developing large software systems, and/or security engineering / software development.', '- Flexible and generous PTO + 13 holidays', 'Responsibilities and Duties', 'Build and maintain deployment systems to simple, repeatable and safe deploys.', 'Engage in hiring additional engineers to the team to support ongoing and continued growth at the company.', '- 12 week, 100% paid parental leave for all new parents\xa0', 'This is a question many online platforms need to answer about their users. We help by providing developer friendly SDKs that allows our customers to easily leverage our best-in-class ID verification and proprietary fraud detection services. This enables our customers to determine if users on the other side of the screen are who they say they are.', '- Commuter benefits - pre-tax + $50 monthly stipend to use on commuting or parking', 'Experience working with Google App Engine, Terraform or other Google Cloud products is a bonus, but not required.', 'Experience working with Kubernetes is required.', 'Engage in code reviews to ensure a high level of software excellence across the team.', 'Build additional infrastructure in alignment with modern best practices.', 'Experience working with the following: web application development, Unix/Linux environments, mobile application development, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, networking, developing large software systems, and/or security engineering / software development.', 'Berbix is building identity verification and fraud deterrence as a service. Founded by the former engineering and product leaders for Trust & Safety at Airbnb, we empower companies to confidently answer the question: “Are you who you say you are?"', 'BS or higher, in Computer Science or related technical field involving coding (e.g., physics or mathematics), or equivalent technical experience.', 'Experience writing scripts to accomplish common infrastructure tasks.', 'As a senior infrastructure engineer, you’ll be expected to leverage best practices to build highly-scalable, modern technology stacks. You’ll be empowered to create or identify the tools we use for building, testing, scaling and deploying our systems.\xa0You will be empowered to research the best solutions for any particular problem, architect a solution and ship it to production. In addition to working directly with the founders, you’ll partner with the existing engineering and data scientists with backgrounds at Google, Uber, Apple, Airbnb and previous founding experience.', '- Professional Development allowance to learn new, and grow existing skills', '4+ years of professional infrastructure engineering experience.', 'Job Overview', 'About Berbix', "Office located in the Castro, close to great restaurants, gyms, coffee, and bars (we've temporarily transitioned to distributed work to do our part in protecting the health and safety of our team and our community and are monitoring the situation and will only return to the office when safe to do so). Located near the Castro Muni station and 6 blocks from 16th & Mission BART station. We are a company that values the well-being of our employees and we strive to cultivate a healthy and inclusive work culture. We offer a robust benefits package to our full-time employees, including:", '- Daily in office lunch + healthy office snacks and Ritual Coffee\xa0', 'Work across different components of a complex engineering system, from backend to infrastructure.', '- Regular office social activities like Fun Fridays and Monthly Bagel Breakfasts', '\xa0', 'The Berbix product space is wide-ranging, with end user facing client code to collect ID information, backend systems to process that information, customer-facing dashboards to configure and consume the processed information, machine learning systems to intelligently reason about the information collected. It is a versatile stack with many different parts, and we’re looking for engineers who relish multi-faceted and cross-domain challenges.', 'Design or redesign our infrastructure to scale while being thoughtful of our costs.Build and maintain deployment systems to simple, repeatable and safe deploys.Build additional infrastructure in alignment with modern best practices.Work across different components of a complex engineering system, from backend to infrastructure.Work cross-functionally with product, design and support to understand requirements and ship thoughtful solutions.Engage in hiring additional engineers to the team to support ongoing and continued growth at the company.Engage in code reviews to ensure a high level of software excellence across the team.', '- 401 (k) retirement plan + company match, AD&D + life insurance', 'Experience working at a small company with diverse responsibilities is a bonus, but not required.', '- Monthly wellness allowance to spend on your mind and body']

Understand data models and schemas, and work with other engineering staff to recommend extensions and changes. Use investigative tools and database queries to automatically flag irreconcilable data within our production datasets. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer.", "We're looking for a software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.", '---', 'Our companies look for software engineers proficient in Python or Java. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.', 'To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.', 'The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.', "We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. It's absolutely free.", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['', 'Nuvalence software engineers are problem solvers. While most have deep expertise in specific areas of the technology stack (front end, back end, data, security etc.), all are comfortable swimming across lanes. This is really important in delivering the product and platform outcomes that our customers expect.', '4 + years experience with NodeJS', 'Able to communicate clearly and efficiently with a variety of audiences including developers, clients, customers, partners and executives', 'Fearless in getting “hands-on” with technology and execution', 'Experience with containerized services using Docker and Kubernetes', "We're excited to announce that Nuvalence is expanding to Canada and building a new development center in Toronto! With one of our firm's founders being Canadian (a University of Waterloo alumnus), Toronto is going to be a huge part of the Nuvalence growth strategy.\xa0This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a fast-growing company and play an outsized role in our Toronto expansion.", 'Bonus if you know Golang', 'Strong knowledge of Javascript, Typescript', 'Technical Requirements', 'Strong knowledge of RDMS (ideally MySQL) including data modeling such as SQL, DDL, DML (stored procedures)', 'Experience designing and implementing several microservices', 'Understanding of distributed system concepts including message queues', 'Strong understanding of modern software engineering processes', 'Passionate about delivering commercial software products and platforms to market', 'Strong knowledge of Javascript, TypescriptBonus if you know Golang4 + years experience with NodeJSExperience with AWS resources like S3, SQS and ElasticsearchStrong knowledge of RDMS (ideally MySQL) including data modeling such as SQL, DDL, DML (stored procedures)Understanding of distributed system concepts including message queuesExperience with containerized services using Docker and KubernetesExperience designing and implementing several microservices', 'Deeply technical and constantly in a state of learning', 'Experience with AWS resources like S3, SQS and Elasticsearch', 'Comfortable with ambiguity with a drive for clarity', 'Across all of our roles, we look for folks who match the following general profile:', 'Generous benefits', 'Competitive wages and equity', '\xa0Our engineers are most interested in solving business problems with cutting edge cloud technologies and distributed systems. Let’s face it, most of this stuff is pretty new so “10 years of experience” isn’t really a credible calling card. We’re looking for fearless engineers who love ramping up quickly by getting their hands dirty with sophisticated, cutting edge technology. We want all of our staff to spend as much time directly working with clients as possible so being able to explain and justify technical decisions is also really important. We like the type of engineer that you can pair with a product manager and have them do their thing.', "We're a dynamic work environment with great benefits including:", "Everyone wants a career with impact. At Nuvalence, you’ll be helping some of the world's most renowned and ambitious companies build winning cloud platforms.", 'Passionate about delivering commercial software products and platforms to marketDeeply technical and constantly in a state of learningAble to communicate clearly and efficiently with a variety of audiences including developers, clients, customers, partners and executivesFearless in getting “hands-on” with technology and executionStrong understanding of modern software engineering processesDeep understanding and interest in cloud and distributed systems architecturesComfortable with ambiguity with a drive for clarity', 'Competitive wages and equityGenerous benefitsFlexible vacation and PTO policies (we have a minimum vacation policy in fact!)', 'Deep understanding and interest in cloud and distributed systems architectures', 'Flexible vacation and PTO policies (we have a minimum vacation policy in fact!)']

job_title: Sr. Data Engineer (AWS, Python, Airflow & R), Data Science Products (open to remote)
job_text: ['', ' Undergraduate degree in a technical or engineering field, such as Data Engineering, Data Science, Data Analytics, Computer Science or Software Engineering. Masters degree is a plus.  3+ years professional experience as a cloud data engineer, data scientist or related role.  Experience with clinical trial data is not required, but interest to learn and understand how these data drive medical research is paramount. ', ' Power smarter treatments and healthier people with innovative data analytic applications. ', ' Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, software engineers, business leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to implement data science engineering solutions based on business priorities and technology initiatives. ', ' Experience with clinical trial data is not required, but interest to learn and understand how these data drive medical research is paramount. ', 'Your Competencies', ' Advanced skills in modern data architecture, data science engineering, data transformation, data modeling and manipulation of structured and unstructured data sources using state-of-art cloud computing technologies (AWS). ', ' Undergraduate degree in a technical or engineering field, such as Data Engineering, Data Science, Data Analytics, Computer Science or Software Engineering. Masters degree is a plus. ', 'Your Mission', ' Solve complex business questions where situations or data require in-depth evaluation of variable factors. ', ' Create automated data flows for research and production settings with data science engineering best practices, transparency, and scalability. ', 'Medidata Solutions, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Medidata Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by the law. Medidata Solutions complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.', ' Develop advanced cloud (AWS) based data systems to extract, assess, integrate, transform, clean, analyze and visualize datasets for complex analytics and statistical modeling. ', ' Hands-on experience in the latest breed of software, automation and CICD technologies including Python, SQL, Airflow and Git in a cloud setting. Experience with R is preferred. ', ' Familiarity with Big Data processing and distributed database technologies including Spark and NoSQL. ', ' Assess analytical data sources, conduct hands-on exploration to determine their value, and make them available enterprise-wide. ', ' Power smarter treatments and healthier people with innovative data analytic applications.  Develop advanced cloud (AWS) based data systems to extract, assess, integrate, transform, clean, analyze and visualize datasets for complex analytics and statistical modeling.  Create automated data flows for research and production settings with data science engineering best practices, transparency, and scalability.  Solve complex business questions where situations or data require in-depth evaluation of variable factors.  Assess analytical data sources, conduct hands-on exploration to determine their value, and make them available enterprise-wide.  Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, software engineers, business leaders and cross-functional stakeholders to implement data science engineering solutions based on business priorities and technology initiatives. ', ' Clear, concise communication abilities – writing, verbal, presentation – to all levels of technical and non-technical audiences. ', ' Advanced skills in modern data architecture, data science engineering, data transformation, data modeling and manipulation of structured and unstructured data sources using state-of-art cloud computing technologies (AWS).  Hands-on experience in the latest breed of software, automation and CICD technologies including Python, SQL, Airflow and Git in a cloud setting. Experience with R is preferred.  Familiarity with Big Data processing and distributed database technologies including Spark and NoSQL.  Demonstrated ability to collaborate with all levels of data science engineering technology personnel and senior leadership.  Clear, concise communication abilities – writing, verbal, presentation – to all levels of technical and non-technical audiences.  Entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to creating rigorous, high-quality insights from data, at scale. ', ' Entrepreneurial spirit and commitment to creating rigorous, high-quality insights from data, at scale. ', ' Demonstrated ability to collaborate with all levels of data science engineering technology personnel and senior leadership. ', ' 3+ years professional experience as a cloud data engineer, data scientist or related role. ', 'Your Education & Experience']

job_title: Software Engineer, Robotics - Cloud Infrastructure (New College Grad)
job_text: ['', 'Solid understanding and working experience with running simulators on cloud environments and scaling applications using cloud.', 'Architect and design for high performance, scalability and availability. Framework should enable the running of robotics software and define success criteria at scale in cloud environments.', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'As a member of our Robotics team, you will work on designing and building a state of art validation framework to auto validate DNN models, navigation stack and other robotics algorithms in simulated and real environments.', 'BS, MS, or PhD degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field.Experience working with simulators, designing and building validation frameworks for machine learning & deep learning, ['', 'Drive features to successful delivery; Help to drive alignment and implement decisions in collaboration with Product and other internal teams as needed', ' ', 'Proactively identify issues and drive architecture discussions cross-functionally', "We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer for our Integrations team. On the integrations team, you'll work with a scrum team of engineers focused on integrating various SSOs, 3rd party systems, and API gateways with our core platform. This position is open to candidates in the Pacific Time Zone with proper work authorization.", "Vineti creates advanced software for advanced therapies. We are a healthcare-tech company developing cloud-based software solutions that enable biopharmaceutical and life science companies to provide next generation personalized therapies safely, securely, seamlessly, and scalably. We are removing these barriers with technology that integrates the end-to-end supply chain of the process. ['', 'ETL - MUST *AWS *Informatica *Redshift - MUST *SQL *Data Engineer', 'Description', ' ETL * AWS * Data * Informatica * Redshift * SQL * Data Engineer * My client, a Glendale Service based industry is looking for a Data Engineer to join their engineering team. The position will start off remote and it will be on-site when the office is open. The Senior Data Engineer should have at least 2 years of experience in Redshift and at least 3 years in ETL. The day to day responsbiltitlies for the Senior Data Engineer position includes maintaining ETL standards, managing real time data processing, and utilizing Python to help pull data from the database. This is a great opportunity for a Senior Data Engineer to join well established company that is well known in the industry and become more advance in AWS. If you are interested in this opportunity, please call Vice President - Division Director Jimmy Escobar at (310) 209-6838 or Jimmy.Escobar@RHT.com - https://www.linkedin.com/in/jimmyescobar/', 'Requirements']

Works proactively and effectively with minimal supervision.Demonstrates strong and effective verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills.Strong analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong written technical documentation skillsExperience working in an Agile development environment; project management experience a plus.Must be willing and able to work in an open office environment.Bachelor's Degree in a technical field and/or related technical experience.\xa0", 'WHAT YOU’LL NEED TO BRING TO THIS ROLE...', 'Detail-oriented and have the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Works proactively and effectively with minimal supervision.', 'a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays', 'You will be doing the following:', 'Working knowledge with ReST interfaces', 'Strong written technical documentation skills', 'internals, Hypervisors, Containers, Compiler Optimization, etc.', 'Familiarity and hands-on experience with Gitlab, Spinnaker, Jenkins, Docker, VMWare, AWS (EC2, S3)', 'A minimum of 5 years experience using C++ or C#\xa0', 'Design and implement creative new algorithms and technologies for high-performance, highly reliable systems (think "six nines")', 'Must be willing and able to work in an open office environment.', 'Make smart, educated decisions where automation can improve overall product support efficiencies', 'TA-Ops@purestorage.com', 'Since our founding in 2009, Pure Storage has empowered innovators to build a better world with data. In less than eight years, Pure reached $1B in sales, faster than nearly every enterprise company in history, and our incredible growth continues to outpace the competition.', 'Own and deliver innovation end-to-end, from concept to shipped product', 'Demonstrates strong and effective verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills.', 'Learn a ton, whether you know a lot or nothing about system software', 'The world is experiencing a revolution driven by next-generation technology like AI, machine learning, virtual reality, quantum computing, and self-driving cars—all of which require unprecedented amounts of data. This sets the stage for Pure’s technology to grow exponentially in the coming years.\xa0', 'BE PART OF BUILDING THE FUTURE.', 'A minimum of 2-3 years of experience using Python, C, Go, Java or related programming languages', 'For five straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays and in 2019, Gartner named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Primary Storage.Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a 2019 Medallia Net Promoter Score, certified by Owen CX, in the top 1% of B2B companies.Pure puts a premium on the future, investing 26% of revenue into R&D.', 'OPEN TO REMOTE CANDIDATES', 'Thoroughly test tool sets before release to ensure tool accuracy and efficiency', 'Pure is where you ask big questions, think differently, and make an impact. This is not just a job, but a place where you have a voice and can accelerate your career. We value unique thoughts and celebrate individuality, and with ample opportunity to learn, develop yourself, and expand into different roles, joining Pure is an investment in your career journey.', 'For five straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays and in 2019, Gartner named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Primary Storage.', 'SHOULD YOU ACCEPT THIS CHALLENGE...', 'Make customers really happy, because that’s why we do what we do', 'DEEMED EXPORT LICENSE NOTICE.', 'And because we understand the value of bringing your full and best self to work, we offer a variety of perks to manage a healthy balance, including flexible time off, wellness resources, and company-sponsored team events.']

Let’s go!', 'there is ZERO state income tax', 'Health, dental, and vision insurance plans', '401k and FSA', 'The opportunity', 'I’m Drew Livingston (https://www.linkedin.com/in/drewlivingston/) and in 2014, I co-founded Doxy.me telemedicine, and now it’s the largest SaaS telemedicine company in the world.\xa0I’m now leading the charge to build Visionology.', 'I don’t care where you are now.\xa0If you have the development chops, the desire to build something that will help lots of real people real soon, and you want to be the first folks to join our team – then I will make sure you get to Nashville.\xa0We’re going to build insane technology and heck, you might even start to like country music!\xa0', '\xa0', 'Build a technology that is a paradigm shift for telemedicine and chronic care', 'How to apply …', 'Our founder is Mark Baum (https://www.linkedin.com/in/mark-l-baum-284505163/).\xa0He is a good dude and was the guy behind making a $.99 alternative to Daraprim, the HIV medication that drug pirate Martin Shkreli jacked up by 5,000%.\xa0But besides that, he’s started a number of very successful healthcare businesses.', 'I moved my family from Germany to Nashville, TN – the healthcare IT and services capital of the United States – to build the next generation of telemedicine technology.\xa0We’ve built the first generation of our launch software and I’m looking for two ROCKSTAR developers to join me in Nashville, Tennessee to forever change the way patients access healthcare.', 'Software Engineer - Frontend', 'Implement new features using modern web frameworks, libraries, and tools (React.js, Apollo GraphQL, Cypress)', 'Experience with automated testing frameworks such as Jest, Mocha, Jasmine, Chai, etc.', 'Our proprietary technology powers our solution. Our customers comprise more than 10% of the routable Internet and rely on our products to discover, manage, and secure their global Internet assets. ['', ' Familiarity with stream processing frameworks and technologies such as Flink, Kafka Streams and Spark Streaming', ' Be an advocate for streaming architectures and stream processing technologies within Bloomberg and help build a developer community around it Partner with fellow engineers across Bloomberg to identify use cases and define requirements and features for the platform Build infrastructure service abstractions and tooling that remove cognitive burden and allow end users to focus on solving business problems', ' Open Source contributions of any sort', ' Experience building high performance distributed systems, solving large scale engineering challenges- 3+ years experience programming in 2 major programming languages (Java/Scala and Python/Go) and willing to pick up more as needed - In-depth knowledge and experience with Apache Kafka Familiarity with stream processing frameworks and technologies such as Flink, Kafka Streams and Spark Streaming Excellent communication skills and the ability to build partnerships with fellow engineers BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', ' Experience building and deploying containerized applications on Kubernetes Experience building self service platforms Open Source contributions of any sort', "In line with Bloomberg's philosophy, the team building the platform is small, nimble and developer-driven, located in our San Francisco office. The platform is built with open source components and provides engineers on the team opportunities to engage the open source community in driving design discussions and implementation.", ' Experience building and deploying containerized applications on Kubernetes', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Experience building self service platforms', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', ' Experience building high performance distributed systems, solving large scale engineering challenges', ' Build infrastructure service abstractions and tooling that remove cognitive burden and allow end users to focus on solving business problems', "If the opportunity to define and implement key components of this platform sounds like the challenge you've been looking for, we'd love to hear from you.", ' Excellent communication skills and the ability to build partnerships with fellow engineers', "Bloomberg is the global leader in business and financial data, news and insight. Using the power of technology, we connect the world's decision makers to accurate information on the financial markets – and help them make faster, smarter decisions.", ' Be an advocate for streaming architectures and stream processing technologies within Bloomberg and help build a developer community around it', 'We are building an enterprise-wide Streaming Platform as a Service (or SPaaS) to support large-scale, low-latency stream processing pipelines to help our engineering teams collect, transport, transform and act on market events. The platform is targeting a variety of streaming analytics workloads such as Tickstream and Tradeflow processing, with the workloads being both high-throughput (in the order of millions of messages/sec) and low-latency (sub-10 milliseconds). The platform is built on top of Kubernetes and extends it to provide streaming-related abstractions and workflows.', ' Partner with fellow engineers across Bloomberg to identify use cases and define requirements and features for the platform']

['', 'Experience with distributed systems and running Spark and Hadoop on clusters is a plus.', 'Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products performance, and resource utilization (CPU, memory, and disk etc.)', 'Performance Benchmark Engineer', 'Your goal will be to identify performance regression, and optimization opportunities of the TigerGraph database.', 'Perform validation and verification testing.', 'BS or above degree in Computer Science2+ years of hands-on software engineering experience in Java/C/C++/Shell/Python development.Must know SQL and be familiar with Unix/Linux systems, and performance tools (tsar, netstat, top iostats etc.)Experience with distributed systems and running Spark and Hadoop on clusters is a plus.Analytical mind with problem-solving aptitude.Ability to work independently, and self-driven.', 'TigerGraph is the world’s fastest graph analytics platform designed to unleash the power of interconnected data for deeper insights and better outcomes. We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build the next generation graph computing and analytics platform.', 'Ability to work independently, and self-driven.', '2+ years of hands-on software engineering experience in Java/C/C++/Shell/Python development.', 'We are looking for a Performance Benchmark Engineer to implement and improve TigerGraph Query performance.\xa0 You will work with upper management to define and run benchmark suites. The benchmark will help identify performance regression across releases on TigerGraph engine, including loading performance, storage compression ratio, and query optimization performance.', 'Contribute to TigerGraph engine performance and query language optimization performance.\xa0', 'Identify performance regression and bottlenecks of graph database.', 'Must know SQL and be familiar with Unix/Linux systems, and performance tools (tsar, netstat, top iostats etc.)', 'Analytical mind with problem-solving aptitude.', 'Contribute to TigerGraph engine performance and query language optimization performance.\xa0Identify performance regression and bottlenecks of graph database.Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code to automate the benchmark.Perform validation and verification testing.Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products performance, and resource utilization (CPU, memory, and disk etc.)', 'BS or above degree in Computer Science', 'In this role, you should be able to work independently with little supervision. You should have excellent organization and problem-solving skills.', 'Responsibilities', 'Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code to automate the benchmark.', 'Requirements']

job_title: REMOTE Senior Principal Software Engineer (Large Scale Data Platforms & Cloud)
job_text: ['', 'Our Client is based in Bowie, Maryland & provides cloud-based tools to support data-driven healthcare. Will consider remote candidates but must be willing to 10% travel to the Bowie office post Covid. Must work EST hours.\xa0 ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field; or equivalent experience;\xa0 ', ' The ideal candidate will have strong programming skills, experience in Big Data, Amazon Web Services (AWS) and will enjoy working in a fast-paced dynamic environment.    ', 'Manager is also open to considering candidates from other domians as long as they have hands on experience developing & architecting very large datasets and AWS Cloud.', 'Our Client is based in Bowie, Maryland & provides cloud-based tools to support data-driven healthcare. Will consider remote candidates but must be willing to 10% travel to the Bowie office post Covid. Must work EST hours.\xa0', '12-15+ years of IT experience with at least 1-2 years’ experience with public cloud (AWS) including serverless architecture and cloud warehousing solutions.\xa0 ', 'Strong experience using managed services and Infrastructure as a service. ', ' ', 'Looking for a Senior Principal Software Engineer with Healthcare experience and focus on building large scale data platforms in the cloud.\xa0 ', 'Manager is also open to considering candidates from other domians as long as they have hands on experience developing & architecting very large datasets and AWS Cloud. ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field; or equivalent experience;\xa0 12-15+ years of IT experience with at least 1-2 years’ experience with public cloud (AWS) including serverless architecture and cloud warehousing solutions.\xa0 Strong experience using managed services and Infrastructure as a service. Strong Experience with Big Data (Hadoop Ecosystem) and related processing frameworks such as EMR, Spark, and Airflow Strong programming experience in Python and Java/Scala\xa0 Hands on coder who understands the concepts behind distributed databases, batch and stream processing Experience in working with extremely large healthcare datasets, preferably in an architecture or lead role Experience building CI/CD pipelines in public cloud and creating a culture of automation.\xa0 Experience leading and mentoring junior engineers\xa0 Experience working with scalable cloud-based data warehousing solutions such as Redshift, Snowflake\xa0', 'Experience working with scalable cloud-based data warehousing solutions such as Redshift, Snowflake\xa0', 'Hands on coder who understands the concepts behind distributed databases, batch and stream processing ', 'Experience building CI/CD pipelines in public cloud and creating a culture of automation.\xa0 ', 'This is a FULL TIME / DIRECT HIRE POSITION - REMOTE\xa0 (Sponsorship Available)  ', 'Strong Experience with Big Data (Hadoop Ecosystem) and related processing frameworks such as EMR, Spark, and Airflow ', 'Strong programming experience in Python and Java/Scala\xa0 ', 'Experience in working with extremely large healthcare datasets, preferably in an architecture or lead role ', 'Experience leading and mentoring junior engineers\xa0 ']

job_text: ['', 'Work with engineers across all businesses to secure CI/CD pipelines and cloud environments', 'Develop schemes and technology to secure and monitor new technologies as we adopt them', 'Work with other developers on the InfoSec team on a variety of security automation projects (e.g. code analysis, vulnerability triaging, etc.)', 'The Role', ' Work closely with operations teams to develop and integrate custom playbooks, use cases and workflows that will be adopted across the SecOps team and the entire organization Build novel bastian boxes with MFA; job_title: Data Center Hands & Feet Support Engineer
job_text: ['', ' Manage technical projects as assigned  Local and Remote ', 'DATA CENTER OPERATIONS ANALYST I ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES ', ' Learn about all equipment in the environment independently o Observe and learn the environments in our Data Centers o Ability to work independently as only tech/analyst on a shift ', ' Understanding of enterprise IT equipment o ability to add, remove, change components in servers and network gear as required o Configuration of equipment for network monitoring o Understanding of electrical static protection protocols ', ' Must be willing to take off-hours on-call and respond appropriately PREFERRED SKILLS Computer hardware part replacement, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Share point), Microsoft Outlook, SNMP, Note Taking, Multi-tasking, customer service, network cabling (fiber/copper), Ability to guide others. Problem solving and self-management skills with attention to detail. Ability to prioritize tasks and effectively communicate verbally and in writing. Work Environment: Data Center(s) Akron, OH locations will be worked independently, successful candidate must be comfortable and capable working without direct guidance or assistance (1.) To provide support for on call escalations and doing root cause analysis of given issue (2.) To independently resolve tickets within agreed SLA of ticket volume and time (3.) To adhere to quality standards, regulatory requirements and company policies (4.) Work on value adding activities such Knowledge base update & management, Training freshers, coaching analysts (5.) To ensure positive customer experience and CSAT through First Call Resolution and minimum rejected resolutions / Reopen Cases', ' Maintain documentation o Document all installations at high levels of detail o Maintain inventory with high level of detail and precision ', ' Act Proactively when issues are observed, or deficiencies are realized ', ' Respond to incidents and requests o Properly manage incidents and requests per guidelines, updating frequently and with appropriate detail and resolve in a timely manner o Analyze issues and work through to resolution ', 'Job description :', ' Unpack - Install - connect, configure management of data center equipment o Ability to lift 70 pounds with assistance o UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply) installation, configuration, and support o Learn how to install different types of equipment independently ', ' Follow Decom procedure to remove equipment from production o Asset recycling o Database updates ', 'o Manage your queue and Understand priority of different types of issues ', ' Ability to provide detailed instructions to guide personnel of unknown skill set through any work the team needs but at a remote site ']

['', 'Job Description', 'Expert in front-end development      with Javascript; HTML5/CSS3 ', 'Experience with a JS templating      library: Mustache, Handlebars ', 'Experience with JS utility      libraries: Lodash, moment, jQuery, Bootstrap, Underscore ', 'Title: Front-End UI Engineer ', 'Experience with javascript      build and testing tools (webpack, jest, karma, Mocha, Chai, sinon, Grunt,      Gulp are huge plus, npm) ', 'Experience working in agile      environment ', ' ', 'Key Qualifications', 'Are you passionate about solving problems and having fun? Are you excited to be part of a fast growing start-up? \xa0CyberCube’s Engineering Team is looking for a Front End Engineer to contribute to the design, and development of business applications responsible for solving cyber risk with world-class analytics. CyberCube delivers the most comprehensive cyber insurance analytics platform for the insurance industry. Our team is composed of multi-disciplinary experts across data science, cyber security, software engineering, modeling and commercial insurance. CyberCube offers products for cyber risk aggregation modeling and insurance underwriting. CyberCube leverages the threat intelligence from the world’s leading cyber security company, Symantec, along with several other data sources. ', '\xa0 ', 'We are looking for creative people who thrive on delivering functional and creative UX for enterprise applications. You will be working closely with product management, design and engineering. As a Front End Engineer on our team, you must have worked in an Agile environment and be passionate regarding the engineering best practices required of such processes including unit testing, incremental and iterative development. ['', 'Analyze and identify opportunities for business improvement through data collection and gap analysis methods', 'The candidate must possess at minimum a bachelor’s degree in a life science, supply chain management or information technology field, or have equivalent experience.', 'EDUCATION AND/OR CERTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS', 'May assist in day-to-day operations if needed', 'The Business Operations Analyst is responsible for identifying and solving issues related to the performance of business operations. The Analyst will deliver innovative improvements to efficiently and creatively meet organizational goals. Key area of focus is in Study Support (supporting and maintaining live studies).', 'Fast Company', 'Work with stakeholders to identify key gaps and collaborate to deliver viable solutions', 'Project Management experience working with cross-functional business and technical teams as a project lead.', 'Strong finance, math, science or engineering background preferred.', 'Use best practices to perform analysis and re-engineer solutions', 'Measure effectiveness of the solution and prevent backsliding', '4G Clinical is a global leader in randomization and trial supply management (RTSM) and supply forecasting optimization software for the life sciences industry, offering the only fully cloud-based, 100% configurable and flexible solutions utilizing natural language processing (NLP) to accelerate clinical trials. 4G Clinical is headquartered in the Boston Biotech corridor of Wellesley, MA, with offices in Europe and Asia.', 'Knowledge of US FDA Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and International Conference on Harmonization (ICH) GCP regulations, Electronic Records; Electronic Signatures regulation (21 CFR Part 11) and EU Annex 11 is a plus.', 'Software experience and/or data management experience preferred.', 'Fast Company\xa0recently announced its\xa02020\xa0Best Workplaces for Innovators\xa0list, honoring businesses and organizations that demonstrate a deep commitment to encouraging innovation at all levels. 4G Clinical came in at #8 for its dedication to building a culture that fuels innovation, curiosity and the spirit of experimentation in all facets of the business from product development and brand to services and staffing. We were also voted one of the\xa02018 Best Places in Health Care & Biopharma by Great Place to Work® and FORTUNE.', 'Analyze and identify opportunities for business improvement through data collection and gap analysis methodsUse best practices to perform analysis and re-engineer solutionsEnsure compliance to quality and regulatory standardsWork with stakeholders to identify key gaps and collaborate to deliver viable solutionsDevelop proposals for changes and communicate with business leadersDrive projects to deliver business improvements, communicating across the organization as necessaryMeasure effectiveness of the solution and prevent backslidingMay assist in day-to-day operations if needed', '2020\xa0Best Workplaces for Innovators\xa0', 'Ensure compliance to quality and regulatory standards', 'Develop proposals for changes and communicate with business leaders', 'Drive projects to deliver business improvements, communicating across the organization as necessary', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Business process analysis experience and familiarity with problem solving tools. Sufficient software skills to manage and analyze data. Strong Excel and analytical skills.', 'Strong finance, math, science or engineering background preferred.Software experience and/or data management experience preferred.Knowledge of US FDA Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and International Conference on Harmonization (ICH) GCP regulations, Electronic Records; Electronic Signatures regulation (21 CFR Part 11) and EU Annex 11 is a plus.', 'REQUIRED EXPERIENCE', 'In addition to candidates in Boston area, we welcome candidates in Dublin, Ireland, and Portland, Oregon.\xa0\xa0', 'OTHER SKILLS/REQUIREMENTS', 'Key accountabilities include the following:', 'The position requires a minimum of 8 years of experience as a Process or Operations Analyst in the clinical research field, with particular preference in RTSM/IRT or eClinical systems maintenance.']

Communicating your ideas effectively and confidently. ', 'Minimum of 7 years of experience developing front-end user experiences for web applications.', 'Experience that is nice to have, but not mandatory: C# - ASP.NET Core 3 – Web API, Knockout.js, Azure experience, Twilio, WebRTC, SignalR.', 'As a member of our Software Engineering Group we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation & industry leading engineering practices.', 'Leveraging your excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills.', 'Understanding of state management, caching strategies, and performance optimization.', 'Design and develop reliable, but simple solutions to complex problems at scale.', "A collaborative and thought-provoking environment.A culture of experimentation and empowerment. job_text: ['', 'Experience with NoSQL databases, such as Couchbase, Cassandra, MongoDB', 'About You', 'Create the world’s best, distributed software server infrastructure products which companies will rely on for mission-critical OLTP needs.Participate in requirements, architecture, and design specification reviews.Design and implement key modules for data replication Research industry and academic leading-edge algorithms for distributed consensus, replication, consistency, availability and scalability.Work with peers in an agile development environment.Develop high-quality software and use unit, component, and end-to-end automation tests.', 'You are a self-motivated, independent, and high-performance person who enjoys worthy challenges.', ' Regular team lunches and fully-stocked kitchens.', 'You are passionate about distributed system, fault tolerant software or software architecture with good understanding on latest trends/research in these areas. ', 'You emphasize writing high quality code.You are a good communicator and an excellent teammate.', 'Good understanding of Lambda Architecture, along with its advantages and drawbacks', 'Santa Clara, California', 'Experience with building stream-processing systems, using solutions such as Storm or Spark-Streaming', ' A fantastic culture', 'About Couchbase', 'Create the world’s best, distributed software server infrastructure products which companies will rely on for mission-critical OLTP needs.', ' Big Data 100: 35 Coolest Data Management And Integration Vendors', ' Open, collaborative spaces.', " DBTA Readers' Choice Awards: Best Database Overall and Best In-Memory Database", 'Experience with building stream-processing systems, using solutions such as Storm or Spark-StreamingExperience with NoSQL databases, such as Couchbase, Cassandra, MongoDBGood understanding of Lambda Architecture, along with its advantages and drawbacks', ' A focused, energetic team with aligned goals', 'Develop high-quality software and use unit, component, and end-to-end automation tests.', ' Wealth Front Career-Launching Companies List 2020', 'Sr. Software Engineer - Cross Data Center Replication (XDCR)', ' True collaboration with everyone playing their positions', 'Design and implement key modules for data replication Research industry and academic leading-edge algorithms for distributed consensus, replication, consistency, availability and scalability.', 'You like to reduce/encapsulate complexity with elegant and generic solution. ', ' Great market opportunity and growth potential', 'You are goal oriented and you enjoy the satisfaction of achieving your missions. ', ' Time off when you need it.', 'Check Out Some Recent Industry Recognition', ' Couchbase Named a Leader: Forrester Wave Big Data NoSQL Report', ' Competitive benefits and pre-tax commuter perks', 'You like working in organizations that strive to have a good balance between doing it right and moving quickly. ', 'Participate in requirements, architecture, and design specification reviews.', 'You have 5+ years of commercial or open source software experience (prefer experience with packaged, downloadable software)', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Deloitte Technology Fast 500 2019', 'Responsibilities', 'You exhibit good judgment in making design and implementation choices. ', 'Work with peers in an agile development environment.', 'You are systematic and analytical in your design and thought process. ', 'You are a self-motivated, independent, and high-performance person who enjoys worthy challenges.You are goal oriented and you enjoy the satisfaction of achieving your missions. You are passionate about distributed system, fault tolerant software or software architecture with good understanding on latest trends/research in these areas. You exhibit good judgment in making design and implementation choices. You like working in organizations that strive to have a good balance between doing it right and moving quickly. You are systematic and analytical in your design and thought process. You like to reduce/encapsulate complexity with elegant and generic solution. You emphasize writing high quality code.You are a good communicator and an excellent teammate.You have 5+ years of commercial or open source software experience (prefer experience with packaged, downloadable software)', 'At Couchbase, You’ll Get', ' 2020 Bay Area Best Place to Work', ' Forbes Next Billion-Dollar Startup 2018']

job_title: Frontend Software Engineer - Full Remote Up to 180k Base Salary
job_text: ['', 'In the greatest country in the world, 9% of students from the lowest income quartile finish college compared to 77% for the rich. This means the wind that is blowing the cycle of poverty, continues to turn it faster and faster.', 'A Great Fully Remote Opportunity to Create Massive Impact - within the EdTech Industry!', 'Take full ownership of building, shipping and maintaining features, end-to-endDrive the future of our Frontend products and design + develop a world class user experience across all productsBuild efficient and reusable front-end systemsHelp estimate, plan and execute on projects, features, and integrationsDevelop and utilize your skills as a mentor and leader', 'Experience: 2+ years in industry.', 'We need you to have: ', 'Yes, we are beginning in the United States. However, students born all over the world, in every village, slum, and region where there is a shortage of teachers and resources, any place or space where there is a child born unlucky, we will be at their fingertips.', 'We’re solving a massive 1-billion-person problem.', 'Drive the future of our Frontend products and design + develop a world class user experience across all products', 'Help estimate, plan and execute on projects, features, and integrations', 'Paid parental leave.', 'Extraordinary: You have a track record of excelling in whatever you pursue (whether it’s work, school, competitions, personal projects, etc)', 'Experience: 2+ years in industry.Proficient expertise in: React.js, Javascript, CSS.Extraordinary: You have a track record of excelling in whatever you pursue (whether it’s work, school, competitions, personal projects, etc)', 'Flexible vacation', 'Develop and utilize your skills as a mentor and leader', 'excelling', 'React.js, Javascript, CSS.', 'Benefits', "-- This is where your work can align with your values. Where you can do something truly meaningful, and it doesn't feel like work. Contribute to a just cause. --", 'Ready to make a massive impact?', 'Responsibilities:', 'If you show passion in what you do -including personal projects and hobbies, then we encourage you to apply and look forward to hearing from you!', 'Proficient expertise in: React.js, Javascript, CSS.', 'industry', 'Monthly paid day off to focus on yourself, your family and community', 'Monthly paid day off to focus on yourself, your family and communityFlexible vacation$1k/year professional development & learning allocation$1k desk set up of your choiceMedical, dental, and vision insurancePaid parental leave.', '$1k/year professional development & learning allocation', 'Build efficient and reusable front-end systems', 'Medical, dental, and vision insurance', '$1k desk set up of your choice', 'Take full ownership of building, shipping and maintaining features, end-to-end']

['', 'Roles and Responsibilities:', 'Experience implementing search functionality using big data tools.', 'Performance tuning, table partitioning and indexing, process threading, bucketing, UDF and UDAF.', '\xa0\xa0AWS Glue/Lambda/EMR/SNS/SQS: 3+ years (Preferred)', '\xa0\xa0Python/Spark/Scala: 3+ hands on years (Preferred)', 'Certifications:', 'Perform data normalization and denormalization where needed.', 'AWS', 'Create/Review logical entities and define their attributes; and define relationships between the various data objects.', 'Must have hands on experience with AWS knowledge.', '\xa0\xa0HDFS/Hadoop: 5+ years (Preferred)', 'Hands-on experience in architecting solutions at scale in Big Data.', 'Works with the teams to plan approach to understand current state architecture', 'IMPORTANT INFO: This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', "Idexcel's product development team is looking for a senior level data engineer for a permanent hire full-time basis. ", 'Apache Spark/Hadoop (Preferred)', 'Understand customer requirements and render those as architectural models that will operate at large scale and high performance and advise customers on how to run these architectural models.', 'Design and analyze data models, data flows, and integration patterns for structural deficiencies/soundness to build a robust and complete future state model.', 'Experience implementing Orchestrator like airflow for big data tools.', 'Contributing data sources, technologies, interfaces, performance issues and system configurations.', 'Must have worked on upstream and downstream applications along with cloud deployment.', 'We are an AWS Advanced level Consulting Partners, hence it gives us an opportunity to work with some of the experts in the AWS community.', 'Detail oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', '\xa0\xa0NoSQL Databases: 3+ years (Preferred)', '8+ years of experience in Advanced Analytics and Big Data with the minimum implementation of at-least 2-3 projects at the enterprise level.', '\xa0\xa0Airflow experience: 2+ years (Preferred)', 'Effective communicator (both verbal & written).', 'IMPORTANT INFO:', 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Full Job Description', '\xa0\xa0ETL (Extract Transform Load): 7 years (Preferred)', 'Senior Data Engineer ', '\xa0', 'Proficiency in one or more modern programming languages like Python or Scala or Spark', 'This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', 'Design and Develop Big Data solutions on different cloud platforms.', '\ufeff(Our team is interested to hire a Data Engineer, Data Architect, AWS Solutions Architect or a Cloud Architect as long as the resource has hands-on skills with Spark, Big Data, AWS and Python/Java/Scala).', 'Technical Qualifications:', 'As we are into both technology consulting services and in the FinTech industry serving banking and financial institutions, this role will have a blend of working hands-on with our team as well as working with our customers in providing on-demand solutions, mostly in AWS environment.', 'Hands-on experience with commercializing Big Data applications (e.g. configuration management, monitoring, debugging, and security.)', '\xa0\xa0Big Data Analytics: 7 years (Preferred)', 'Experience working with Big Data eco-system including tools such as HDFS, Nifi, Spark streaming, Map Reduce, Sqoop, HBase, Hive, Impala, Oozie.', 'Role: ', '\xa0\xa0Kafka: 2+ years (Preferred)', '\xa0\xa0Database (Redshift, Snowflake, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server): 7 years (Preferred)', 'Solid functional understanding of the Open-Source Big Data Technologies and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or Cassandra.', 'Role:', '\xa0\xa0Writing data pipelines: 4+ years (Preferred)', 'Experience:', 'Support multiple Agile Scrum teams with planning, scoping and creation of technical solutions.']

Understand data models and schemas, and work with other engineering staff to recommend extensions and changes. ['', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'As part of being a backend engineer, you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will work on a wide range of complex challenges, including building a sophisticated sharing model, processing streams of data from multiple sources, efficiently notifying users on data matching specified criteria, and optimize queries to serve search results quickly. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on the foundations of Python, Django, Celery, Airflow, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Neo4J, AWS, Terraform, and Ansible.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'About You:', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'The Backend Software Engineer Role:', 'Our Team:', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'About Us:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'What We Look For:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.']
